Title: Abanyarwanda biga mu Ishuri rya Gisirikare mu Bubiligi basabanye na bagenzi babo mu gikorwa ndangamuco
Body:
Abasirikare b’Abanyarwanda biga mu Ishuri rya Gisirikare ryo mu Bubiligi rizwi nka École Royale Militaire bifatanyije na bagenzi babo mu gikorwa ndangamuco.
Abasirikare b’Abanyarwanda biga mu Ishuri rya Gisirikare ryo mu Bubiligi rizwi nka École Royale Militaire bifatanyije na bagenzi babo mu gikorwa ndangamuco.
Iki gikorwa ngarukamwaka cyiswe ‘Soirée Internationale’ cyabereye mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles mu Bubiligi ku wa 6 Werurwe 2020.
Cyahuje abanyeshuri b’abasirikare baturuka mu bihugu nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Luxembourg, u Budage, u Buholandi, u Bushinwa, u Busuwisi, u Rwanda, Congo Brazzaville, Bénin, Togo, Niger, Mali, Tunizia, Liban, Algérie, Burkina Faso na Maroc.
Mu kiganiro na Major Shyaka Jean Paul, Umunyarwanda uri gukurikirana amasomo ya gisirikare mu Bubiligi yabwiye IGIHE ko iki gikorwa gihuza abanyeshuri b’abasirikare biga muri École Royale Militaire berekana umuco w’ibihugu baturukamo.
Mu byo bibandaho harimo ibijyanye n’imirire iranga abenegihugu runaka n’imbyino mu rwego rwo gusabana n’inshuti n’abavandimwe baba batumiwe.
Yagize ati ‘‘Twishimiye kubona Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo benshi batuye hano mu Bubiligi bitabiriye ubutumire bwacu, kugira ngo u Rwanda ruhagararirwe neza muri iki gikorwa.’’
École Royale Militaire ni Kaminuza ya Gisirikare iherereye mu Bubiligi. Niyo irera abofisiye b’Ababiligi mu byiciro birimo icy’Ingabo zirwanira ku butaka, izo mu kirere, izo mu mazi n’izikora mu bijyanye no gutanga ubuvuzi.
Iherereye mu nyubako yahanzwe n’abahanga mu bugeni bwo guhanga inyubako Henri Maquet na Henri Van Dievoet. Itanga amasomo mu Gifaransa, Icyongereza n’Ikidage.
Amafoto: Rutayisire Jessica

Title: Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa basabye Sena kwitandukanya n’ibiganiro by’abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
Body:
Ihuriro ry’Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa (Communauté Rwandaise de France, CRF), ndetse na Ibuka France, basabye Sena y’iki gihugu kwitandukanya n’inama igamije guha urubuga abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Ihuriro ry’Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa (Communauté Rwandaise de France, CRF), ndetse na Ibuka France, basabye Sena y’iki gihugu kwitandukanya n’inama igamije guha urubuga abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Ubusabe bw’aba banyarwanda bwo kwamagana iyi nama, bugaragariza Perezida wa Sena y’u Bufaransa, Gérard Larcher n’abasenateri muri rusange, ko batewe impungenge n’inama iteganyijwe ku wa 9 Werurwe 2020 izabera mu ngoro ya Sena, ikaba iziga kuri bimwe mu bibazo biri mu karere k’ibiyaga bigari.
Nk’uko bigaragara kuri gahunda y’ibizakorwa, iyi nama biteganyijwe ko izaha rugari abenshi mu bafite ubushakashatsi bwo guhakana no gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Bibutsa ko ibyo bikorwa bihanwa n’ingingo ya 24 y’itegeko ryo ku wa 29 Nyakanga 1881, ku birebana n’ubwisanzure bw’itangazamakuru.
Bati “Ntabwo bikwiye ku rwego rwa leta rwubashywe nka sena byongeye rugomba kuba icyitegererezo mu kubahiriza itegeko, ko rwaba urubuga rwo gukwirakwiza ibiganiro bigamije konona amategeko y’ikindi gihugu ndetse no gutesha agaciro kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi, igihugu nk’u Bufaransa kirimo kwitegura kwibuka mu mezi abiri ari imbere nk’uko biri mu iteka n° 2019-435 ryo kuwa 13 Gicurasi 2019”.
Bukomeza bugira buti “Turabasaba Nyakubahwa Perezida kugira icyo mukora mu kwirinda ko urwego rwanyu rwakwifatanya n’ibikorwa nka biriya, turasaba kandi abasenateri kwitandukanya mu buryo bweruye na bariya bantu n’ubushakashatsi bwabo”.
Ubu busabe bumaze gusinywa n’abagera ku 2,693 mu 5000 bakenewe, burakurikira abantu batandukanye ku mbuga nkorambaga, bakomeje kwamagana iyi nama yateguwe na Sena y’u Bufaransa.
Igikomeje kubabaza benshi ni uburyo iyi nama izitabirwa n’abantu bazwiho mu guhakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi barimo Charles Onana, Judi Rever na Hubert Vedrine, Vincent Hervouët.
Vedrine yahoze ari umunyamabanga mukuru wa Perezida Mitterand mu Bufaransa, Leta izwiho kuba yarashyigikiye abakoze Jenoside mu Rwanda. Judi Rever ni umunyamakuru wo muri Canada akaba n’umwanditsi w’ibitabo bipfobya bikanahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kimwe na Charles Onana, naho Vincent Hervouet ni umunyamakuru wa Televiziyo y’Abafaransa LCI y’Ishyirahamwe TF1 ukunze guha rugari abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.

Title: Abanyamuryango ba FPR Inkotanyi mu Bwongereza bakoze umwiherero baganira ku iterambere ry’u Rwanda
Body:
Abanyamuryango b’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi baba mu Bwongereza bagize umwiherero wahuje abayobozi bakuru n’abategurwa kujya mu buyobozi, wagarutse ku mateka y’uwo muryango, amateka y’Urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, ndi Umunyarwanda, icyerekezo 2050 n’ibindi.
Abanyamuryango b’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi baba mu Bwongereza bagize umwiherero wahuje abayobozi bakuru n’abategurwa kujya mu buyobozi, wagarutse ku mateka y’uwo muryango, amateka y’Urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, ndi Umunyarwanda, icyerekezo 2050 n’ibindi.
Uwo mwiherero wabaye tariki 24 Gashyantare 2020 wahuje abayobozi b’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi baba mu Bwongereza n’abagaragara ko bazaba abayobozi mu gihe kiri imbere bose hamwe bagera kuri 45. Intego nyamukuru yari iyo kagaragaza aho uwo muryango wavuye, aho ugeze n’aho ugana ndetse no kuganira ku iterambere ry’igihugu muri rusange.
Ni umwiherero watangiwemo ibiganiro bitandukanye bifasha abasanzwe mu buyobozi n’abategurwa kurushaho kumenya Ibikorwa by’Umuryango FPR Ikontanyi; aho wavuye, aho ugeze n’aho wifuza kugana mu cyerekezo cy’igihugu binagaruka ku mateka n’iterambere ry’u Rwanda muri rusange.
Ibiganiro byarimo amateka y’u Rwanda guhera mu gihe cy’abami, icy’umwaduko w’abazungu, icya Repubulika na Politiki rugenderaho muri iki gihe.
Umuyobozi wa FPR Inkotanyi mu Bwongereza, Egide Ruhashya yagarutse kuri ayo mateka ndetse yerekena n’uburyo igihugu kiyobowe, ashimangira ko buha buri munyarwanda kwishimira iterambere ry’igihugu cye.
Muri ibyo biganiro bigaruka ku mibereho yose y’abanyarwanda, harimo icyatanzwe na Rev. Dr Malachie Munyaneza cyagarutse ku ruhare rw’iyobokamana mu mateka y’abanyarwanda. Yavuze ko amadini afite uruhare rukomeye mu mibereho y’abanyarwanda kuva mu gihe cy’abami kugeza muri iki gihe.
Muri Rwanda Day iheruka, Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda yerekanye ko kuva mu 2010 amafaranga Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bohereza imbere mu gihugu yiyongereye ku gipimo cya 158%. Yavuye kuri miliyoni 98.2 mu 2010 agera kuri miliyoni 253 z’amadorali ya Amerika mu 2018 ni asaga miliyari 250 z’amanyarwanda.
Muri uwo mwiherero naho uruhare rw’abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga mu kubaka igihugu rwagarutsweho ndetse abawuteraniyemo bibutswa ko bigomba kujyana, no kubumbatira indangagaciro n’umuco by’abanyarwanda.
Umuyobozi wungirije w’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi mu Bwongereza, Tony Kanani abihuje n’ubuzima abanyarwanda babayeho mu Bwongereza, yashimangiye ko abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga badakwiye gusigara inyuma mu kubaka igihugu.
Ubu u Rwanda ruri mu cyerekezo 2050 kigizwe n’imyaka 30 igabanyije mu bice bibiri; birimo ikigizwe n’imyaka 15 ya mbere kugera mu 2035 n’imyaka 15 izakurikira. Muri icyo cyerekezo u Rwanda rufite intego yo kugira ubukungu buciriritse mu 2035 naho mu 2050 umunyarwanda yazaba yinjiza $12 476 ku mwaka, ni ukuvuga asaga miliyoni 10 Frw ku mwaka.
Umwiherero w’abo banyamuryango ba FPR baba mu Bwongereza watinze kuri iki cyerekezo, barushaho gusobanukira aho igihugu cyifuza kuganisha abanyawanda n’icyo kibategerejeho kugira ngo ibyo byose bizabashe kugerwaho.
Icyo gikorwa ni ubwa mbere gikozwe mu Bwongereza abacyitabiriye bavuze ko babashije kumenya amateka ya FPR Inkotanyi n’aho ishaka kuganisha igihugu.

Title: Ibyishimo by’abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc mu kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga w’ururimi kavukire (Amafoto)
Body:
Abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc bagaragaje ibyiza by’umuco nyarwanda mu birori byo kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga w’ururimi kavukire batumiwemo na Minisiteri y’umuco muri icyo gihugu, ku ruhande rwabo, ubabera n’umunsi wo gusabana mu Kinyarwanda.
Abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc bagaragaje ibyiza by’umuco nyarwanda mu birori byo kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga w’ururimi kavukire batumiwemo na Minisiteri y’umuco muri icyo gihugu, ku ruhande rwabo, ubabera n’umunsi wo gusabana mu Kinyarwanda.
Ni umunsi wabereye mu murwa mukuru wa Maroc i Rabat, wizihizwa mu mbyino no kwerekana umuco bya buri gihugu cyari cyatumiwe.
Abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc barimo abanyeshuri, abahakora imirimo itandukanye n’abahatuye bitabiriye uwo munsi.
Amashuri menshi muri icyo gihugu akoresha Igifaransa, byumvikana ko uretse abanyarwanda bashobora kuba bigana bakoresha Ikinyarwanda nabwo gake, naho ubundi kumva ikinyarwanda bidakunze kubaho.
Byari ibyishimo abanyarwanda batera urwenya mu Kinyarwanda cyabo banacinya akadiho berekana ibyiza by’umuco w’u Rwanda muri ibyo birori.
Mu kiganiro IGIHE yagiranye na Muhire Derrick wiga imibare na mudasobwa muri Kaminuza ya Ibn Tofail Kénitra, iherereye mu mujyi wa Kénitra aho muri Maroc, akaba ahagarariye abanyeshuri bo mu mijyi ya Rabat, Sale na Kénitra, yavuze ko wababereye umunsi wo gusabana no kwisanzura mu rurimi kavukire rw’Ikinyarwanda.
Muhire Derrick yagize, ati “Tuba dusanzwe tuvuga tunakoresha Igifaransa kuko ari cyo twigamo rero nk’uyu munsi w’ururimi gakondo nkatwe nk’abanywarwanda ni umunsi twereka amahanga umuco wacu ndetse tugahura tukavugana rwa rurimi rw’iwacu twisanzuye.”
Itorero ry’abanyarwanda muri Maroc ryitwa Icyeza cy’Indatwa niryo ryaserutse muri ibyo birori. Ndayambaje Albert uhagarariye abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc yabwiye IGIHE ko muri icyo gihugu hari abanyarwanda 90; barimo abanyeshuri, abakozi, imiryango ihatuye, n’abimenyereza akazi mu nzego zitandukanye. Bakaba ari bamwe mu bitabiriye ibyo birori.

Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Maroc, Sheikh Habimana Saleh yashimiye abana b’u Rwanda uburyo bagaragaje umuco nyarwanda mu mbyino za Kinyarwanda.

Mu Rwanda umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Ururimi kavukire wizihirijwe mu Karere ka Kirehe ku rwego rw’igihugu ku nsanganyamatsiko igira iti ‘Dukoreshe Ikinyarwanda kinoze twese’.
Ururimi rw’Ikinyarwanda rufatwa nk’ipfundo rihuje abanyarwanda aho bava bakagera, nkuko binumvikana mu ndirimo yubahiriza igihugu cy’u Rwanda ‘Rwanda Nziza.

Title: U Rwanda rwizeye kungukira mu Imurikagurisha Mpuzamahanga ry’Ubukerarugendo muri Israel (Amafoto)
Body:
U Rwanda rubinyujije mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) n’ibindi bitanga serivisi z’ubukerarugendo ruhagarariwe mu Imurikagurisha Mpuzamahanga ry’Ubukerarugendo rizwi nka International Mediterranean Tourism Market (IMTM 2020) riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Tel Aviv muri Israel.
U Rwanda rubinyujije mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) n’ibindi bitanga serivisi z’ubukerarugendo ruhagarariwe mu Imurikagurisha Mpuzamahanga ry’Ubukerarugendo rizwi nka International Mediterranean Tourism Market (IMTM 2020) riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Tel Aviv muri Israel.
IMTM ni imurikagurisha ryagutse, rimeze nk’igikorwa gihuza abashoramari bakomeye mu by’ubukerarugendo mu bihugu byo mu Burasirazuba bw’Inyanja ya Méditerranée. Ryatangiye kuri uyu wa 11 Gashyantare mu gihe rizasozwa ku wa 12 Gashyantare 2020.
U Rwanda ruhagarariwe na RDB n’ibigo bitanu birimo Sosiyete y’Ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere, RwandAir, Palast Tours &Travel, Albertine Tours, Beautiful Rwanda na Rwanda Eco Company.
Iri murikagurisha ryitabiriwe n’abantu batandukanye barimo na Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Israel, Joseph Rutabana.
Biteganyijwe ko ku wa Kane tariki ya 13, abahagarariye ibigo byo mu Rwanda bazaganira n’abikorera n’abandika inkuru z’ubukerarugendo baba muri Israël.
Abanya-Israel bakora ingendo nibura 4,000,000 buri mwaka. Ishoramari n’inyungu ishingiye ku bukerarugendo hagati ya Israel n’u Rwanda yavuye kuri 3.6% mu 2015 igera kuri 25.9% mu 2019.
Ni imibare yitezweho kuzamuka cyane ko kuva ku wa 25 Kamena 2019 indege ya Sosiyete Nyarwanda ikora ingendo zo mu kirere, RwandAir, yageze i Tel Aviv muri Israel.
RwandAir yavuze ko izi ngendo nshya zerekeza muri Israel zizongera imbaraga mu mubano mwiza n’ubuhahirane bisanzwe biri hagati y’u Rwanda na Israel cyane mu rwego rw’ubucuruzi.
U Rwanda rwishimiwe cyane binyuze ku hanyu hamurikiwe ibicuruzwa na serivisi zarwo by’umwihariko ikawa iva mu rw’imisozi 1000 yishimiwe cyane. Nirwo rwo gihugu cyonyine cyaserukanye ababyinnyi (Itorero Urukerereza) muri iri murikagurisha byanatumye abantu bagana aho ryamurikiye ibikorwa byarwo, barizihirwa.
IMTM iri mu bikorwa bihuza abantu benshi muri Israel kuko mu mwaka wa 2019 yasuwe n’abasaga 26800. Iri murikagurisha rimaze imyaka 26 riba buri mwaka, ryitabirwa n’ibihugu birenze 57; riberamo ibiganiro mbwirwaruhame bitandukanye bigera kuri 40, abaminisitiri b’ubukerarugendo 14 bamaze kuryitabira.
Umwaka ushize abamuritse ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bari bafite stands 265, amahoteli 57, abatanga serivisi z’ubukerarugendo 126, abayobora n’abafasha mu ngendo 29, ibigo by’abatwara abantu n’ibintu mu nzira y’ikirere 19, abatwara abantu n’ibintu mu nzira y’ubutaka 18.
Ibikorwa by’imurikagurisha rimenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda byiyongera ku bindi bikomeye birimo amasezerano rwasinye na Arsenal FC yo mu Bwongereza, Paris St Germain yo mu Bufaransa na Film mbarankuru ya Rwanda: The Royal Tour.
RDB igaragaza ko mu 2017 u Rwanda rwinjije miliyoni $438 zivuye mu bukerarugendo, intego ya Guverinoma ni uko mu 2024 inyungu ruvana mu bukerarugendo izagera kuri miliyoni $800.

Title: Abanyarwanda baba mu Bubiligi bashyiriweho uburyo bwo kunganira Mutuelle de Santé
Body:
Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Bubiligi yashyiriyeho abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo baba muri iki gihugu na Luxembourg, uburyo bwo kunganira gahunda ya leta y’ubwisungane mu kwivuza ‘Mutuelle de Santé’.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Bubiligi yashyiriyeho abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo baba muri iki gihugu na Luxembourg, uburyo bwo kunganira gahunda ya leta y’ubwisungane mu kwivuza ‘Mutuelle de Santé’.
Gushyiraho konti muri banki izajya ishyirwaho inkunga yo kunganira Mituweli, bikozwe nyuma y’icyifuzo cyatangiwe mu nama y’Igihugu y’Umushyikirano ya 17 yabaye kuwa 19-20 Ukuboza 2019.
Ku munsi wa kabiri w’iyi nama, Safari Christine wo mu Ntara ya Diaspora y’u Buholandi, yagaragaje ko hari uburyo abanyarwanda baba muri Diaspora, bashyigikira gahunda za leta ariko bigakorwa mu kajagari cyangwa mu buryo bwo gutatanya ingufu.
Yagize ati “Hari ukuntu dufasha muri Mituelle de santé, tukabikora mu matsinda nkabona bisa nk’aho birimo akavuyo kandi biba birimo amafaranga menshi, nkaba nibaza niba twakorerwa ikigega kikaba ikigega cya Diaspora noneho ayo mafaranga ya za mituweli dukura hirya no hino tukayashyira muri icyo kigega kigafasha abantu batishoboye”.
Iki cyifuzo cye cyafashweho umwanzuro muri iyi nama kuko uwa munani mu yayifatiwemo uvuga ku ‘Gushyiraho uburyo bwo gufasha Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga kunganira ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya gahunda za Leta zinyuranye harimo Ubwisungane mu Kwivuza (Mutuelle de Santé) no gukoresha ubumenyi bafite mu ngeri zitandukanye iyo baje mu kiruhuko mu Rwanda’.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono na Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Bubiligi, Amandin Rugira rivuga ko hashyizweho konti iri mu izina rya RSSB-CBHI, nimero yayo ni 440207884 iri muri Banki ya KCB Bank.
Iri tangazo rivuga ko “Ambasade y’u Rwanda i Bruxelles, irahamagarira abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda batuye mu Bubiligi na Luxembourg, kwitabira iki gikorwa cy’ingenzi ku bavandimwe bacu babikeneye”.
Guhera muri uyu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari Guverinoma yongereye amafaranga ishyira mu bwisungane mu kwivuza ‘Mutuelle de santé’.
Ikigo cy’Ubwiteganyirize mu Rwanda (Rwanda Social Security Board-RSSB) kivuga ko iyi nyongera ingana na miliyari 10 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, izafasha muri gahunda yo kugeza ubuvuzi kuri bose.
Imibare ya RSSB igaragaza ko ingano y’imisanzu y’abanyamuryango ba mutuelle de santé harimo nayo leta yabageneraga ari milyari 32.8, mu gihe ayo bakoresha angana na miliyari 47.4 ibintu byatumaga bagira igihombo cya miliyari 14.6 buri mwaka.

Title: Abanyarwanda baba mu Burusiya bizihije umunsi w’intwari, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro
Body:
Abanyarwanda baba mu Burusiya biganjemo abatuye mu mujyi wa Moscow n’inshuti zabo, ku cyicaro cy’Ambasade y’u Rwanda kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 1 Gashyantare 2020 bizihije umunsi w’Intwari
Abanyarwanda baba mu Burusiya biganjemo abatuye mu mujyi wa Moscow n’inshuti zabo, ku cyicaro cy’Ambasade y’u Rwanda kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 1 Gashyantare 2020 bizihije umunsi w’Intwari
Ni umuhango wabaye mu gihe Abanyarwanda hirya no hino bifatanyaga mu kwibuka Intwari z’igihugu, no gukomeza kuzirikana akamaro k’ubutwari mu iterambere ry’igihugu.
Colonel Gashaija Emmanuel, wari uhagarariye Ambasaderi muri uyu muhango, yashimiye abitabiriye umunsi w’Intwari, anabashimira uburyo bitabira ibikorwa byose by’Ambasade.
Yatanze ikiganiro cyibanze ahanini ku mpamvu uwo munsi ngarukamwaka wizihizwa, ku butwari mu mateka y’u Rwanda, ku ndangagaciro y’ubutwari, ku cyo intwari ari cyo, ku ntwari z’u Rwanda no ku nsanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka igira iti “Ubutwari mu Banyarwanda, agaciro kacu”.
Yagize ati “Leta y’u Rwanda yafashe icyemezo cyo gushyiraho uyu munsi ngarukamwaka w’Intwari kuko ari inshingano z’igihugu kuzirikana Intwari zacyo kandi ni umuco mwiza wo gushima Abanyarwanda n’abanyamahanga bagaragaje ibikorwa n’ibitekerezo bifitiye u Rwanda akamaro.”
Yakomeje agira ati “ Kuzirikana Intwari z’Igihugu kandi bituma Abanyarwanda bakomeza umuco wo gukunda Igihugu, kunga ubumwe, kubana neza no guharanira icyateza u Rwanda imbere. Kuzirikana Intwari z’u Rwanda ni uburyo kandi bwo gushimangira ibyiza byagezweho mu mibereho n’imibanire myiza by’Abanyarwanda, hashyirwa imbere ibyubaka umuryango wacu nk’Abenegihugu, abanyafurika n’abatuye isi muri rusange.”
Col Gashaija umunsi w’intwari ari n’umwanya wo kuzirikana no gushimira abana b’u Rwanda bitanze bakabohora u Rwanda ingoyi y’ubutegetsi bw’igitugu bakanahagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, barangajwe imbere na Perezida Paul Kagame.
Hazirikanywe kandi abagize ibindi bikorwa by’ubutwari nk’abakomeye ku bunyarwanda n’abarwanyiie akarengane ako ari ko kose.
Colonel Gashaija Emmanuel kandi yagarutse ku nsanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka, avuga ko ari umukoro ku rubyiruko wo gukomeza gusigasira ibyagezweho.
Ati “Ni insanganyamatsiko yatoranyijwe kugira ngo ikangurire Abanyarwanda cyane cyane urubyiruko guharanira ubutwari mu byo bakora byose hagamijwe kwihesha agaciro no kwigira, bijyana no guharanira iterambere ry’abenegihugu bose, bikanajyana no kurangwa n’umuco wo gukora cyane, guhanga udushya no gukunda iby’iwacu.”
Umunsi w’Intwari wizihijwe kuri uyu wa 1 Gashyantare wabanjirijwe n’icyumweru cy’Ubutwari cyatangiye ku wa 24 Mutarama 2020 gisozwa ku wa 31 Mutarama.
Cyaranzwe n’imikino itandukanye n’ibiganiro byabereye mu bigo bya Leta, ibyigenga no muri za kaminuza n’amashuri makuru no hirya no hino ku Isi ahari abanyarwanda.
Intwari z’u Rwanda ziri mu byiciro bitatu ari byo Imanzi igizwe n’Umusirikare utazwi na General Major Fred Gisa Rwigema; Imena zirimo Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa, Rwagasana Michel, Agathe Uwiringiyimana, Niyitegeka Félicité n’Abanyeshuri b’Inyange. Icyiciro cya gatatu n’Ingenzi ariko nta ntwari n’imwe irashyirwamo.

Title: Paris: Agatsiko k’Abanye-Congo kashatse kwigaragambya kuri Ambasade y’u Rwanda bamwe batabwa muri yombi
Body:
Abanye-Congo batuye mu Bufaransa bagerageje kwigaragambiriza hafi ya Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Mujyi wa Paris, inzego z’umutekano zita muri yombi bamwe mu bashatse kuyisagarira.
Abanye-Congo batuye mu Bufaransa bagerageje kwigaragambiriza hafi ya Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Mujyi wa Paris, inzego z’umutekano zita muri yombi bamwe mu bashatse kuyisagarira.
Iyi myigaragambyo yabereye i Paris kuri uyu wa Gatandatu, tariki ya 18 Mutarama 2020. Yakozwe n’Abanye-Congo 30, bahagurutse saa kumi bagera aho bemerewe gukorera imyigaragambyo saa kumi n’imwe na 45.
Yakomotse ku mvugo yo kwigabanya Uburasirazuba bwa RDC cyangwa “balkanization”, iheruka kugarukwaho n’abarimo Arikiyepiskopi wa Kinshasa, Cardinal Fridolin Ambongo na Adolphe Muzito wabaye Minisitiri w’Intebe wa RDC, ubu ni umuvugizi w’Ihuriro Lamuka.
Cardinal Ambongo mu mpera z’ukwezi gushize yavuze ko ubuyobozi bwa Congo bukwiye kumvisha ibihugu bituranye by’u Rwanda, u Burundi na Uganda, guhagarika kwinjiza abaturage babyo ku butaka bw’Uburasirazuba bwa RDC, ko hari umugambi wo kwigabanya igice cy’Uburasirazuba bwa Congo.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Bufaransa, François-Xavier Ngarambe, yabwiye IGIHE ko imyigaragambyo yabaye ariko yakorewe kure y’inyubako ya Ambasade.
Yakozwe n’Abanye-Congo ba APARECO [Ihuriro ry’abaharanira impinduka muri Congo- Alliance des Patriotes pour la Refondation du Congo] bari barasabye banahabwa uruhushya rwo gukora imyigaragambyo bavuga ko bamagana Leta y’u Rwanda.
Urwo rugendo rwabo rwagombaga kuva mu gace ka Paris Nord [Gare du Nord] saa munani rwerekeza kuri Parc Monceau aho bagombaga guhagarara, bagakora ibikorwa byabo.
Ambasaderi Ngarambe yavuze ko ari “ahantu nko muri metero 700 aho batanashobora kurebesha ambasade amaso uretse no kuyegera”. Kuri ambasade no ku mihanda iganayo hari harinzwe.
Abigaragambya bavugaga ko bamagana ibyo bo bita ‘iyomekwa ry’intara zimwe za Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ku Rwanda cyangwa ‘balkanisation.’ Bari bitwaje amabendera ya Zaïre yaje guhinduka RDC.
Amashusho yakwirakwijwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga agaragaza abo Banye-Congo bari kwigaragambya. Yerekana aho bamwe bashatse kurenga aho bemerewe bagana kuri Ambasade, Polisi irabatangira. Abaharenze bose batawe muri yombi.
Amb. Ngarambe yavuze ko iyo myigaragambyo yamaze iminota igera kuri 15, ndetse nta na kimwe yahungabanyije.
Mu Ukuboza 2019, Adolphe Muzito wabaye Minisitiri w’Intebe wa RDC, ubu ni Umuvugizi w’Ihuriro ritavuga rumwe na Leta rya Lamuka yabwiye abanyamakuru ko kugira ngo igihugu cye gitekane, gikwiye gutera u Rwanda ndetse kikarwiyomekaho ngo kirangize ikibazo kimaze imyaka isaga 20 mu Burasirazuba bwa RDC.
Ati “Ntabwo dushobora kubona amahoro tudateye u Rwanda, byaba ngombwa tukarufata.”
Muzito yabaye Minisitiri w’Intebe wa RDC hagati ya 2008 na 2012, yagiye ku buyobozi bwa Lamuka ku wa 2 Ukuboza 2019 asimbuye Jean-Pierre Bemba.
Imvugo ye yakongeje uburakari mu Banye-Congo, ndetse bayamaganiye kure! Ku ikubitiro abayobozi ba Lamuka barimo Jean Pierre Bemba na Moïse Katumbi, banenze ijambo rye, bamusaba kwisubiraho.
Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Rwanda, Dr Biruta Vincent, aheruka kubwira itangazamakuru ko hari abanyapolitiki bo muri RDC bakeka ko bazamamara nibavuga nabi u Rwanda.
Ati “Ni ibintu bibabaje, wakwiteguye ko ibyo bavuga biba bifite icyo bafite bashingiraho gifatika ariko nta gihari. Ntabwo ari ubwa mbere bene ibi bibazo bibaho, hashize igihe hari abanyapolitiki bo muri RDC bumva ko kugira ngo abaturage babo babemere ari uko bavuga nabi u Rwanda.”

Title: Me. Flamme wunganiraga Fabien Neretse yatsimbaraye ku ipfobya rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
Body:
Ku wa Gatanu, tariki ya 20 Ukuboza 2019, nibwo Urukiko rwa rubanda rwo mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles rwategetse ko Neretse Fabien afungwa imyaka 25 nyuma yo kumuhamya ibyaha bya Jenoside n’ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Ku wa Gatanu, tariki ya 20 Ukuboza 2019, nibwo Urukiko rwa rubanda rwo mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles rwategetse ko Neretse Fabien afungwa imyaka 25 nyuma yo kumuhamya ibyaha bya Jenoside n’ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Neretse yari akurikiranyweho ibikorwa by’ubwicanyi mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi i Nyamirambo no mu Mataba mu yahoze ari Komini Ndusu mu Ruhengeri hagati ya 6 Mata 1994 na 14 Nyakanga 1994.
Yarezwe gushishikariza abasirikari kwica Abatutsi, aho 13 biciwe i Nyamirambo. Yanashinze Umutwe w’Interahamwe mu Mataba, awuha intwaro mbere yo kugaba ibitero ku Batutsi, ariko anabaha ibihembo by’amafaranga.
Icyemezo cy’Urukiko rwa Bruxelles cyo gukatira Neretse imyaka 25 gifite umwihariko kuko ni ubwa mbere u Bubiligi bwakurikiranye bukanahana icyaha cya Jenoside hashingiwe ku itegeko rihana. Cyanyuze uruhande rw’abarega.
Umunyamategeko ubahagarariye, Me. Karongozi André Martin, yabwiye IGIHE ko nubwo rwitabiriwe n’abagenzwa n’impamvu zitandukanye, rwagenze neza.
Ati “Ku bwacu urubanza rwagenze uko rwagombaga kugenda, nubwo byari bikomeye harimo ingorane nyinshi zuko hari abanyabuhamya baguriwe, z’uko hari abaza guhimba ko mu Rwanda abantu batisanzura. Ibyo byose ikintu nishimiye ku giti cyanjye, ni ukubona ko Abanyarwanda bavuze badategwa abenshi berekanye ibyaha Neretse yakoze ari nabyo urukiko rwahereyeho. Harimo n’abaje kwigamba, harimo n’abaje guhakana Jenoside.”
Urubanza rwa Neretse rwaranzwe n’amagambo ahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yavuzwe n’umwunganira, Me Jean Flamme. Imvugo ze zatumye abari mu rubanza harimo n’abacamanza bagaragaza ko yarengereye mu kuvuga ko habaye Jenoside ebyiri.
Nyuma y’umwanzuro w’urubanza yakomeje kwinangira ku bitekerezo bye bipfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Me Flamme waganiriye na IGIHE asa n’uwabihiwe yavuze ko atishimye umwanzuro w’urukiko ku mukiliya we.
Ati “Uru rubanza rwatangiye nabi cyane, banze abatangabuhamya, rwatangiye nabi bikomeza mu rubanza rwose. Njye ntabwo mbyishimiye. Ni akaga ku butabera bw’u Bubiligi.”
Yavuze ko adahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ahubwo ko mbere yuko iba habayeho Jenoside na nyuma yayo haba indi.
Ati “Simpakana Jenoside, icyo navuze ni uko mbere yayo habaye Jenoside yakorewe abahutu kandi ko nyuma yayo, habaye Jenoside muri Congo yasize ibihumbi 10 by’inzirakarengane.”
Umunyamakuru wa IGIHE yamubajije niba yarigeze agera mu Rwanda ngo yihere ijisho ibyahabereye,yamusubije agira ati “Muri Kanama 1994 nari mu Rwanda ndi kumwe n’abanyamategeko batagira umupaka, nzi ibyo mvuga.”
Abajijwe niba yarabonye imibiri y’inzirakarengane, mu ijambo rimwe arasubiza ati “yego”. Yongeyeho ko ari ibintu bibabaje ariko akarenga akavuga ko uwo yunganiraga (Neretse) yarenganye.
Umwunganizi w’abiciwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu manza zitandukanye zibera mu Bubiligi, Michèle Hirsch, yavuze ko ari urubanza rudasanzwe ruhamya akamaro gakomeye k’urukiko rw’abaturage rwa Bruxelles.
Yavuze ko rwagaragayemo ibintu bidasanzwe byinshi birimo n’abatangabuhamya badasanzwe, abarokotse bagize imbaraga zo guhagaragara bakavuga aribyo byatumye umwanzuro wafashwe ufatwa.
Ati “Ndatekereza ko icyemezo cy’urukiko kizandikwa mu mateka y’Urukiko rwa rubanda rwa Bruxelles kizandikwa mu mateka y’u Bubiligi n’ay’ikiremwamuntu.’’
Urubanza rwa Fabien Neretse w’imyaka 71 rwatangiye mu Ugushyingo 2019 ubwo hatoranywaga itsinda ry’abaturage bagomba gutanga ubuhamya bumushinja n’ubumushinjura. Nyuma y’iminsi itatu rutangira kuburanishwa mu mizi.
Fabien Neretse ukomoka mu Ruhengeri yafatiwe mu Bufaransa mu 2011. Uyu mugabo wari ufite ijambo ku butegetsi bwa Habyarimana, ashinjwa kugira uruhare mu kwica Umubiligi Claire Beckers n’umugabo we Isaïe Bucyana n’umukobwa wabo Katia. Aba biciwe i Kigali ku wa 9 Mata 1994, nyuma y’iminsi mike Jenoside itangiye.
Neretse wahise atabwa muri yombi ajya gufungwa, afite iminsi 15 yo kujuririra umwanzuro w’Urukiko rwa Bruxelles.

Title: Kwibuka26: Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomera ku bumwe, barwanya abahakana Jenoside
Body:
Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomeza gusenyera umugozi umwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomeza gusenyera umugozi umwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Babisabwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 7 Mata 2020, ubwo Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa bifatanyaga n’Isi kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Umuhango wo kwibuka wahurije hamwe abanyarwanda basaga 550 baba mu Bushinwa hakoreshejwe uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Bushinwa, James Kimonyo mu ijambo rye , yasabye abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa kurangwa n’indangagaciro z’ubwitange zaranze ingabo za RPA, ubwo zahagarikaga Jenoside ziyobowe na Perezida Paul Kagame.
Ambasaderi Kimonyo yasabye abari bamukurikiye gukomeza kwimakaza ubumwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’ihakana ryayo.
Yasabye umuryango mpuzamahanga gufatanya n’u Rwanda mu kugeza imbere y’ubutabera abakidegembya bakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Muri uyu muhango wo kwibuka, humviswe ubuhamya bwa Ntezimana Jean Népomucène warokotse Jenoside kuri ubu wiga mu Bushinwa, wavuze ku rugendo rwe mbere, muri Jenoside na nyuma yayo.
Ntezimana uri kwiga ibijyanye n’ubuvuzi bw’imbere mu mubiri yashimiye ingabo za RPA zamurokoye na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yagaruriye icyizere abarokotse Jenoside, ibafasha mu kubaka ejo hazaza heza.

Title: Kwibuka26: Abanyarwanda baba mu Buyapani bibutse Jenoside, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro
Body:
Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda baba mu Buyapani bifatanyije mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro wo gukoresha ubumenyi rufite mu gufasha igihugu kujya imbere birinda icyagisubiza mu bihe by’icuraburindi.
Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda baba mu Buyapani bifatanyije mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro wo gukoresha ubumenyi rufite mu gufasha igihugu kujya imbere birinda icyagisubiza mu bihe by’icuraburindi.
Byatangajwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 7 Mata ubwo Abanyarwanda batuye mu Buyapani bifatanyaga n’Isi mu kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ubusanzwe ibikorwa byo Kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Buyapani byahurizaga hamwe abanyarwanda, inshuti z’u Rwanda n’abayobozi muri Guverinoma y’u Buyapani.
Uyu mwaka ibikorwa byo kwibuka biri gukorwa mu buryo bwihariye kubera ingamba zafashwe zo gukangurira abantu kuguma mu ngo zabo, hahashywa icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda i Tokyo yahisemo gukora ibikorwa byo kwibuka mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga (video conference).
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Buyapani, Ernest Rwamucyo mu ijambo yagejeje ku banyarwanda n’inshuti zarwo mu Buyapani yagarutse ku mateka mabi yagejeje u Rwanda kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yavuze ko kwibuka ari ngombwa “kuko biduha umwanya wo kwibuka abacu bambuwe ubuzima. Tuboneraho umwanya wo kwihanganisha abarokotse Jenoside n’ubu bagifite ibikomere byaba ibigaragara ku mubiri ndetse n’ibitagaragara.”
Rwamucyo yavuze ko kwibuka ari umwanya wo gusubiza agaciro n’icyubahiro abazize Jenoside bambuwe ubwo bicwaga urw’agashinyaguro.
Yavuze ko ari n’umwanya wo gukangurira abanyarwanda n’isi muri rusange kwirinda ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’ihakana n’ipfobya bya Jenoside.
Ati “Biduha umwanya wo gukangurira abanyarwanda, abatuye isi ndetse n’imiryango mpuzamahanga kuzirikana ububi bw’ingengabitecyerezo ya Jenoside, ingaruka mbi zo guhakana no gupfobya Jenoside ndetse no kubashishikariza kwamagana ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose ryaba irishingiye ku turere, amoko, amadini, cyangwa ibindi byose bishobora gutandukanya abantu.”
Mu myaka 26 ishize, u Rwanda rwagiye rwiyubaka haba mu mibereho y’abaturage n’iterambere muri rusange.
Ambasaderi Rwamucyo yashimye umuhate w’ingabo zari iza RPA zahagaritse Jenoside, igihugu kikabona umusingi wo kubakiraho kigana imbere, ubu kikaba gikataje mu bumwe n’ubwiyunge bw’abanyarwanda, ukwisanzura kwa buri munyarwanda, umutekano n’imiyoborere myiza.
Yashishikarije urubyiruko gutanga umusanzu warwo mu gukomeza kubaka igihugu.
Ati “Mwebwe rubyiruko rwacu, mboneyeho umwanya wo kubakangurira gukunda igihugu cyababyaye. Kwitangira kubaka amateka meza mushyigikira umurongo wa politike nziza yubaka igihugu cyacu.”
“By’umwihariko mwebwe muri hano nk’urubyiruko rufite ubumenyi bwihariye n’imyumvire igomba kuba ihanitse murasabwa byinshi.”
Ambasaderi Rwamucyo yanasabye abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda gukomeza gufata mu mugongo abarokotse Jenoside muri ibi bihe bikomeye.
Ibikorwa byo kwibuka Jenoside bizakomeza muri iki Cyumweru cyo kwibuka mu bihugu birimo Abanyarwanda barebererwa na Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buyapani. Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 8 Mata hazibuka Abanyarwanda baba muri Philippines naho kuwa Gatanu tariki 10 hibuke abanyarwanda baba muri Malaysia.

Title: Diaspora mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus: Icyifuzo cy’Umunyarwanda uba muri Canada
Body:
John B. Kijuli uba muri Canada yatanze icyifuzo cy’uko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora, bakwishyira hamwe bagakusanya inkunga yo kugoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu Rwanda cyane cyane abazasonza kuko batabashije kujya mu kazi kabatunze.
John B. Kijuli uba muri Canada yatanze icyifuzo cy’uko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora, bakwishyira hamwe bagakusanya inkunga yo kugoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu Rwanda cyane cyane abazasonza kuko batabashije kujya mu kazi kabatunze.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda abagera kuri 19 ni bo bimaze kwemezwa ko banduye icyorezo cya COVID-19, giterwa na Coronavirus. Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yafashe ingamba nyinshi, aho kuri uyu wa Gatandatu yashyizeho izindi nshya.
Ingamba nshya zo kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus zatangajwe na Minisitiri w’Intebe, Dr Ngirente Edouard, zategetse ko abakozi ba leta bose n’abikorera basabwa gukorera akazi mu ngo zabo keretse abatanga serivisi z’ingenzi.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Kijuli yavuze ko izi ngamba ari ingenzi cyane kandi zizatanga umusaruro, akifuza ko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora bahabwa igisa nk’impuruza bakwishyira hamwe bakazagoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka n’izi ngamba cyane cyane abaryaga kuko bakoze uwo munsi ‘nyakabyizi’.
Ati “Nkaba numva mfite igitekerezo cy’uko Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga yakorana vuba na za ambasade zacu aho ziri hose zigashishikariza Abanyarwanda twese dutuye muri bino bihugu [nubwo nabo icyorezo cyabagezeho], bisa n’aho bifite amikoro tukibumbira hamwe tugafasha abavandimwe bacu bazahura n’ikibazo cy’inzara.”
Akomeza avuga ko abantu bagenda batanga nk’amadolari 100$, 50$, 10$ gukomeza ariko icyo kintu cyo ‘gutabara abavandimwe bacu kuko twese tuzi amikoro y’ibihugu byacu byo muri Afurika’.
Kijuli wigeze kuba Perezida wa Diaspora muri Edmonton na Visi Perezida ku rwego rw’Intara ya Canada, ahumuriza Abanyarwanda agira ati “Tukaba tugira ngo tubakomeze ngo mushikame kandi nta kabuza iki cyorezo abanyarwanda tuzagitsinda.”
Mu zindi ngamba Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yafashe zirimo ko ‘ubu imipaka yose irafunze, keretse ku Banyarwanda bataha n’abandi batuye mu Rwanda byemewe n’amategeko, abo bose bakaba bazashyirwa mu kato mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri ahantu hateganyijwe’.
‘Ubwikorezi bw’ibicuruzwa byinjira cyangwa bisohoka mu Rwanda burakomeza mu gihe ingendo hagati y’imijyi n’uturere tw’igihugu zitemewe keretse ku bajya kwivuza cyangwa abafite impamvu zihutirwa’.
Nyuma y’izi ngamba, Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Prof. Shyaka Anastase, yagarutse ku bantu barya kuko bakoze uwo munsi, abasaba gutekereza icyaba baramutse bagiye gushaka ayo mafaranga ariko ntibazabashe kuyabona kubera uburwayi; ahubwo abasaba gusaranganya na bagenzi babo muri bike bafite.
Minisitiri Prof Shyaka yatangaje ko Leta igiye kwishakamo ibisubizo bizafasha abantu barya ari uko bakoze ku munsi n’abandi bafite amikoro make kugira ngo mu gihe cyo kwirinda Coronavirus batazicwa n’inzara.
Ati "Hari ibizasaba nk’igihugu ko abantu baba magirirane, niba hari urugo runaka rudafite icyo gusamura, tugomba kwishakamo ubushobozi ku buryo urwo rugo turwunganira kugira ngo abarurimo tutabarinda Coronavirus ariko bakicwa n’inzara.’’
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo kugira umuriro, ibicurane, umunaniro n’inkorora ijyana no kubabara mu mihogo, guhumeka nabi bishobora no kugera aho itera umusonga no kubuza impyiko gukora bishobora gutera urupfu. Iyi ndwara ishobora kwandura binyuze mu gukora ku muntu uyirwaye, cyane cyane mu kuramukanya abantu bahana ibiganza.

Title: Liège: Abanyarwanda bashinze ishuri rifasha abana babo kwiga Ikinyarwanda n’umuco
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye, bakorera n’abiga mu mahanga, bakomeje kwagura u Rwanda babicishije mu bikorwa bitandukanye. Abo mu mujyi wa Liège mu Bubiligi bashinze ishuri bise Umuco, ryitezweo gufasha abana babo kwiga neza Ikinyarwanda n’umuco nyarwanda.
Abanyarwanda batuye, bakorera n’abiga mu mahanga, bakomeje kwagura u Rwanda babicishije mu bikorwa bitandukanye. Abo mu mujyi wa Liège mu Bubiligi bashinze ishuri bise Umuco, ryitezweo gufasha abana babo kwiga neza Ikinyarwanda n’umuco nyarwanda.
Tariki ya 16 Gashyantare IGIHE yanyarukiye mu mujyi wa Liège ahari abanyarwanda batari bake bagize Diaspora nyarwanda, DRB-Rugari Liège, itembera mu ishiri ‘Umuco’.
Iryo shuri ryatangiye mu mpera z‘umwaka ushize wa 2019, bagamije kwishakamo ibisubizo no gufasha abana babo guhorana indangagaciro z’umuco nyarwanda.
Twagirimana uyobora DRB-Rugari-Liège yavuze ko igikorwa batangiye kizafasha abana b’abanyarwanda bari mu mahanga kunga ubumwe no gusigasira umuco nyarwanda.
Ati “Twagerageje kwishakamo uburyo ngo dushyireho iri shuri aho abana bacu bazajya bahurira bakiga Ikinyarwanda, umuco w‘aho bakomoka, rikababera kandi ihuriro ryo kumenyana, kunga ubumwe no gusabana mu gihe bari no kwiga ibijyanye n‘imbyino, indirimbo n‘imihamirizo kuko nabyo n‘igice cy‘amasomo biga.”
Twagirimana yavuze ko iyo abana bigishijwe ayo masomo barushaho gusobanukirwa amateka y’u Rwanda no kuvuga neza Ikinyarwanda.
Ati “Kugira ngo tubigereho habayeho ko ababyeyi babigiramo uruhare batanga umusanzu, ariwo uvamo ibikoresho by‘imfashanyigisho, ubwishingizi bw‘aho dukorera hagize habaye impanuka n‘ibindi. Iki gikorwa gihuza abana n‘ababyeyi babo, usanga bahahurira bagakina igisoro, bakaganira mbese n‘ihuriro n‘ishuri kuri twese.”
 Uyu muyobozi avuga ko icyabagoye ari ukubona abarimu bafite ubumenyi bwifuzwaga kandi bagakorera ubushake, gusa ngo baje kubabona.
Muri iryo shuri harimo ibyiciro bitatu. Abana bafite kuva ku myaka itatu kugeza kuri itandatu biga ukwabo, abo kuva kuri irindwi kugeza ku myaka icumi bakajya ukwabo no kuva kva kuri cumi ukazamura.
Bahabwa amasomo kabiri cyangwa gatatu mu kwezi kuko biga icyumeru kimwe bagasimbuka ikindi bityo bityo.
Isaha ya mbere biga Ikinyarwanda, isaha ikurikiyeho bakiga kubyina bya kinyarwanda n‘ibijyanye n‘umuco n’amateka y‘u Rwanda.
Umwe mu babyeyi bagize ubuyobozi bwa DRB Rugari Liege, Sakumi Sylvie yagize ati “ Ikintu gishimishije cyane ni ukubona ukuntu abana babikunze bitabira batinuba. Iyo umwana wanjye akoze nk‘agakosa nkamubwira ko muhanisha kutaza mu ishuri Umuco, ubwo ntiyongera gukosa kuko kuri bo gusiba ibyo byiza babonye ntibishoboka.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Hari n‘abana bakubwira bati ko icyumweru kitagera ngo tujye mu Rwanda kuko kuri bo kuza kwiga mu ishuri Umuco ni ukuza mu Rwanda, ibi byose rero biratunezaza cyane bikaduha imbaraga zo gukomeza.”
Umwana witwa Timothée Kwizera ufite imyaka icumi yavuze ko kumenya Ikinyarwanda kuri we ari inyungu.
Ati “Ndanezerewe cyane kuko kwiga Ikinyarwanda ni ikintu nemereye bene wacu bari mu Rwanda, ko ngomba kukimenya ngo njye nganira nabo kandi iyo nje aha mpura n‘abandi banyarwanda tukamenyana.”
 Ishuri Umuco gahunda yaryo ni ugutangira saa kumi kugeza saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba.
Twagirimana yifuza ko amashuri nk‘aya bishobotse buri duce twa DRB Rugari mu Bubiligi twabikora nk‘umuhigo kuko asanga bifasha ababyeyi n’abana.

Title: USA: Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta ya Utah bizihije umwaka mushya (Amafoto)
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta ya Utah, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika bifatanyije kwizihiza umwaka mushya wa 2020, basuzuma uko uwa 2019 bafata n’ingamba ngo umwaka mushya uzarusheho kuba mwiza.
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta ya Utah, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika bifatanyije kwizihiza umwaka mushya wa 2020, basuzuma uko uwa 2019 bafata n’ingamba ngo umwaka mushya uzarusheho kuba mwiza.
Uwo muhango wabaye kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 31 Mutarama 2020, ubera mu mujyi wa Salt Lake City muri Leta ya Utah. Witabiriwe na Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika Madamu Mathilde Mukantabana, abasenateri n’abandi bayobozi muri Leta ya Utah.
Ambasaderi Mukantabana, yibukije Abanyarwanda gukomera ku ndangagaciro zabo ntibibagirwe aho bavuye kandi abasaba kuba ba ambasaderi b’u Rwanda mu gihugu batuyemo.
Yagarutse kandi ku mateka y’u Rwanda, yibutsa Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda aho igihugu cyavuye. Yavuze ko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi igihugu cyasaga nk’aho cyapfuye ariko bitewe n’ubuyobozi bwiza ubu igihugu kiri ku myanya ya mbere mu bintu bitandukanye. Yatanze urugero rw’umubare munini w’abagore mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, kuza imbere mu korohereza ishoramari, kurwanya ruswa n’ibindi.
Ambasaderi Mukantabana yasoje asaba Abanyarwanda gusigasira umuco wabo, no kudatakaza indanga gaciro z’umunyarwanda.
Umuyobozi wa diaspora nyarwanda muri Leta ya Utah, Jean Claude Kamali yagaragaje ishusho rusange y’abanyarwanda batuye muri iyo Leta, agaragaza ko hejuru ya 70% bagizwe n’urubyiruko, aboneraho kubwira Abanyarwanda ko aribo mbaraga z’u Rwanda ndetse n’iz’igihugu batuye.
Kamali yagaragarije Ambasaderi Mathilde Mukantabana umubano mwiza bafitanye n’inzego za leta, anashimira Guverineri w’iyo ntara Gary Herbert , ko iyo hakozwe umunsi wo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, asohora itangazo ryo kwifatanya no gukomeza Abanyarwanda by’umwihariko abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri 1994.
Senateri Scott Howell yashimiye Ambasaderi Mukantabana kuba yagize uruzinduko muri Utah, anashimira Abanyarwanda by’umwihariko umuco mwiza wo gushyira hamwe, abashishikariza gukomeza kwitabira gahunda za Leta batuyemo.
Uyu muhango wari witabiriwe n’abantu barenga 250 barimo Abanyarwanda batuye Utah n’inshuti zabo.

Title: Amb. Kirabo Kacyira yatanze impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana
Body:
Ambasaderi Dr. Aissa Kirabo Kacyira yashyikirije Perezida wa Ghana, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo, impapuro zimuhesha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu.
Ambasaderi Dr. Aissa Kirabo Kacyira yashyikirije Perezida wa Ghana, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo, impapuro zimuhesha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu.
Dr. Aissa Kirabo yashyikirije Perezida Nana Addo izo mpapuro kuri uyu wa Mbere, tariki ya 27 Mutarama 2020 mu Ngoro ye iherereye mu Murwa Mukuru Accra.
Ambasaderi Dr. Aissa Kirabo Kacyira abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter, yijeje Abanyarwanda n’Abanya-Ghana kuzarushaho kunoza inshingano yahawe ndetse anashimira Perezida Paul Kagame, wamugiriye icyizere cyo guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana.
Mbere yo guhabwa inshingano zo guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana, Dr Aissa Kirabo Kacyira yakoraga mu Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe imiturire.
Inshingano zo guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana yazihawe na Perezida wa Repubulika, Paul Kagame, tariki ya 15 Nyakanga 2019, ubwo hashyirwagaho abahagarariye u Rwanda mu bihugu 15 by’amahanga.
Dr Aissa Kirabo Kacyira afite izina rizwi mu bijyanye na politiki mu Rwanda. Yayoboye Umujyi wa Kigali hagati ya 2006 na 2011, icyo gihe yari asimbuye Mutsindashyaka Théoneste. Uwo mwanya yawugezeho avuye no mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda aho yari Intumwa ya rubanda.
Ghana yahawe guhagarariramo inyungu z’u Rwanda ni igihugu gisanganywe umubano mwiza narwo. Stanislas Kamanzi ni we wari Ambasaderi warwo kuva ku wa 2 Kamena 2017.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Ghana yafunguwe nk’umusaruro w’ibiganiro Perezida Kagame yagiye agirana na mugenzi we w’icyo gihugu, Nana Akufo-Addo.
Muri gahunda yo kwihutisha iterambere no kuvugurura imibereho myiza y’abaturage (NST1) inajyanye n’iya guverinoma y’imyaka irindwi, igaragaza ko ishoramari ry’abanyamahanga ari imwe mu nzira izafasha mu iterambere ry’ubukungu bushingiye ku mubano u Rwanda rufitanye n’ibindi bihugu.
Ghana n’u Rwanda bifitanye umubano wihariye ugamije kunoza imibereho myiza y’abaturage babyo.
Ibihugu byombi byasinyanye amasezerano y’ubufatanye mu by’ikirere, yatumye kuva ku wa 2 Kamena 2013, Sosiyete Nyarwanda y’Ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere, RwandAir itangira ingendo zigana mu Mujyi wa Accra.
Ingendo za RwandAir zoroheje ubuhahirane hagati y’ibihugu byombi, zinazamura imigenderanire mu bacuruzi n’abashoramari babiturukamo cyane ko mu 2014 Urugaga rw’Abikorera mu Rwanda (PSF) rwasinyanye n’Urwego rushinzwe Ubucuruzi muri Ghana amasezerano y’ubufatanye agamije guteza imbere ishoramari mu buhinzi bwa kijyambere, ubukerarugendo, inganda zikora imyenda, ishoramari mu bwubatsi no mu bucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro.

Title: Bahinduye umuvuno! Uko Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bisanga mu gihugu cyabibarutse
Body:
Mu mpera za buri mwaka iyo witegereje cyane usanga ingendo nyinshi zikorwa ari iz’abantu basubira iwabo kuhasura, bakifatanya n’imiryango kwishimira Noheli n’Ubunani.
Mu mpera za buri mwaka iyo witegereje cyane usanga ingendo nyinshi zikorwa ari iz’abantu basubira iwabo kuhasura, bakifatanya n’imiryango kwishimira Noheli n’Ubunani.
Iyo witegereje umwaka wa 2019 ingendo zakozwe n’Abanyarwanda bagana mu biruhuko bya Noheli n’ibisoza umwaka bavuye mu Bubiligi no mu bindi bihugu by’u Burayi ubona ko bidasanzwe, abenshi bahisemo kubikorera mu Rwanda.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bahageze mu buryo butandukanye mu mpande zose z’Isi! Hari abahageze kera kubera amateka u Rwanda rwaciyemo mu bihe bitandukanye guhera 1959 na nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Muri ubwo buzima usanga hari urubyiruko rwahavukiye cyangwa rwahakuriye, hakaba n’abajyayo bagiye kwiga.
Nyuma y’imyaka 26 Jenoside ihagaritswe usanga u Rwanda n’Abanyarwanda barahinduye imyumvire. Kuri ubu abenshi bishimira kwitwa Abanyarwanda, nk’ikintu bose bahuriyeho.
Nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi benshi bari barahinduye imvugo ingendo n’indimi, batifuza kwitwa Abanyarwanda cyangwa kwitirirwa u Rwanda kubera amahano igihugu cyari kivuyemo.
Buhoro buhoro, ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda bwahinduye imyumvire n’imitekerereze kugeza ubwo buri wese yifuje kwitirirwa rwa Rwanda kubera isura nziza rufite ugereranyije naho rwavuye, mu icuraburindi, imiborogo n’amaraso yamenetse.
Ubu Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bazirikana igihugu cyabibarutse, ntibikandagira mu gihe bashaka kugaruka mu gihugu cyababyaye no gutanga umusanzu wabo mu kubaka igihugu.
Mu biborohereza mu ngendo harimo no kuba Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubwikorezi bw’Indege, RwandAir, gikorera ingendo mu bice bitandukanye by’Isi mu byerekezo 28 bitandukanye.
Kuva mu ntangiriro za 2019, RwandAir yatangije ingendo zerekeza i Addis Ababa muri Ethiopie; i Kinshasa muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, i Guangzhou mu Bushinwa n’i Tel Aviv muri Israel.
IGIHE yegereye abayobozi batandukanye mu gihugu, bayisangiza uko bakiriye kuba Abanyarwanda bagaruka mu gihugu cyabo kandi bishimye.
Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kigali, Rubingisa Pudence, yavuze ko mu bikorwa by’Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bagaragaza urukundo rw’igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati “Buri muntu ubona uko u Rwanda rwihuta mu iterambere ari mu mahanga aba ashaka gushyiraho umuganda we, ikindi umuntu yashima ni ubukangurambaga bukorwa na za Ambasade z’u Rwanda hirya no hino ku Isi, aho n’imiryango y’Abanyarwanda itanga uburyo bwo guhanahana amakuru muri za Diaspora.’’
Yakomeje ati “Iyo bageze mu Rwanda basanga harashyizweho uburyo bwo kwakirwa bwihariye muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga n’Ubutwererane, n’ahandi bagiye hose usanga bakirwa neza kandi byihuse n’ubwo usanga hari serivisi zimwe zigomba kunozwa nabo ubwabo bakabyivugira kugira ngo bikosorwe.’’
Rubingisa yanavuze ko iyo Abanyarwanda basanze iterambere ry’igihugu bibaha umurava wo kukigarukamo kenshi.
Ati “Ibi kandi noneho si abo mu mahanga bibaho gusa kuko n’Abanyarwanda baturuka mu zindi ntara usanga baza bagahaha ubumenyi bakanakopera ibyiza bikorerwa mu Murwa Mukuru wa Kigali bakabijyana mu turere batuyemo.’’
“Mu baturuka mu mahanga, abo tuganira banifuza kuza gusangira ubumenyi mu byo bafitemo ubunararibonye bize cyangwa bakoramo bikaba ari ibintu byo kwishimira.’’
Mu gihe cy’ibiruhuko, Abanyarwanda basura ibyiza nyaburanga biri mu gihugu birimo Ingoro Ndangamurage ziri mu Rwanda, Pariki z’Igihugu zirimo iya Nyungwe, iy’Ibirunga n’ahandi hatuma binjiza amafaranga menshi ku bukerarugendo, bikanazamura ubukungu bw’igihugu.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ibikorwa by’Abanyarwanda baba mu Mahanga muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Maziyateke Sandrine, yavuze ko mu mpera z’umwaka ushize Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga benshi basuye igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati “Nibyo koko mu mpera z’umwaka twagize abantu benshi baturutse muri Diaspora mu Burayi, Canada, Afurika n’ahandi.’’
Mu Nama y’Igihugu y’Umushyikirano handitswe abantu bagera kuri 377 bavuye mu mahanga.
Yakomeje ati “Ikindi kiza cyane ni uko nyuma bakomeza kugirana ibiganiro n’inzego zitandukanye mu gihugu. Uyu mwaka bahuye na Sena bayigezaho ibitekerezo n’ibyifuzo nk’Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga. Baganira n’izi nzego havamo n’imyanzuro itandukanye harimo gufatanya cyane mu kurwanya abahezanguni, abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bakomeje kwidegembya mu bihugu by’amahanga.’’
Aba Banyarwanda kandi banaganiriye na Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Biruta Vincent; uw’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Prof. Shyaka Anastase, ubuyobozi bw’Agaciro Development Fund; ubw’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubwiteganyirize (RSSB); Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) n’ubwa Minisiteri y’Ubutabera baganira ku ngingo zigarukwaho mu bikorwa byagutse nka za Rwanda Day.
Muri ibyo biganiro kandi hanazamo imikoranire ikwiye hagati y’Abanyarwanda b’imbere mu gihugu no hanze mu bijyanye n’ishoramari.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga banahuye n’itsinda riyobowe n’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Amb. Nduhungirehe Olivier, ryabasangije ku muco wo kuba Umunyafurika nyawe (Panafricanist). Ibi biganiro byavuyemo imyanzuro yo gushyigikira iyi gahunda no kuriganiriza abandi Banyafurika bari mu bihugu by’amahanga.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga basabye ko gahunda ya Ndi Umunyarwanda zarushaho kwimakazwa bijyanye n’igihe.
Maziyateke yanagarutse no ku biganiro byo gukangurira abana bato kumenya igihugu n’amateka yacyo mu bijyanye n’umuco n’ururimi rw’Ikinyarwanda, kubaha umwanya ku bitekerezo byabo, abana bakumva ko bafite igihugu cy’ababyeyi babo.
Guverineri w’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney, yabwiye IGIHE ko Abanyarwanda benshi bakunze kwakirwa mu biruhuko bisoza umwaka.
Ati “Mu mpera za 2019 Abanyarwanda baje ari benshi mu biruhuko, hari na gahunda iteganyijwe yo kubakira mu Majyaruguru ku bakiri mu Rwanda narabatumiye.’’
“Abo bose hari abaza nko mu Mushyikirano ariko bakazana n’imiryango yabo n’inshuti, bagasura ahantu hatandukanye, uko basura niko bazamura ubukungu kuko bishyura serivisi bahabwa, amahoteli babamo basura ahantu hatandukanye.’’
Gatabazi yavuze ko hari n’ibiganiro byabayeho bamwe bemera kuzajya batanga amasomo mu bigo by’amashuri atandukanye, abakora ubushakashatsi bakabisangiza amashuri y’u Rwanda nta kiguzi.
Yakomeje ati “Dufite n’amahirwe ko n’abanangiye kugaruka mu gihugu bohereza abana, abagore ku buryo bagenda bafunguka buhoro buhoro mu bikorwa byo kubaka igihugu. Aho usanga abatarabigeraho ni uko bafite ibibazo byihariye bibareba bya politiki.’’
Yashimye ko Abanyarwanda benshi bagaruka mu gihugu cyabo bazana ibitekerezo bishya kandi byiza bavanye mu mahanga bishyira itafari ryabo mu kucyubaka.

Title: Abanyarwanda baba muri Suède bahuriye mu rugendo rwo mu bwato rw’amasaha 23, barasabana
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Suède bahuriye mu bwato buva muri iki gihugu bwerekeza muri Finland buzwi nka Sila Line, ubwato bukundwa na ba mukerarugendo, aho bagenda batembera, bakidagadura ndetse bakanaruhuka mu rugendo rw’amasaha 23.
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Suède bahuriye mu bwato buva muri iki gihugu bwerekeza muri Finland buzwi nka Sila Line, ubwato bukundwa na ba mukerarugendo, aho bagenda batembera, bakidagadura ndetse bakanaruhuka mu rugendo rw’amasaha 23.
Ubwato buhagura saa moya zijoro bukazagaruka aho bwahagurukiye saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba z’undi munsi.
Iki gikorwa cyateguwe n’ubuyobozi bw’umuryango w’Abanyarwanda batuye muri Suède, kugira ngo bongere bahure bose umwaka utararangira, barebe ibyakozwe, aho bagifite intege nke bafashanye kuzongera ndetse basabane banifurizanye iminsi mikuru myiza ya Noheli n’ubunani.
 Uyobora umuryango w’Abanyarwanda batuye muri iki gihugu, Madamu Gloria Sebalu, yabwiye IGIHE ko icyo gikorwa cyitabiriwe bishimishije, avuga ko hatangiwe ibiganiro byiza bitandukanye.
Mu biganiro byatanzwe harimo ikigaruka ku gukunda igihugu bakomokamo, gusigasira umuco nyarwanda ndetse n’ururimi rw’Ikinyarwanda. Hanatanzwe ibiganiro binyuranye bigaragaza uko bashora imari mu gihugu ndetse n’ikiganiro kigisha uko bakwiteza imbere mu buryo bufatika mu gihugu barimo cy Suède.
Muri uru rugendo rw’ubwato kandi habayeho no gusabana banasangira amafunguro anyuranye ategurwa muri ubwo bwato .
Mu gusoza uyu mwaka kandi hateguwe umunsi w’ubusabane w’abana, wabereye ahitwa Leos Lekland, haba imikino itandukanye y’abana.
Umuryango w’abari n’abategarugori batuye muri Suède nibo bateguye iki gikorwa cy’ubusabane, akaba ari nabo bayoboye gahunda yo kwigisha ururimi n’umuco.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu bihugu bihugu byo mu Majyaruguru y’u Burayi, Nkulikiyinka Christine, aganiriza abana bari bitabiriye uwo munsi, yabasabye gukomeza kwiga ururimi rw’Ikinyarwanda asaba ababyeyi kujya bavugisha abana mu rugo mu Kinyarwanda, bityo bakabunganira ku byo baba bize.
Yagize ati “Umwana ntajye avuga Ikinyarwanda ari uko yagiye kukiga rimwe mu kwezi, ntibyaba bihagije ngo akimenye ababyeyi muramutse mutabunganiye.”
Yasabye abari bahari batajya muri iyo gahunda yo kwiga Ikinyarwanda no kubyina kinyarwanda ko bajya bitabira ndetse abasaba ko babwira abatari baje uwo munsi ibyiza byo kwiga ururimi rwacu no gusigasira umuco.
Abana bishimiye kuba barahuye uwo munsi bagakina, ariko kandi bavuga ko guhura biga Ikinyarwanda byatumye bamenyana baba inshuti, bituma bishimira cyane kwitabira ibikorwa bihuza Abanyarwanda no kumenya igihugu cyabo kurushaho.

Title: Kwibuka26: Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomera ku bumwe, barwanya abahakana Jenoside
Body:
Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomeza gusenyera umugozi umwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomeza gusenyera umugozi umwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Babisabwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 7 Mata 2020, ubwo Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa bifatanyaga n’Isi kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Umuhango wo kwibuka wahurije hamwe abanyarwanda basaga 550 baba mu Bushinwa hakoreshejwe uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Bushinwa, James Kimonyo mu ijambo rye , yasabye abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa kurangwa n’indangagaciro z’ubwitange zaranze ingabo za RPA, ubwo zahagarikaga Jenoside ziyobowe na Perezida Paul Kagame.
Ambasaderi Kimonyo yasabye abari bamukurikiye gukomeza kwimakaza ubumwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’ihakana ryayo.
Yasabye umuryango mpuzamahanga gufatanya n’u Rwanda mu kugeza imbere y’ubutabera abakidegembya bakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Muri uyu muhango wo kwibuka, humviswe ubuhamya bwa Ntezimana Jean Népomucène warokotse Jenoside kuri ubu wiga mu Bushinwa, wavuze ku rugendo rwe mbere, muri Jenoside na nyuma yayo.
Ntezimana uri kwiga ibijyanye n’ubuvuzi bw’imbere mu mubiri yashimiye ingabo za RPA zamurokoye na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yagaruriye icyizere abarokotse Jenoside, ibafasha mu kubaka ejo hazaza heza.

Title: Kwibuka26: Abanyarwanda baba mu Buyapani bibutse Jenoside, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro
Body:
Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda baba mu Buyapani bifatanyije mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro wo gukoresha ubumenyi rufite mu gufasha igihugu kujya imbere birinda icyagisubiza mu bihe by’icuraburindi.
Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda baba mu Buyapani bifatanyije mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro wo gukoresha ubumenyi rufite mu gufasha igihugu kujya imbere birinda icyagisubiza mu bihe by’icuraburindi.
Byatangajwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 7 Mata ubwo Abanyarwanda batuye mu Buyapani bifatanyaga n’Isi mu kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ubusanzwe ibikorwa byo Kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Buyapani byahurizaga hamwe abanyarwanda, inshuti z’u Rwanda n’abayobozi muri Guverinoma y’u Buyapani.
Uyu mwaka ibikorwa byo kwibuka biri gukorwa mu buryo bwihariye kubera ingamba zafashwe zo gukangurira abantu kuguma mu ngo zabo, hahashywa icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda i Tokyo yahisemo gukora ibikorwa byo kwibuka mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga (video conference).
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Buyapani, Ernest Rwamucyo mu ijambo yagejeje ku banyarwanda n’inshuti zarwo mu Buyapani yagarutse ku mateka mabi yagejeje u Rwanda kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yavuze ko kwibuka ari ngombwa “kuko biduha umwanya wo kwibuka abacu bambuwe ubuzima. Tuboneraho umwanya wo kwihanganisha abarokotse Jenoside n’ubu bagifite ibikomere byaba ibigaragara ku mubiri ndetse n’ibitagaragara.”
Rwamucyo yavuze ko kwibuka ari umwanya wo gusubiza agaciro n’icyubahiro abazize Jenoside bambuwe ubwo bicwaga urw’agashinyaguro.
Yavuze ko ari n’umwanya wo gukangurira abanyarwanda n’isi muri rusange kwirinda ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’ihakana n’ipfobya bya Jenoside.
Ati “Biduha umwanya wo gukangurira abanyarwanda, abatuye isi ndetse n’imiryango mpuzamahanga kuzirikana ububi bw’ingengabitecyerezo ya Jenoside, ingaruka mbi zo guhakana no gupfobya Jenoside ndetse no kubashishikariza kwamagana ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose ryaba irishingiye ku turere, amoko, amadini, cyangwa ibindi byose bishobora gutandukanya abantu.”
Mu myaka 26 ishize, u Rwanda rwagiye rwiyubaka haba mu mibereho y’abaturage n’iterambere muri rusange.
Ambasaderi Rwamucyo yashimye umuhate w’ingabo zari iza RPA zahagaritse Jenoside, igihugu kikabona umusingi wo kubakiraho kigana imbere, ubu kikaba gikataje mu bumwe n’ubwiyunge bw’abanyarwanda, ukwisanzura kwa buri munyarwanda, umutekano n’imiyoborere myiza.
Yashishikarije urubyiruko gutanga umusanzu warwo mu gukomeza kubaka igihugu.
Ati “Mwebwe rubyiruko rwacu, mboneyeho umwanya wo kubakangurira gukunda igihugu cyababyaye. Kwitangira kubaka amateka meza mushyigikira umurongo wa politike nziza yubaka igihugu cyacu.”
“By’umwihariko mwebwe muri hano nk’urubyiruko rufite ubumenyi bwihariye n’imyumvire igomba kuba ihanitse murasabwa byinshi.”
Ambasaderi Rwamucyo yanasabye abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda gukomeza gufata mu mugongo abarokotse Jenoside muri ibi bihe bikomeye.
Ibikorwa byo kwibuka Jenoside bizakomeza muri iki Cyumweru cyo kwibuka mu bihugu birimo Abanyarwanda barebererwa na Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buyapani. Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 8 Mata hazibuka Abanyarwanda baba muri Philippines naho kuwa Gatanu tariki 10 hibuke abanyarwanda baba muri Malaysia.

Title: Rwandacash Africash yakoze impinduka muri serivisi zo kohererezanya amafaranga
Body:
Ubukana bwa COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus bwatumye ibigo birimo ibifasha abantu mu kohererezanya amafaranga, imwe muri serivisi zikoreshwa cyane muri iyi minsi, bihindura imikorere.
Ubukana bwa COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus bwatumye ibigo birimo ibifasha abantu mu kohererezanya amafaranga, imwe muri serivisi zikoreshwa cyane muri iyi minsi, bihindura imikorere.
Sosiyete itanga serivisi ku bohereza amafaranga mu Rwanda no mu mahanga ya Rwanda Cash LTD yagaragaje ko yakomeje gukora ariko yifashishije uburyo bugezweho kandi bwizewe bwo guhererekanya amafaranga bwa mobile money.
Mu Bubiligi, ibiro byose bya Moneytrans-Africash zikorana na Rwandacash LTD byahawe uburenganzira bwo gufungura no kwakira abantu hakurikijwe ingamba zatanzwe n’inzego zibishinzwe.
Naho mu Rwanda, Rwandacash LTD yabaye ifunze nkuko amabwiriza yatanzwe na Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu (BNR) abisaba kugeza ubwo hazatangwa andi avuga ku kongera gukora kw’ibigo byohererezanya amafaranga no kuvunja.
Bitewe n’amasezerano iyi sosiyete isanzwe ifitanye na MTN Rwanda binyuze muri Mobile Money, abakiliya bose bakira amafaranga mu Rwanda bayashyirirwa kuri Mobile Money gusa.
Itangazo ryayo yavuze ko “Hari n’ahongerewe imbaraga mu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga ku bohererezanya amafaranga kuri application ya https://www.moneytrans.eu/belgium/imoneytrans/.’’
Yanamenyesheje ko ishami rya Matonge i Kinshasa muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo rizafungura nihamara kugaruka agahenge nyuma y’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Abashaka kohererezanya amafaranga bifashishije Rwanda Cash-Africash-Moneytrans bashyiriweho imirongo ya telefoni bashobora kubazaho andi makuru zirimo +32 2 227 18 20 ku bari mu Bubiligi na +250 788 35 87 87 ku bo mu Rwanda.
Ikwirakwira cya Coronavirus mu mpande zose z’Isi ryahinduye imibereho ya muntu kugeza no ku ikoranabuhanga yifashisha mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Ubu imibereho y’Isi yubakiye ku bukungu bushingiye ku kudahererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) ryemeje ku wa 11 Werurwe 2020 ko Coronavirus ari icyorezo cyugarije Isi bitewe n’uburyo umubare w’abayandura wiyongera kuva yaboneka mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019.
Coronavirus imaze guhitana abantu 45 334, mu gihe abayanduye bagera ku 903 799, muri bo 190 675 barayikize.

Title: Diaspora mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus: Icyifuzo cy’Umunyarwanda uba muri Canada
Body:
John B. Kijuli uba muri Canada yatanze icyifuzo cy’uko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora, bakwishyira hamwe bagakusanya inkunga yo kugoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu Rwanda cyane cyane abazasonza kuko batabashije kujya mu kazi kabatunze.
John B. Kijuli uba muri Canada yatanze icyifuzo cy’uko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora, bakwishyira hamwe bagakusanya inkunga yo kugoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu Rwanda cyane cyane abazasonza kuko batabashije kujya mu kazi kabatunze.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda abagera kuri 19 ni bo bimaze kwemezwa ko banduye icyorezo cya COVID-19, giterwa na Coronavirus. Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yafashe ingamba nyinshi, aho kuri uyu wa Gatandatu yashyizeho izindi nshya.
Ingamba nshya zo kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus zatangajwe na Minisitiri w’Intebe, Dr Ngirente Edouard, zategetse ko abakozi ba leta bose n’abikorera basabwa gukorera akazi mu ngo zabo keretse abatanga serivisi z’ingenzi.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Kijuli yavuze ko izi ngamba ari ingenzi cyane kandi zizatanga umusaruro, akifuza ko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora bahabwa igisa nk’impuruza bakwishyira hamwe bakazagoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka n’izi ngamba cyane cyane abaryaga kuko bakoze uwo munsi ‘nyakabyizi’.
Ati “Nkaba numva mfite igitekerezo cy’uko Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga yakorana vuba na za ambasade zacu aho ziri hose zigashishikariza Abanyarwanda twese dutuye muri bino bihugu [nubwo nabo icyorezo cyabagezeho], bisa n’aho bifite amikoro tukibumbira hamwe tugafasha abavandimwe bacu bazahura n’ikibazo cy’inzara.”
Akomeza avuga ko abantu bagenda batanga nk’amadolari 100$, 50$, 10$ gukomeza ariko icyo kintu cyo ‘gutabara abavandimwe bacu kuko twese tuzi amikoro y’ibihugu byacu byo muri Afurika’.
Kijuli wigeze kuba Perezida wa Diaspora muri Edmonton na Visi Perezida ku rwego rw’Intara ya Canada, ahumuriza Abanyarwanda agira ati “Tukaba tugira ngo tubakomeze ngo mushikame kandi nta kabuza iki cyorezo abanyarwanda tuzagitsinda.”
Mu zindi ngamba Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yafashe zirimo ko ‘ubu imipaka yose irafunze, keretse ku Banyarwanda bataha n’abandi batuye mu Rwanda byemewe n’amategeko, abo bose bakaba bazashyirwa mu kato mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri ahantu hateganyijwe’.
‘Ubwikorezi bw’ibicuruzwa byinjira cyangwa bisohoka mu Rwanda burakomeza mu gihe ingendo hagati y’imijyi n’uturere tw’igihugu zitemewe keretse ku bajya kwivuza cyangwa abafite impamvu zihutirwa’.
Nyuma y’izi ngamba, Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Prof. Shyaka Anastase, yagarutse ku bantu barya kuko bakoze uwo munsi, abasaba gutekereza icyaba baramutse bagiye gushaka ayo mafaranga ariko ntibazabashe kuyabona kubera uburwayi; ahubwo abasaba gusaranganya na bagenzi babo muri bike bafite.
Minisitiri Prof Shyaka yatangaje ko Leta igiye kwishakamo ibisubizo bizafasha abantu barya ari uko bakoze ku munsi n’abandi bafite amikoro make kugira ngo mu gihe cyo kwirinda Coronavirus batazicwa n’inzara.
Ati "Hari ibizasaba nk’igihugu ko abantu baba magirirane, niba hari urugo runaka rudafite icyo gusamura, tugomba kwishakamo ubushobozi ku buryo urwo rugo turwunganira kugira ngo abarurimo tutabarinda Coronavirus ariko bakicwa n’inzara.’’
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo kugira umuriro, ibicurane, umunaniro n’inkorora ijyana no kubabara mu mihogo, guhumeka nabi bishobora no kugera aho itera umusonga no kubuza impyiko gukora bishobora gutera urupfu. Iyi ndwara ishobora kwandura binyuze mu gukora ku muntu uyirwaye, cyane cyane mu kuramukanya abantu bahana ibiganza.

Title: Abanyarwanda batuye i Burayi bahagaritse ibikorwa bibahuza mu kwirinda Coronavirus
Body:
Coronavirus ihangayikishije Isi! Abahanga mu by’ubuvuzi bari kurara amajoro bashaka urukingo n’umuti wo guhangana n’iki cyorezo gikomeje gukwirakwira Isi buri kanya.
Coronavirus ihangayikishije Isi! Abahanga mu by’ubuvuzi bari kurara amajoro bashaka urukingo n’umuti wo guhangana n’iki cyorezo gikomeje gukwirakwira Isi buri kanya.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) ryemeje ko Coronavirus ari icyorezo [pandémie] cyugarije Isi mu itangazo ryashyize hanze ku wa 11 Werurwe 2020.
Coronavirus imaze gukwirakwira mu bihugu 123 bitandukanye ndetse kugeza ubu abarenga 125 000 barayanduye mu gihe abasaga 5000 yabahitanye. Ibi byatumye mu bihugu bitandukanye hashyirwaho ingamba zo kwirinda Coronavirus yagaragaye bwa mbere mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019.
Ingamba zafashwe mu bihugu byinshi zirimo guhagarika ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi nk’imikino, ibitaramo, inama ndetse bimwe byafunze amashuri mato na za kaminuza kugeza igihe kitaramenyekana, amaduka nk’uburyo bwo gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
U Butaliyani ku wa 12 Werurwe 2020, bwafunze amaduka yose uretse ububiko bw’ibiribwa na za farumasi, nk’uburyo bwo gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Iki gihugu cyafunze amashuri, inzu zikorerwamo siporo, inzu ndangamateka n’utubyiniro mu gihe na Shampiyona y’igihugu mu mupira w’amaguru [Serie A] nayo yahagaritswe. Abantu barenga ibihumbi 12 ni bo bamaze kwandura Coronavirus mu Butaliyani, naho abagera kuri 830 yarabahitanye.
Ibihugu by’i Burayi biri mu byugarijwe na Coronavirus yagize ingaruka ku bikorwa byari biteganyijwe, birimo n’iby’Abanyarwanda.
Guhera mu ntangiriro za Werurwe 2020 hirya no hino mu Burayi hari hateganyijwe ibikorwa bitandukanye bisanzwe bihuza Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo buri mwaka.
Ibyo bikorwa bigizwe n’amahuriro atandukanye, inama zari ziteganyijwe ku bava mu Rwanda bazikorera hirya no hino ku Isi, amamurikagurisha y’ubukerarugendo n’ingendo zari ziteganyijwe bijyanye n’ibirori bibera muri Diaspora n’ibindi.
Ingamba zafashwe n’ibihugu by’i Burayi zinubahirizwa n’Abanyarwanda babibamo ndetse na bo mu kwirinda barabihagarika mu gukaza ubwirinzi.
Mu bikorwa byasubitswe byagombaga guhuza Abanyarwanda birimo iby’Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Abagore ku Isi [ni igikorwa cyitabirwa cyane ko kigaragaza intambwe y’u Rwanda mu gusubiza umugore agaciro no kumwubakiraho iterambere ry’igihugu].
Kugeza magingo aya, Abanyarwanda baba mu Butaliyani, u Bufaransa, u Bubiligi, Budage, u Buholandi n’ibihugu byo muri Scandinavie byasubitse ibyo birori.
Mu gihe u Rwanda rwitegura kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26, Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ntibiramenyekana uko bizakorwa mu gihe iki cyorezo cyaba kigifite ubukana. Abahagarariye imiryango irengera inyungu z’abarokotse Jenoside baracyarebera hamwe uko iki gihe bizagenda.
Guverinoma y’u Bubiligi nayo yaraye iteranye ifata ibyemezo bikakaye aho amashuri abanza, ayisumbuye na za Kaminuza byafunzwe.
Kuva kuri uyu wa Gatanu kandi ahahurira abantu benshi hafunzwe usibye gusa amaduka yo guhahiramo azakomeza gufungura ndetse ibihumbi by’abaturage byazindutse bijya guhaha ku buryo hanitabajwe abashinzwe umutekano mu kuborohereza.
Uretse imiryango y’Abanyarwanda batuye mu mahanga yagizweho ingaruka zikomeye zo gusubika ibikorwa byayo, Coronavirus yanazahaje ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo kubera ihagarikwa ry’ingendo.
Isuzuma ry’Ishyirahamwe Mpuzamahanga rishinzwe gutwara abantu n’ibintu mu Kirere, IATA, ryerekanye ko ibigo mpuzamahanga bitwara abagenzi mu ndege bizahomba miliyari $113 Coronavirus nikomeza gukwirakwira.
Abaganga bagaragaza ko nubwo Coronavirus ari indwara ikomeye, ishobora kwirindwa byoroshye ariko ikanakwirakwira byoroshye. Gukaraba intoki no guhagarika kuramukanya byafasha mu kwirinda.
Umuganga Dr Soentens waganiriye na IGIHE yavuze ko umubare munini w’abarwaye Coronavirus bakira ndetse ko abapfa babiterwa nuko ibikoresho byo kubaramira biba bike, bageze mu zabukuru cyangwa basanganywe izindi ndwara zikomeye zidakira.
Kugira ngo umuntu yandure Coronavirus ni uko uyifite ayiha undi mu buryo bw’amatembabuzi ava mu mazuru cyangwa mu kanwa k’uyirwaye, kuko yandurira mu myanya y’ubuhumekero nubwo ishobora guca n’ahandi. Ni nayo mpamvu umuntu wayanduye ahita ahabwa akato.
Iyo iyi virusi imaze kugera mu bihaha niho itura, ari nayo mpamvu ibuza abantu guhumeka neza bakarwara umusonga, ari nawo ubahitana.
