Title: Visit Rwanda yamuritswe mu imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs 2020 mu Buholandi (Amafoto)
Body:
U Rwanda rwamurikiye abitabiriye imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs 2020 riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Utrecht mu Buholandi, amahirwe y’ubukerarugendo ari mu gihugu binyuze muri gahunda ya ‘Visit Rwanda’.
U Rwanda rwamurikiye abitabiriye imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs 2020 riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Utrecht mu Buholandi, amahirwe y’ubukerarugendo ari mu gihugu binyuze muri gahunda ya ‘Visit Rwanda’.
Imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs riteganyijwe ku wa 16-19 Mutarama 2020. Ryitabirwa n’ibigo bikomeye by’ubukerarugendo ku Mugabane w’u Burayi n’Isi muri rusange.
Muri ‘Visit Rwanda’, abahagarariye ibigo byo mu Rwanda beretse bagenzi babo bo mu Buholandi amahirwe ari mu bukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda n’uko yabyazwa umusaruro.
Mu imurikagurisha rya The Vakantiebeurs, u Rwanda ruhagarariwe n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, Sosiyete Nyarwanda y’Ubwikorezi bwo mu Kirere, RwandAir, Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi n’ibigo by’ubukerarugendo birimo Heritage Safaris, Amahoro Tours, Palast Tours and Travel na Wildlife Tours-Rwanda.
Abayobozi baryitabiriye barimo Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Buholandi, Karabaranga Jean Pierre; Umuyobozi muri RDB Ushinzwe kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo, Mutesi Linda na Ildephonse Kambogo ushinzwe ibijyanye n’Ubusesenguzi mu by’Ubukerarugendo.
The Vakantiebeurs izamara iminsi ine, ihuza abahanga mu by’ubukerarugendo, harebwa n’uko bakorana. Ni imurika ritegerejwemo abashyitsi 50,000 mu gihe abazamurika basaga 200. Ifatwa nk’amahirwe ku bukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda bwo gukorana n’ubw’u Buholandi n’andi masoko akomeye yabufasha gutera imbere.
Umuyobozi uhagarariye Visit Rwanda mu Buholandi, Harry Betist, yavuze ko “Ni umwanya mwiza wo guhura n’abafatanyabikorwa bacu no kwishimira intambwe ubukerarugendo bumaze gutera no kureba uko itasubira inyuma.’’
Usibye ibizabera muri The Vakantiebeurs, hanateganyijwe igikorwa cyiswe B2B, aho abaserukiye ibigo bitwara abakerarugendo mu Rwanda bazahura n’ibigo binini byo mu Buholandi bicuruza ubukerarugendo. Iki gikorwa giteganyijwe kubera i LaHaye ku wa 20 Mutarama 2020, cyateguwe na Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi cyitezwemo Abaholandi bagera kuri 35.
Abanyarwanda bazacyitabira barimo; Sifa Uwera wo muri Heritage Safaris, Greg Bakunzi wo mu Amahoro Tours, Aimable Rutagarama wo muri Palast Tours, David Mugisha wo muri Wildlife Tours and Travels na RwandAir.
Kuri ubu isoko ryo mu Buholandi riza mu myanya umunani ya mbere, mu kugira abakerarugendo benshi bakorana n’u Rwanda. Abarusura biyongereyeho 11.9 %, bavuye ku 4918 mu 2017 bagera kuri 5501 mu 2018.
Ibi bikorwa by’imurikagurisha rigamije kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda byiyongera ku bikorwa bikomeye mu kubumenyekanisha birimo amasezerano rwasinye n’amakipe ya Arsenal na Paris St Germain ndetse na Filime ya Rwanda: The Royal Tour.
Imibare yo mu Ukuboza yerekana ko Abanyarwanda 142000 bafite akazi mu bukerarugendo, bageze kuri uwo mubare bavuye ku 90000 bariho mu 2017.
Guverinoma yihaye intego ko mu 2024 inyungu u Rwanda ruvana mu bukerarugendo izagera kuri miliyoni $800 zivuye kuri miliyoni $404 yinjiye mu 2017.

Title: Larousse yemeye gukosora inyandiko yanenzwe gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
Body:
Umwunganizi w’Ihuriro ry’Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa (Communauté Rwandaise de France, CRF), Me Gisagara Richard, yavuze ko ubuyobozi bw’inzu y’ubwanditsi ikomeye mu Bufaransa, Éditions Larousse, bwemeye gukosora imvugo bwakoresheje mu nkoranyamagambo yabwo, ko mu Rwanda habaye intambara hagati y’amoko.
Umwunganizi w’Ihuriro ry’Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa (Communauté Rwandaise de France, CRF), Me Gisagara Richard, yavuze ko ubuyobozi bw’inzu y’ubwanditsi ikomeye mu Bufaransa, Éditions Larousse, bwemeye gukosora imvugo bwakoresheje mu nkoranyamagambo yabwo, ko mu Rwanda habaye intambara hagati y’amoko.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Me Gisagara yavuze ko mu gisubizo bamuhaye ku ibaruwa yabandikiye, ubuyobozi bwa Larousse “bwiyemeje ko bugiye guhindura ibyanditswe muri iki gitabo kigenewe urubyiruko noneho bugakoresha ijambo nyir’izina, ‘jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi’ mu gitabo kindi kigiye gusohoka.”
Imvugo yanenzwe bikomeye yakoreshejwe mu nkoranyamagambo ya Larousse Junior. Iyo nyandiko y’umwaka wa 2020, aho iyo abanditsi iyo igeze ku Rwanda, basobanura ingano yarwo, umurwa mukuru, abaturage n’aho ruherereye, ariko hasi bakagira bati “icyo gihugu kimwe n’u Burundi, cyashegeshwe n’intambara hagati y’ibice bibiri by’abaturage bakigize, Abahutu n’Abatutsi.”
Me Gisagara avuga ko nubwo yishimiye icyo cyemezo cya Larousse cyo guhindura imvugo, atanyuzwe na gato n’ibisobanuro ubuyobozi bwatanze, ko bwahisemo kudakoresha ijambo jenoside, “Ngo kuko ari igitabo kigenewe abana b’imyaka irindwi kugera ku 11,” bityo ngo ntibabasha kumva neza Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Me Gisagara yakomeje ati “Mu kinyarwanda bavuga ko umwana apfa mu iterura. Ntabwo rero watangira umubwira ibinyoma ngo wizere ko uzabihindura amaze gukura.”
Yavuze ko agiye kungurana ibitekerezo n’abayobozi ba CRF ngo barebe niba bemera ibyo bisobanuro bya Larousse cyangwa niba bafata izindi ngamba, cyane cyane ko indi nkoranyamagambo nshya ya Larousse ishobora gusohoka mu mwaka utaha.
Byaba bivuze ko abana bose bazaba basoma iyo iri kugurishwa, bagakomeza guhabwa “izi nyigisho zinyuranye n’ukuri. Ni ibintu bibabje bigomba kwamaganwa.”
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Komisiyo y’Igihugu yo Kurwanya Jenoside, CNLG, Dr Bizimana Jean Damascène, aheruka kuvuga ko mu Bufaransa atari ubwa mbere ibikorwa byo gupfobya jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bikorwa n’abantu ku giti cyabo, bityo uburyo bazemera gukosora ibyo bakoze bizagaragaza icyemezo cya nyuma kizafatwa.
Ati "Nibakomeza gutsimbarara kuri iyo nyito [bazajyanwa mu nkiko] kuko mu Bufaransa bwose itegeko rihari ryemera ko umuntu ku giti cye, umuryango, ishyirahamwe ndetse n’urundi rwego rwose, rushobora gutanga ikirego rushingiye ku gihari.”
Mu mpera z’umwaka ushize wa 2019, umwanditsi Charles Onana ukomoka muri Cameroun, nawe yarezwe mu butabera bwo mu Bufaransa n’ishyirahamwe ry’Abanyarwanda baba muri icyo gihugu, kubera ibikorwa bye byo guhakana n’ipfobya rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Inkuru wasoma: Larousse ishobora kujyanwa mu nkiko izira gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi

Title: Umuhanzi Weya Viatora yatumiwe mu Bubiligi mu iserukiramuco mpuzamahanga
Body:
Umuhanzi Weya Marie Viatora yatumiwe mu iserukiramuco rizwi nka Congolisation rizahuriza mu Bubiligi abahanzi batandukanye hagamijwe gusangizanya ubunararibonye ku iterambere ry’umuziki.
Umuhanzi Weya Marie Viatora yatumiwe mu iserukiramuco rizwi nka Congolisation rizahuriza mu Bubiligi abahanzi batandukanye hagamijwe gusangizanya ubunararibonye ku iterambere ry’umuziki.
Iri serukiramuco ry’umuco mpuzamahanga rizabera mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles ahitwa KVS, Théâtre Royal Flamand tariki ya 16 Mutarama 2020 guhera saa mbiri z’umugoroba mu gikorwa cy’umukino wiswe ‘‘Révolution rap-une histoire Africaine’’.
Weya azanitabira ibirori by’isozwa rya Congolisation Festival biteganyijwe ku wa 18 Mutarama 2020.
Uyu muhanzi w’imyaka 23 amaze kumenyekana mu ruhando rw’abanyamuziki bafite impano mu Rwanda no mu mahanga.
Yatumiwe muri Congolisation Festival bigizwemo uruhare n’Ikigo Rwanda Arts initiative (RAI) cyashinzwe na Dorcy Rugamba wiyemeje gufasha abahanzi b’Ababanyarwanda gukora ubuhanzi bw’umwuga bukanabatunga, gifatanyije na Théâtre KVS.
Rugamba yabwiye IGIHE ko bahisemo gutumira Weya mu gufasha umuziki we kuzamuka biruseho.
Yagize ati “Twatumiye Weya kugira ngo aze yimenyereze akorane n’abahanzi b’umwuga afungure amaso, amenyere. Ibi biri muri gahunda ya Rwanda Arts Initiative aho dufata umuhanzi tukamushakira uburyo bwo kwihugura ku rwego ahura n’abandi kandi ahantu hazwi nk’aha muri KVS. Théâtre Royal Flamand ni ahantu hazamuha isura yo ku rwego twifuza na we yifuza kugeraho, azahahurira n’abahanzi bakomeye, azabona ibikoresho n’imikorere yo ku rwego rw’umwuga maze bimubere impamba mu minsi iri imbere.’’
Yakomeje agira ati “Umuhanzi tuzanye kandi ahabwa naho akorera twakwita ko yiherera akiha gahunda akiga gukora no gukoresha igihe cyose afite mu guhanga ari wenyine ibindi yabisize ku ruhande.’’
Rugamba yakomeje avuga ko bifuza ko Abanyarwanda nka Weya indirimbo zabo mu minsi iri imbere bifuza kuzibona no mu nzu zikomeye z’ubucuruzi bw’ibihangano ku rwego mpuzamahanga nka Fnac mu Burayi kandi zikinjiza amafaranga yatunga abahanzi.
Ubu bufasha buhabwa abahanzi b’ingeri zitandukanye barimo abandika, abaririmba, abakina filimi cyangwa amakinamico n’ibindi.
Rugamba yasabye Abanyarwanda kuzajya gushyigikira Weya no kumuremamo icyizere cyo kuvamo umuhanzikazi ukomeye.
Weya mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE yavuze ko yishimiye kuba yaratoranyijwe mu bahanzi bazitabira iserukiramuco rizabera mu Bubiligi.
Ati “Tuzahura n’abandi bahanzi turebe icyo twabigiraho, tuzahuza ubwo bunararibonye turebe icyo twakora kinini mu buryo bwagutse.’’
Iserukiramuco rya Congolisation rizwi nka Festival Afro-Diaspo-Arts riberamo ibikorwa bitandukanye birimo amamurika, imbyino, amakinamico, umuziki, filime n’inama zagutse. Ni ku nshuro ya gatanu rigiye kuba.
Weya azanafashwa gutunganya album ye ya kabiri abifashijwemo na studio zikomeye mu Bubiligi zirimo iya Sunny Side Inc iyoborwa na Nicolas Lefèvre na Bionix ya Christian Dessart afatanyije na Rachid Mir zifitanye imikoranire na Rwanda Arts Initiative.
Muri uwo mushinga aranateganya no gukorana indirimbo n’umuhanzi Gaël Faye, bahuye ubwo uyu muhanzi yamurikaga igitabo cye yise “Le Petit Pays.’’
Weya yavukiye mu Mujyi wa Kigali ku wa 9 Nyakanga 1996 mu Murwa Mukuru wa Kigali. Yatangiye kwiyumvamo impano yo kuririmba ari umwana muto w’imyaka ine.
Ati “Kuva ndi umwana muto nakundaga kuririmba, aho menyeye ubwenge nisanze ndirimba naba mbabaye naba nishimye; mbese uyu ni umuhamagaro kuri jye numva nta kintu nabisimbuza kuko ni ubuzima bwanjye.’’
Weya Viatora yanditse indirimbo ye ya mbere ageze mu mwaka wa kane w’amashuri abanza, asoje ayisumbuye ajya muri studio akora indirimbo ya mbere yitwa ‘Empty House’.
Iyi ndirimbo yanyujijwe no ku Ijwi rya Amerika ndetse ituma ahabwa ikiganiro cyanyuze muri CNN.
Uyu muhanzikazi yashyize hanze indirimbo zirimo "Intimba", "Eyes Open Dreaming", "Miracles", "Uwo ndiwe", "Heritage" na "Name is woman". Yanahawe ibihembo bitandukanye mu 2014 na 2016 birimo icya High School Idol n’icya Youth Award.
Weya afite album imwe yasohoye mu 2018, yayikoranyeho n’aba-producers barimo Khrisau, Danny Beats, Jay P na Dr Nganji usanzwe ukorera Green Ferry Music ibarizwamo abasore bakora injyana na Kinyatrap yazamuwe cyane na Bushali.
Imwe mu ndirimbo yaririmbyemo ikamamara cyane ni iyitwa ‘‘Icumu n’Ingabo” yahuriyemo na Prime na Icenova bo muri Green Ferry. Yanakoranye n’abahanzi barimo Mani Martin, Butera Knowless, Peace Jolis, Patrick Nyamitali, Carole Karemera, Samuel Kamanzi, Michael Sengazi n’abandi.

Title: Itsinda ry’Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga basuye Intara y’Amajyaruguru
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku isi bakiriwe n’ubuyobozi bw’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, baraganira baranasabana.
Abanyarwanda batuye mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku isi bakiriwe n’ubuyobozi bw’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, baraganira baranasabana.
Kuwa Gatanu tariki ya 10 Mutarama 2020, nibwo Guverineri w’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney yakiriye Itsinda rya Diaspora Nyarwanda rigizwe n’abantu barenga 30 baba mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku Isi.
 Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE Guverineri Gatabazi yavuze ko kwakira abo banyarwanda ari mu rwego rwo kubereka iyo Ntara, bakamenya n’ibyiza bitatse igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati “Birimo n’inyungu ku mpande zombie kuko bamenya igihugu cyabo n’ibyiza bigitatse, bakaruhuka mu mutwe kuko abenshi baba bamaze igihe bakora aho muri ibyo bihugu bataruhuka. Natwe batubera abavugizi mu nshuti zabo, imiryango yabo bazanye nayo mu modoka, barara mu mahoteli bagasiga bazamuye akarere mu bukungu, ni bintu byiza cyane tuzakomeza.”
Gatabazi yavuze ko banaganiriye ku mahirwe atandukanye ari mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru ashobora gushorwamo imari, akabyazwa umusaruro.
 Guverineri Gatabazi yanabasabye gukomeza gushyira imbaraga mu kwegera urubyiruko no kugerageza kubohora abana bo mu miryango yinangiye idashaka guhinduka, bakava i buzimu bakajya ibuntu.
Yongeye kubasaba gukomeza urukundo bafitiye Igihugu cy’u Rwanda no gukomeza guharanira icyateza imbere umuturage mugenzi wabo, bitabira gushora imari mu bikorwa bitandukanye birimo ubuhinzi, ubukerarugendo, amahoteli, uburezi, ikoranabuhanga n’ibindi.
Yabashimiye uburyo bagiye bategura za Rwanda Days bashyizemo imbaraga bigatuma Perezida Paul Kagame ahacana umucyo, abasaba gukomeza guharanira ko umunyarwanda aho ari hose yarangwa n’imyitwarire myiza, imigenzereze n’imibanire ihesha agaciro Igihugu bityo bikazakomeza gutuma amahanga yose yifuza kuza mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi w’ungirije Perezida w’ishyirahamwe ry’Abanyarwanda batuye mu Mahanga RDGN (Rwandan Diaspora Global Netwerk), Thomas Ntagozera yavuze ko nubwo baba mu mahanga, umutima wabo uhora mu Rwanda.
Ati “Tuba mu mahanga ariko umutima wacu uba mu Rwanda. Turashimira Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga uko yadushyiriyeho urwego rutugenewe by’umwihariko rukamenya amakuru yacu. Uko tuje twakirwa neza, tugasobanurirwa ibyo twifuza kumenya.”
Yashimiye ubuyobozi bw’Intara y’Amajyaruguru uburyo bakirwa dore ko bamaze kuyisura inshuro eshatu.
Abo banyarwanda mu gihe bamaze bari mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru, basuye ishuri rya Gisirikare rya Nyakinama, basuye Ishuri rikuru ry’Imyuga n’Ubyumenyingiro rya Musanze banareba n’ibindi bikorwa by’iterambere muri iyo Ntara.

Title: Bahinduye umuvuno! Uko Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bisanga mu gihugu cyabibarutse
Body:
Mu mpera za buri mwaka iyo witegereje cyane usanga ingendo nyinshi zikorwa ari iz’abantu basubira iwabo kuhasura, bakifatanya n’imiryango kwishimira Noheli n’Ubunani.
Mu mpera za buri mwaka iyo witegereje cyane usanga ingendo nyinshi zikorwa ari iz’abantu basubira iwabo kuhasura, bakifatanya n’imiryango kwishimira Noheli n’Ubunani.
Iyo witegereje umwaka wa 2019 ingendo zakozwe n’Abanyarwanda bagana mu biruhuko bya Noheli n’ibisoza umwaka bavuye mu Bubiligi no mu bindi bihugu by’u Burayi ubona ko bidasanzwe, abenshi bahisemo kubikorera mu Rwanda.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bahageze mu buryo butandukanye mu mpande zose z’Isi! Hari abahageze kera kubera amateka u Rwanda rwaciyemo mu bihe bitandukanye guhera 1959 na nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Muri ubwo buzima usanga hari urubyiruko rwahavukiye cyangwa rwahakuriye, hakaba n’abajyayo bagiye kwiga.
Nyuma y’imyaka 26 Jenoside ihagaritswe usanga u Rwanda n’Abanyarwanda barahinduye imyumvire. Kuri ubu abenshi bishimira kwitwa Abanyarwanda, nk’ikintu bose bahuriyeho.
Nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi benshi bari barahinduye imvugo ingendo n’indimi, batifuza kwitwa Abanyarwanda cyangwa kwitirirwa u Rwanda kubera amahano igihugu cyari kivuyemo.
Buhoro buhoro, ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda bwahinduye imyumvire n’imitekerereze kugeza ubwo buri wese yifuje kwitirirwa rwa Rwanda kubera isura nziza rufite ugereranyije naho rwavuye, mu icuraburindi, imiborogo n’amaraso yamenetse.
Ubu Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bazirikana igihugu cyabibarutse, ntibikandagira mu gihe bashaka kugaruka mu gihugu cyababyaye no gutanga umusanzu wabo mu kubaka igihugu.
Mu biborohereza mu ngendo harimo no kuba Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubwikorezi bw’Indege, RwandAir, gikorera ingendo mu bice bitandukanye by’Isi mu byerekezo 28 bitandukanye.
Kuva mu ntangiriro za 2019, RwandAir yatangije ingendo zerekeza i Addis Ababa muri Ethiopie; i Kinshasa muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, i Guangzhou mu Bushinwa n’i Tel Aviv muri Israel.
IGIHE yegereye abayobozi batandukanye mu gihugu, bayisangiza uko bakiriye kuba Abanyarwanda bagaruka mu gihugu cyabo kandi bishimye.
Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kigali, Rubingisa Pudence, yavuze ko mu bikorwa by’Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bagaragaza urukundo rw’igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati “Buri muntu ubona uko u Rwanda rwihuta mu iterambere ari mu mahanga aba ashaka gushyiraho umuganda we, ikindi umuntu yashima ni ubukangurambaga bukorwa na za Ambasade z’u Rwanda hirya no hino ku Isi, aho n’imiryango y’Abanyarwanda itanga uburyo bwo guhanahana amakuru muri za Diaspora.’’
Yakomeje ati “Iyo bageze mu Rwanda basanga harashyizweho uburyo bwo kwakirwa bwihariye muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga n’Ubutwererane, n’ahandi bagiye hose usanga bakirwa neza kandi byihuse n’ubwo usanga hari serivisi zimwe zigomba kunozwa nabo ubwabo bakabyivugira kugira ngo bikosorwe.’’
Rubingisa yanavuze ko iyo Abanyarwanda basanze iterambere ry’igihugu bibaha umurava wo kukigarukamo kenshi.
Ati “Ibi kandi noneho si abo mu mahanga bibaho gusa kuko n’Abanyarwanda baturuka mu zindi ntara usanga baza bagahaha ubumenyi bakanakopera ibyiza bikorerwa mu Murwa Mukuru wa Kigali bakabijyana mu turere batuyemo.’’
“Mu baturuka mu mahanga, abo tuganira banifuza kuza gusangira ubumenyi mu byo bafitemo ubunararibonye bize cyangwa bakoramo bikaba ari ibintu byo kwishimira.’’
Mu gihe cy’ibiruhuko, Abanyarwanda basura ibyiza nyaburanga biri mu gihugu birimo Ingoro Ndangamurage ziri mu Rwanda, Pariki z’Igihugu zirimo iya Nyungwe, iy’Ibirunga n’ahandi hatuma binjiza amafaranga menshi ku bukerarugendo, bikanazamura ubukungu bw’igihugu.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ibikorwa by’Abanyarwanda baba mu Mahanga muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Maziyateke Sandrine, yavuze ko mu mpera z’umwaka ushize Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga benshi basuye igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati “Nibyo koko mu mpera z’umwaka twagize abantu benshi baturutse muri Diaspora mu Burayi, Canada, Afurika n’ahandi.’’
Mu Nama y’Igihugu y’Umushyikirano handitswe abantu bagera kuri 377 bavuye mu mahanga.
Yakomeje ati “Ikindi kiza cyane ni uko nyuma bakomeza kugirana ibiganiro n’inzego zitandukanye mu gihugu. Uyu mwaka bahuye na Sena bayigezaho ibitekerezo n’ibyifuzo nk’Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga. Baganira n’izi nzego havamo n’imyanzuro itandukanye harimo gufatanya cyane mu kurwanya abahezanguni, abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bakomeje kwidegembya mu bihugu by’amahanga.’’
Aba Banyarwanda kandi banaganiriye na Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Biruta Vincent; uw’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Prof. Shyaka Anastase, ubuyobozi bw’Agaciro Development Fund; ubw’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubwiteganyirize (RSSB); Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) n’ubwa Minisiteri y’Ubutabera baganira ku ngingo zigarukwaho mu bikorwa byagutse nka za Rwanda Day.
Muri ibyo biganiro kandi hanazamo imikoranire ikwiye hagati y’Abanyarwanda b’imbere mu gihugu no hanze mu bijyanye n’ishoramari.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga banahuye n’itsinda riyobowe n’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Amb. Nduhungirehe Olivier, ryabasangije ku muco wo kuba Umunyafurika nyawe (Panafricanist). Ibi biganiro byavuyemo imyanzuro yo gushyigikira iyi gahunda no kuriganiriza abandi Banyafurika bari mu bihugu by’amahanga.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga basabye ko gahunda ya Ndi Umunyarwanda zarushaho kwimakazwa bijyanye n’igihe.
Maziyateke yanagarutse no ku biganiro byo gukangurira abana bato kumenya igihugu n’amateka yacyo mu bijyanye n’umuco n’ururimi rw’Ikinyarwanda, kubaha umwanya ku bitekerezo byabo, abana bakumva ko bafite igihugu cy’ababyeyi babo.
Guverineri w’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney, yabwiye IGIHE ko Abanyarwanda benshi bakunze kwakirwa mu biruhuko bisoza umwaka.
Ati “Mu mpera za 2019 Abanyarwanda baje ari benshi mu biruhuko, hari na gahunda iteganyijwe yo kubakira mu Majyaruguru ku bakiri mu Rwanda narabatumiye.’’
“Abo bose hari abaza nko mu Mushyikirano ariko bakazana n’imiryango yabo n’inshuti, bagasura ahantu hatandukanye, uko basura niko bazamura ubukungu kuko bishyura serivisi bahabwa, amahoteli babamo basura ahantu hatandukanye.’’
Gatabazi yavuze ko hari n’ibiganiro byabayeho bamwe bemera kuzajya batanga amasomo mu bigo by’amashuri atandukanye, abakora ubushakashatsi bakabisangiza amashuri y’u Rwanda nta kiguzi.
Yakomeje ati “Dufite n’amahirwe ko n’abanangiye kugaruka mu gihugu bohereza abana, abagore ku buryo bagenda bafunguka buhoro buhoro mu bikorwa byo kubaka igihugu. Aho usanga abatarabigeraho ni uko bafite ibibazo byihariye bibareba bya politiki.’’
Yashimye ko Abanyarwanda benshi bagaruka mu gihugu cyabo bazana ibitekerezo bishya kandi byiza bavanye mu mahanga bishyira itafari ryabo mu kucyubaka.

Title: USA:Abanyarwanda batuye muri leta ya Maine bizihije umwaka mushya wa 2020 (Amafoto)
Body:
Ihuriro ry’Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo batuye muri leta ya Maine no mu nkengero zayo, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika, kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 4 Mutarama 2020 bahuriye mu gikorwa cy’ubusabane bishimira ibyo bagezeho mu bihe byaranze umwaka wa 2019, banifurizanya umwaka mushya muhire.
Ihuriro ry’Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo batuye muri leta ya Maine no mu nkengero zayo, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika, kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 4 Mutarama 2020 bahuriye mu gikorwa cy’ubusabane bishimira ibyo bagezeho mu bihe byaranze umwaka wa 2019, banifurizanya umwaka mushya muhire.
Icyo gikorwa cyabaye umwanya wo kuganira ku ngamba n’imihigo bigomba kubaranga mu mwaka batangiye wa 2020.
Nk’uko babitangarije IGIHE, ni umunsi waranzwe n’ibiganiro harimo no gushima bamwe mu banyarwanda bafunguye ibigo bitanga akazi na serivise aho batuye muri Maine.
Ibiganiro byagarutse ku ruhare rw’ abo nk’abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga mu iterambere ry’aho bakomoka (mu Rwanda), n’aho batuye.
Mu ijambo rye, Antoine Bikamba uhagarariye ihuriro ry’abanyarwanda baba muri Maine, yashimye ubwitabire n’ubwitange bagaragaje kugira ngo uwo munsi ufite icyo uvuze gikomeye ugerweho, ashimira cyane ba rwiyemezamirimo bafite ibikorwa muri aka karere n’abatanga serivise zitandukanye n’imirimo.
Yibukije ko icyo gikorwa ngarukamwaka cy’ubusabane bw’abanyarwanda batuye Maine kigamije kubaha umwanya wo guhura no kumenyana biruseho cyane cyane abaje vuba bakamenyana n’abamaze igihe.
Kumenyana bituma abantu bafashanya muri byinshi bakunga ubumwe hagati yabo, aho batuye n’aho bakomoka bakabyungukiramo.
Damas Rugaba wigeze kuyobora iri ihuriro ry’abanyarwanda batuye muri Maine, yabibukije gushyigikirana bakirinda icyabatandukanya, bagashyira imbaraga mu iterambere bifuza kugeraho mu buzima bwa buri munsi .
Leopold Ndayisabye na we wayoboye iri ihuriro, yabaganirije ku kamaro k’umuryango w’abanyarwanda, ashimangira ko ugamije guhuza no guharanira iterambere ry’abanyarwanda bose batuye muri Maine,.
Ati “Murangwe n’ubumwe bubabere inkingi mu mibereho yanyu ya buri munsi, musangire amakuru abafasha kwiteza imbere. Mutabarane hagize ugira ikibazo hagati yanyu mu ngo”.
Kayijuka Frank, Umujyanama wa mbere muri Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika mu ijambo rye yagize ati “Twishimira iterambere n’imibereho mwerekana by’umwihariko nk’abanyarwanda muba mu mahanga. Mukomeze guharanira icyabateza imbere kuko nicyo igihugu kibatezeho, uwiyubatse aba yubaka u Rwanda n’aho atuye , mukomeze ubu bumwe mugaragaza kuko abishyize hamwe nta kibananira.”
Uyu muhango kandi wabereyemo gushimira bamwe mu banyarwanda bakoze ibikorwa by’indashyikirwa bagatangiza ibigo bitanga serivise zitandukanye bigatanga n’akazi.
Mu bashimiwe harimo Mike Mwenedata washinze ikigo “Rwanda Bean” gikora ubucuruzi bw’Ikawa ivanwa mu Rwanda igacururizwa muri Leta Zunze ubumwe z’Amerika, Manasse Shingiro ufite ikigo “Casco Bay Cleaning”,Gael Karomba ufite ikigo cyita ku bantu bafite ibibazo byo mu mutwe “Happy Haven LLC” , Arthur Sabiti uhagarariye Intercultural Community Center (ICC) ifasha abana mu myigire no mu bindi bitandukanye na Damas Rugaba uhagarariye “Greater Portland Immigration and Welcome Center” ifasha abimukira mu kubahugura mu rurimi rw’Icyongereza ndetse no mu bintu by’ingeri bitandukanye.
Hashimwe na Leopold Ndayisabye wayoboye umuryango w’abanyarwanda muri manda iheruka.
Ihuriro ry’abanyarwanda batuye muri leta ya Maine rifite ubuzima gatozi. Abayobozi baryo bafite inshingano zo gufasha abarigize gukomeza ubufatanye hagati yabo, kwiteza imbere, gusigasira umuco nyarwanda ndetse no kubana neza n’andi mahuriro ari muri iyi leta.

Title: Norvège: Urubyiruko rwasabwe kubakira ku ndangagaciro Nyarwanda nk’umusingi w’iterambere
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Norvège biganjemo urubyiruko bibukijwe ko kubakira ku ndangagaciro na kirazira by’umuco Nyarwanda , ari wo musingi uzabafasha kugira ejo hazaza heza, bagira uruhare mu iterambere ry’igihugu cyabo.
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Norvège biganjemo urubyiruko bibukijwe ko kubakira ku ndangagaciro na kirazira by’umuco Nyarwanda , ari wo musingi uzabafasha kugira ejo hazaza heza, bagira uruhare mu iterambere ry’igihugu cyabo.
Ubu butumwa babuherewe mu biganiro byabaye ku wa 28 Ukuboza 2019, byateguwe n’Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda batuye muri Norvège, bafite intego yo kwigisha urubyiruko rw’Abanyarwanda baba muri icyo gihugu amateka y’u Rwanda.
Uhagarariye Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo muri Norvège, Mugisha Peter, yashimiye urubyiruko rwitabiriye icyo gikorwa, arubwira ko arirwo bayobozi b’ahazaza, kandi ko rusabwa kwitanga, kugira ubushake no gukoresha neza igihe rufite.
Dr Benda Munyurangabo Richard, Umwarimu muri Kaminuza za Luther King College, Manchester na Chester zo mu Bwongereza, ubu akaba ari gukorana ubushakashatsi na Kaminuza ya Stellenbosch muri Afurika y’Epfo ku ngaruka Jenoside na Apartheid bifite ku bana n’urubyiruko, cyane cyane abavutse nyuma y’ayo mahano, yatanze ikiganiro ku mateka y’u Rwanda mbere na nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yagaragaje ibyaranze igihe cy’abami, ubukoloni, impinduramatwara yo mu 1959, amacakubiri, ivangura, irondakoko n’irondakarere, uko Abatutsi bahejwe mu gihugu cyabo, uko bishwe, bakanatotezwa n’ibindi.
Yanavuze kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, igahagarikwa n’Ingabo za RPF zari ziyobowe na Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame; imiyoborere myiza u Rwanda rufite ubu, n’uko Abanyarwanda babashije kwishakamo ibisubizo ku bibazo by’inzitane u Rwanda rwarimo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, atanga urugero kuri Gacaca na gahunda ya ‘Ndi Umunyarwanda’.
Muhigana Félix umwe mu Banyarwanda batuye muri Norvège, yatanze ikiganiro kivuga kuri Afurika mu cyiswe “Panafricanisme’’ asobanura uburyo yatangiye, asaba urubyiruko kugira imyumvire iboneye ku mugabane bavukamo wa Afurika.
Ati “Mukwiye kugira imyumvire ishaka ibisubizo aho kwibanda ku kunenga ibitagenda. Twese turi bamwe, turi Abanyafurika dufatanye mu rugamba rwo kwiteza imbere no kwihesha agaciro; isoko rusange Nyafurika ‘AfCTA’ ni urugero rwiza mukwiye kubona.”
Haganiriwe kandi ku ruhare rw’ urubyiruko mu iterambere ry’ u Rwanda. Umwe witwa Serge yasangije abari muri iyo nama ibikorwa akora mu Rwanda aho afite ikipe y’umupira w’amaguru yitwa ‘Juatoto’ ibarizwa mu karere ka Rubavu, akaba anafite umushinga ugamije guteza imbere injyana ya ‘Hip hop’ mu Rwanda.
Kayihura Chelsy utuye muri Denmark na we yasangije urubyiruko ibyiza byo kwitabira ‘Itorero Indangamirwa’ mu Rwanda, ababwira ko ryamufashije kwiga byinshi ku gihugu cye kandi yarushijeho kugikunda no gutegura neza imbere he hazaza.
Umuyobozi w’Urubyiruko rutuye muri Norvège, Gatete Gilles, yabwiye abitabiriye iki gikorwa ko bagomba kwigirira icyizere.
Yitanzeho urugero ko ubwo yigaga, yari afite akazi ka buri munsi, ubu akaba afite Impamyabumenyi y’Icyiciro cya Gatatu cya Kaminuza (Engineer) muri gaz na petrol, yiyongera ku yindi Mpamyabumenyi y’Icyiciro cya Gatatu cya kaminuza mu byo gutunganya amazi; kandi akaba akomeje kwiga abangikanyije amasomo n’akazi ke.
Gatete yasabye urubyiruko kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe bafite muri Norvège.
Umunyamabanga wa mbere muri Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Burayi bw’Amajyaruguru, ufite icyicaro mu Mujyi wa Stockholm muri Suède, Umulisa Marie Elise, yashimiye abateguye icyo gikorwa, abatanze ibiganiro n’urubyiruko rwitabiriye.
Yasabye urubyiruko kumenya no gukurikiza indangagaciro Nyarwanda aho ruri muri Norvège.
Ati “Gukurikiza ibi bizatuma mugera kuri byinshi byiza mukeneye kugira ngo mugire ejo heza, ari nabyo ababyeyi n’igihugu cyacu u Rwanda kibategerejeho kandi kibifuriza.”
Yakomeje abasaba kumenya ururimi rw’Ikinyarwanda ku bataruzi nkuko biririmbwa mu ndirimbo yubahiriza igihugu aho mu gika cya kabiri ikomoza ku muco uhuriweho uranga abenegihugu, ururimi rukabahuza, ubwenge umutima amaboko bikarukungahaza bikwiye, rugatera imbere ubutitsa.
Umulisa yasabye urubyiruko kubizirikana, kandi buri wese mu bushobozi bwe agakomeza guhuriza hamwe imbaraga na bagenzi be, mu rwego rwo kurushaho kubaka u Rwanda rwifuzwa.
Yibukije urubyiruko ko rufite ubuyobozi budahwema kuruzirikana muri gahunda zitandukanye, atanga urugero rw’Itorero Indangamirwa, anarushishikariza kuryitabira.
Ku musozo w’ibiganiro, urubyiruko rwakoze igikorwa cyo kwitoramo abayobozi ndetse abitabiriye iyi gahunda baranasabana.

Title: Abanyarwanda baba muri Suède bahuriye mu rugendo rwo mu bwato rw’amasaha 23, barasabana
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Suède bahuriye mu bwato buva muri iki gihugu bwerekeza muri Finland buzwi nka Sila Line, ubwato bukundwa na ba mukerarugendo, aho bagenda batembera, bakidagadura ndetse bakanaruhuka mu rugendo rw’amasaha 23.
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Suède bahuriye mu bwato buva muri iki gihugu bwerekeza muri Finland buzwi nka Sila Line, ubwato bukundwa na ba mukerarugendo, aho bagenda batembera, bakidagadura ndetse bakanaruhuka mu rugendo rw’amasaha 23.
Ubwato buhagura saa moya zijoro bukazagaruka aho bwahagurukiye saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba z’undi munsi.
Iki gikorwa cyateguwe n’ubuyobozi bw’umuryango w’Abanyarwanda batuye muri Suède, kugira ngo bongere bahure bose umwaka utararangira, barebe ibyakozwe, aho bagifite intege nke bafashanye kuzongera ndetse basabane banifurizanye iminsi mikuru myiza ya Noheli n’ubunani.
 Uyobora umuryango w’Abanyarwanda batuye muri iki gihugu, Madamu Gloria Sebalu, yabwiye IGIHE ko icyo gikorwa cyitabiriwe bishimishije, avuga ko hatangiwe ibiganiro byiza bitandukanye.
Mu biganiro byatanzwe harimo ikigaruka ku gukunda igihugu bakomokamo, gusigasira umuco nyarwanda ndetse n’ururimi rw’Ikinyarwanda. Hanatanzwe ibiganiro binyuranye bigaragaza uko bashora imari mu gihugu ndetse n’ikiganiro kigisha uko bakwiteza imbere mu buryo bufatika mu gihugu barimo cy Suède.
Muri uru rugendo rw’ubwato kandi habayeho no gusabana banasangira amafunguro anyuranye ategurwa muri ubwo bwato .
Mu gusoza uyu mwaka kandi hateguwe umunsi w’ubusabane w’abana, wabereye ahitwa Leos Lekland, haba imikino itandukanye y’abana.
Umuryango w’abari n’abategarugori batuye muri Suède nibo bateguye iki gikorwa cy’ubusabane, akaba ari nabo bayoboye gahunda yo kwigisha ururimi n’umuco.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu bihugu bihugu byo mu Majyaruguru y’u Burayi, Nkulikiyinka Christine, aganiriza abana bari bitabiriye uwo munsi, yabasabye gukomeza kwiga ururimi rw’Ikinyarwanda asaba ababyeyi kujya bavugisha abana mu rugo mu Kinyarwanda, bityo bakabunganira ku byo baba bize.
Yagize ati “Umwana ntajye avuga Ikinyarwanda ari uko yagiye kukiga rimwe mu kwezi, ntibyaba bihagije ngo akimenye ababyeyi muramutse mutabunganiye.”
Yasabye abari bahari batajya muri iyo gahunda yo kwiga Ikinyarwanda no kubyina kinyarwanda ko bajya bitabira ndetse abasaba ko babwira abatari baje uwo munsi ibyiza byo kwiga ururimi rwacu no gusigasira umuco.
Abana bishimiye kuba barahuye uwo munsi bagakina, ariko kandi bavuga ko guhura biga Ikinyarwanda byatumye bamenyana baba inshuti, bituma bishimira cyane kwitabira ibikorwa bihuza Abanyarwanda no kumenya igihugu cyabo kurushaho.

Title: Amb. Habimana Saleh yasabye Abanyarwanda biga muri Maroc kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe bafite
Body:
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Bwami bwa Maroc, Sheikh Habimana Saleh, yasabye Abanyarwanda biga muri icyo gihugu kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe yose bafite, abasezeranya ko igihugu cyabo kibari hafi kandi kizakomeza kubafasha.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Bwami bwa Maroc, Sheikh Habimana Saleh, yasabye Abanyarwanda biga muri icyo gihugu kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe yose bafite, abasezeranya ko igihugu cyabo kibari hafi kandi kizakomeza kubafasha.
Ni ikiganiro yagiranye nabo ku mugoroba wo ku wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza 2019, cyitabirwa n’abiganjemo abanyeshuri biga mu murwa mukuru Rabat. Ni ikiganiro cyabaye ingirakamaro, gihurirana n’uko Abanyarwanda bari bakoraniye mu nama y’igihugu y’umushyikirano, bungurana ibitekerezo ku iterambere ry’igihugu cyabo.
Amb Habimana yabahaye impanuro zitandukanye, anabasezeranya ko nubwo biga kure y’igihugu cyabo batari bonyine.
Yibanze ku kubaganiriza ku mateka y’u Rwanda, ababwira imibereho y’Abanyarwanda bo hambere kugeza ku mahano ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ariko abibutsa ko amateka mabi u Rwanda rwanyuzemo yarangiye.
Yagarutse kuri gahunda ya Ndi Umunyarwanda, ashimangira ko igamije gukumira no kurwanya amacakubiri aho ava akagera. Amb. Habimana yabagaragarije ko bagomba guharanira kuba umwe, bikabafasha kugera ku zindi ntego zikomeye zo kwiteza imbere no guteza imbere igihugu.
Yabibukije inshingano zabo nk’Abanyarwanda
Mu gice cya kabiri cy’icyo kiganiro, Amb Habimana yibanze ku ruhare rwabo nk’Abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc, abashishikariza kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe bafite yo kwiga muri iki gihugu.
Yabakanguriye kwirinda ibishuko byabayobya, ahubwo ko bakwiriye gukomeza kugendera ku ndangaciro n’umuco nyarwanda, bikabafasha gukora cyane mu masomo yabo no mu bindi bakora.
Yahise abagenera ishimwe rizajya rihabwa buri mwaka umunyeshuli uzajya ahiga abandi mu byo yiga.
Yabasabye kandi gushyira ingufu mu gufatikanya amasomo yabo n’umuhate wo kumenya indimi, anabakangurira kwita cyane Icyarabu gikoreshwa muri Maroc, cyane ko u Rwanda rurimo kwagura umubano n’ibindi bihugu by’abarabu.
Ni ikiganiro Abanyarwanda baba muri Maroc bishimiye, ndetse bashimangira ko bazakomeza kuzirikana inshingano zabo, bakaba indashyikirwa mu byo bakora.

Title: Neretse Fabien yakatiwe gufungwa imyaka 25
Body:
Urukiko rwo mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles rwategetse ko Neretse Fabien afungwa imyaka 25 nyuma yo kumuhamya ibyaha bya Jenoside n’ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Urukiko rwo mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles rwategetse ko Neretse Fabien afungwa imyaka 25 nyuma yo kumuhamya ibyaha bya Jenoside n’ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Uyu mwanzuro watangajwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu, tariki ya 20 Ukuboza 2019.
Ubushinjacyaha bwari bwasabiye Neretse gufungwa imyaka 30 ariko Urukiko rutegeka ko afungwa imyaka 25 nyuma yo kumuhamya ibyaha yaregwaga.
Ku wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza, Urukiko Mpanabyaha rwo mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles mu Bubiligi rwaburanishije Neretse, rwamuhamije icyaha cya Jenoside n’ibyaha by’intambara.
Mu Ugushyingo 2019 nibwo urubanza rwa Neretse rwatangiye kuburanishwa. Yashinjwaga ibyaha 13 by’intambara na bitatu byo kwica muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Neretse yari akurikiranyweho ibikorwa by’ubwicanyi mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi i Nyamirambo no mu Mataba mu yahoze ari Komini Ndusu mu Ruhengeri hagati ya 6 Mata 1994 na 14 Nyakanga 1994.
Yarezwe gushishikariza abasirikari kwica Abatutsi, aho 13 biciwe i Nyamirambo. Yanashinze Umutwe w’Interahamwe mu Mataba, awuha intwaro mbere yo kugaba ibitero ku Batutsi, ariko anabaha ibihembo by’amafaranga.
Icyemezo cy’Urukiko rwa Bruxelles cyo gukatira Neretse imyaka 25 gifite umwihariko kuko ni ubwa mbere u Bubiligi bukurikiranye bukanahana icyaha cya Jenoside hashingiwe ku itegeko rihana.
Mbere ya Neretse, hari Abanyarwanda baburanishijwe n’inkiko z’u Bubiligi hashingiwe ku itegeko rihana ibyaha byibasira inyokomuntu n’iby’intambara.
Urubanza rwe rwaranzwe n’amagambo ahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yavuzwe n’uwunganira Neretse, Me Jean Flamme, aho abari mu rubanza, harimo n’abacamanza basanze arengera avuga ko habaye Jenoside ebyiri.
Kuva mu ntangiriro y’urubanza rwa Neretse, umwunganira, Me Flamme yakoresheje imvugo ihakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi avuga ko habaye Jenoside ebyiri. Uyu mugambi we kandi watumye atumira mu rubanza abantu basanzwe bazwiho kuyihakana nka Judi Rever, Joseph Matata, Johann Swinnen n’abandi.
Intego ye kwari ukwerekana ko nta Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yabayeho, ko rero uwo yunganira nta ruhare abifitemo kuko icyaha akurikiranyweho kitabayeho.
Iyi mvugo yatangaje benshi mu rukiko bituma umucamanza asaba uwunganira Neretse kuyirinda. Flamme azwiho kuba umuhakanyi nk’uko yabigaragaje mu rubanza rwa Tharcisse Renzaho yunganiraga.
Neretse yanashyizeho itsinda ryagombaga gutanga ruswa kugira ngo abatangabuhamya bamushinjure, atanga imirima n’amafaranga.
Urubanza rwa Fabien Neretse w’imyaka 71 rwatangiye mu Ugushyingo 2019 ubwo hatoranywaga itsinda ry’abaturage bagomba gutanga ubuhamya bumushinja n’ubumushinjura. Nyuma y’iminsi itatu rutangira kuburanishwa mu mizi.
Fabien Neretse ukomoka mu Ruhengeri yafatiwe mu Bufaransa mu 2011. Uyu mugabo wari ufite ijambo ku butegetsi bwa Habyarimana, ashinjwa kugira uruhare mu kwica Umubiligi Claire Beckers n’umugabo we Isaïe Bucyana n’umukobwa wabo Katia. Aba biciwe i Kigali ku wa 9 Mata 1994, nyuma y’iminsi mike Jenoside itangiye.
Neretse afite iminsi 15 yo kujuririra umwanzuro w’Urukiko rwa Bruxelles.
Izindi nkuru wasoma:
 	Urukiko rwo mu Bubiligi rwahamije Neretse Fabien ibyaha bya Jenoside
 	CNLG yashimye icyemezo ku rubanza rwa Neretse, icyita ugutsindwa ku bahakana Jenoside

Title: Urukiko rwo mu Bubiligi rwahamije Neretse Fabien ibyaha bya Jenoside
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza 2019, nyuma yo gusesengura ibyatangajwe n’impande zombi, Urukiko rwa Bruxelles rwatangaje ko Neretse Fabien ahamwa n’ibyaha bya Jenoside n’ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza 2019, nyuma yo gusesengura ibyatangajwe n’impande zombi, Urukiko rwa Bruxelles rwatangaje ko Neretse Fabien ahamwa n’ibyaha bya Jenoside n’ibyibasiye inyokomuntu.
Mu Ugushyingo 2019 nibwo urubanza rwa Neretse rwatangiye kuburanishwa. Yashinjwaga ibyaha 13 by’intambara na bitatu byo kwica muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Mu byaha yahamijwe n’urukiko birimo ubwicanyi yakoze, gushishikariza abantu kwica, kurema umutwe w’abicanyi n’ibindi yakoreye mu Mujyi wa Kigali n’i Mataba.
Umunyamategeko uhagarariye abakorewe Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Me. Karongozi André Martin, yabwiye IGIHE ko ibyaha byose yarezwe byamuhamye.
Yavuze ko bishimiye ko icyaha cya Jenoside yaburanye ahakana mu gihe gisaga ukwezi urubanza rwari rumaze cyamuhamye.
Ati “Ikintu cya mbere twishimiye, ni uko icyaha cya Jenoside cyongeye gushimangirwa, ku muntu wayihakanye kuva urubanza rwatangira kugera rurangiye.”
Mu iburanisha ry’uru rubanza, Neretse n’abamwunganira bakunze kugaragaza ko mu Rwanda habaye Jenoside ebyiri zirimo iyakorewe Abahutu n’iy’Abatutsi ndetse mu riheruka abanyamategeko be banongeyeho iya gatatu ngo yabereye muri Congo Kinshasa.
Me. Karongozi yasobanuye ko mu bantu yashinjwaga kwica, babiri aribo urukiko rutamuhamije kugira uruhare mu rupfu rwabo.
Ati “Icya kabiri ni uko ibyaha byose bamureze, byamuhamye uretse gusa abantu babiri barimo Ildephonse waherekeje umwana wari wakomeretse akicirwa kuri bariyeri ngira ngo ni hafi ya Kiliziya Charles Lwanga. Ntibavuze ko ari Neretse kuko ataguye aho barasiye abandi, undi ni uwitwa Rutonesha Sixbert, we yari yihishe mu gisenge cy’inzu ariko nyuma avamo aza kugwa ahandi bavuga yuko yaguye mu bafurere b’Aba-Jesuites i Nyamirambo, ni abo bonyine.”
Me. Karongozi yavuze ko ari ubwa mbere bibaye mu Bubiligi guca urubanza mu bushishozi nk’ubwo babonye.
Ati “Ku bindi byaba byose, iby’i Kigali, abantu yishe, iby’i Mataba harimo bariya bantu barimo abitwa Mpendwanzi na Nzamwita, ariko cyane cyane n’umubare w’abantu batazwi, biciwe i Mataba. Bivuze ngo perezida asobanuye ko icyemezo cyo kwica abantu, b’Abatutsi kiraturuka no kuri abo bantu bose yagiye yica, interahamwe yari afite amagambo yabwiraga abantu aho yacaga byose yabisobanuye neza ni ubwa mbere bibaye mu Bubiligi.”
Yavuze ko nk’abanyamategeko batazura inzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ariko nibura babona ko batabibagiwe kuko babonye ubutabera.
Yashimye abarokotse bemeye kubaha ububasha bwo kubahagararira ndetse kuri we asanga akazi kakozwe karatanze umusaruro.
Ku wa Kabiri tariki 17 Ukuboza 2019 nibwo urukiko rwari rwasoje kumva abarega n’abaregwa ubwo humvwaga abaregera indishyi, n’uruhande rw’abunganira Neretse mbere y’uko rwiherera rusuzuma ishingiro ry’uko buri ruhande rwireguye.
Perezida wa Ibuka Mémoire & Justice, Ryamukuru Félicité, yabwiye IGIHE ko yashimye ubutabera bw’u Bubiligi avuga ko umwanzuro w’urukiko ubahaye kuruhuka nk’abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ati “Biraturuhuye, kuko twategereje amasaha ahagije, iminsi ibiri yari imaze kurenga, twibazaga aho biri bubere ariko biraturuhuye kuko ntabwo yashoboraga kuba umwere ibyaha byose byamuhamaga ibyaha by’intambara ariko icyiza ni uko icyaha cya Jenoside nacyo kimuhamye. Birerekana ubutabera bwo mu Bubiligi nabwo bwakoze umurimo ukomeye.’’
Yavuze ko guhamwa n’icyaha hari icyo bisobanuye no ku batekerezaga guhakana Jenoside.
Ati “Umuntu umwe uhamwe n’icyaha cya Jenoside ni ukuvuga ngo iba yemewe kandi biruhura n’abacitse ku icumu nubwo bitagarura n’umuntu n’umwe ni ubutabera bugaragaje umurimo wabwo.”
Biteganyijwe ko urukiko ruzatangaza ibihano ku byaba Neretswe yahamijwe ku wa Gatanu, tariki ya 20 Ukuboza 2019.
Uru rubanza rwa Fabien Neretse w’imyaka 71 rwatangiye ku wa 4 Ugushyingo 2019 ubwo hatoranywaga itsinda ry’abaturage bagomba gutanga ubuhamya bumushinja n’ubumushinjura. Nyuma y’iminsi itatu rutangira kuburanishwa mu mizi.
Fabien Neretse ukomoka mu Ruhengeri yafatiwe mu Bufaransa mu 2011. Uyu mugabo wari ufite ijambo ku butegetsi bwa Habyarimana, ashinjwa kugira uruhare mu kwica Umubiligi Claire Beckers n’umugabo we Isaïe Bucyana n’umukobwa wabo Katia. Aba biciwe i Kigali ku wa 9 Mata 1994, nyuma y’iminsi mike Jenoside itangiye.
Beckers n’umuryango we bashatse uko bahunga bakava aho bari batuye, kuwa 9 Mata 1994 bajya ku Ngabo za Loni zari mu Rwanda, bahagarikirwa kuri bariyeri bararaswa. Bikekwa ko Neretse ari we wagize uruhare mu ihagarikwa rya Beckers n’umuryango we ndetse akaba yaranagize uruhare mu rupfu rw’abandi bantu icumi bari baturanye .
Aregwa kandi ubwicanyi yakoreye iwa mu yahoze ari Perefegitura ya Ruhengeri ahitwa i Mataba barimo Mpendwanzi bivugwa ko yagiye kumushaka mu rugo rwe amushinja kuba icyitso cya FPR Inkotanyi nubwo yari Umuhutu.
Mu Ugushyingo 2019 nibwo urubanza rwa Neretse rwatangiye kuburanishwa. Yashinjwaga ibyaha 13 by’intambara na bitatu byo kwica muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Karirima Ngarambe / Palais de Justice Bruxelles

Title: U Bwongereza: Umunyarwandakazi bikekwa ko yiyahuye avuye mu igorofa rya 19 yitabye Imana
Body:
Gatera Cynthia wabaga mu Mujyi wa Nottingham mu Bwongereza yiyahuye avuye mu igorofa rya 19 yitaba Imana.
Gatera Cynthia wabaga mu Mujyi wa Nottingham mu Bwongereza yiyahuye avuye mu igorofa rya 19 yitaba Imana.
Gatera yaguye mu Mujyi wa Birmingham ku wa Gatandatu, tariki ya 14 Ukuboza 2019, aho yari yasuye inshuti y’umuryango wabo yitwa Eric Gashema.
Uyu mukobwa w’imyaka 31 yageze i Birmingham ku wa Kane, aho yari afitanye gahunda na Gashema yo kujyana mu masengesho.
Gashema yagiye gutabara inshuti ye yapfushije umubyeyi mu Mujyi wa Manchester, ariko ntibajyana, uwo mukobwa aguma mu rugo.
Uyu yerekeje i Manchester nyuma yo gusangira ifunguro rya mu gitondo na Gatera wari umeze neza, wanamusabye kumusigira ibitabo ngo abe asenga.
Amakuru Polisi yo muri ako gace yahawe n’umuturanyi ni uko Gatera yaguye hasi ahagana saa Moya n’igice z’umugoroba. Yari asanzwe afata imiti y’indwara y’agahinda gakabije izwi nka ’dépression’.
Gashema ngo yageze aho yari atuye ahagana saa Yine asanga polisi yahagose, aza kwemererwa kugera mu igorofa rya 19 yabagamo, ahageze asanga idirishya rifunguye ariko Gatera atarimo.
Uyu musore yarebye hasi abona hashyizweho amahema ya Polisi, ahita ajya kubaza aza gusanga ari Gatera witabye Imana.
Umurambo wa Gatera wari ugihari ariko yaba Gashema n’ababyeyi ba nyakwigendera [bahageze saa Sita] ntibabashije kuwubona kugeza utwawe na Polisi ahagana saa kumi zo mu rukerera rwo ku Cyumweru.
Amakuru yizewe IGIHE ifite ni uko Gatera yari amaze igihe kirekire afite dépression ndetse yafataga imiti ku buryo yari yaratangiye kumererwa neza yiteguraga no gusubira ku ishuri.
Gashema asanzwe ari inshuti n’umuryango wa Gatera, baragenderanira kuko bubatse ubucuti akiri mu Burundi.
Gatera yabyinaga mu itorero aho yanatumirwaga muri gahunda zitandukanye za Ambasade y’u Rwanda. Yatangiye kubyina afite imyaka itatu aho yanyuze muri Troupe Urunana yo mu Busuwisi.
Dépression ni indwara irangwa n’agahinda gakabije no kwiheba. Ishobora gufata uwo ari we wese, ku myaka iyo ariyo yose kandi iyo itavuwe ishobora gutuma uyirwaye afata imyanzuro yo kwiyambura ubuzima.
Iyo iyi ndwara itavuwe kandi igira ingaruka zikomeye ku bukungu ndetse n’imibereho muri rusange kuko uyirwaye adashobora kugira icyo yimarira cyangwa ngo agire icyo akora cyamuteza imbere.

Title: Kwibuka26: Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomera ku bumwe, barwanya abahakana Jenoside
Body:
Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomeza gusenyera umugozi umwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa basabwe gukomeza gusenyera umugozi umwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’abahakana bakanapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Babisabwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 7 Mata 2020, ubwo Abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa bifatanyaga n’Isi kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Umuhango wo kwibuka wahurije hamwe abanyarwanda basaga 550 baba mu Bushinwa hakoreshejwe uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Bushinwa, James Kimonyo mu ijambo rye , yasabye abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa kurangwa n’indangagaciro z’ubwitange zaranze ingabo za RPA, ubwo zahagarikaga Jenoside ziyobowe na Perezida Paul Kagame.
Ambasaderi Kimonyo yasabye abari bamukurikiye gukomeza kwimakaza ubumwe, barwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’ihakana ryayo.
Yasabye umuryango mpuzamahanga gufatanya n’u Rwanda mu kugeza imbere y’ubutabera abakidegembya bakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Muri uyu muhango wo kwibuka, humviswe ubuhamya bwa Ntezimana Jean Népomucène warokotse Jenoside kuri ubu wiga mu Bushinwa, wavuze ku rugendo rwe mbere, muri Jenoside na nyuma yayo.
Ntezimana uri kwiga ibijyanye n’ubuvuzi bw’imbere mu mubiri yashimiye ingabo za RPA zamurokoye na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yagaruriye icyizere abarokotse Jenoside, ibafasha mu kubaka ejo hazaza heza.

Title: Kwibuka26: Abanyarwanda baba mu Buyapani bibutse Jenoside, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro
Body:
Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda baba mu Buyapani bifatanyije mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro wo gukoresha ubumenyi rufite mu gufasha igihugu kujya imbere birinda icyagisubiza mu bihe by’icuraburindi.
Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda baba mu Buyapani bifatanyije mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, urubyiruko ruhabwa umukoro wo gukoresha ubumenyi rufite mu gufasha igihugu kujya imbere birinda icyagisubiza mu bihe by’icuraburindi.
Byatangajwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 7 Mata ubwo Abanyarwanda batuye mu Buyapani bifatanyaga n’Isi mu kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ubusanzwe ibikorwa byo Kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Buyapani byahurizaga hamwe abanyarwanda, inshuti z’u Rwanda n’abayobozi muri Guverinoma y’u Buyapani.
Uyu mwaka ibikorwa byo kwibuka biri gukorwa mu buryo bwihariye kubera ingamba zafashwe zo gukangurira abantu kuguma mu ngo zabo, hahashywa icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda i Tokyo yahisemo gukora ibikorwa byo kwibuka mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga (video conference).
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Buyapani, Ernest Rwamucyo mu ijambo yagejeje ku banyarwanda n’inshuti zarwo mu Buyapani yagarutse ku mateka mabi yagejeje u Rwanda kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yavuze ko kwibuka ari ngombwa “kuko biduha umwanya wo kwibuka abacu bambuwe ubuzima. Tuboneraho umwanya wo kwihanganisha abarokotse Jenoside n’ubu bagifite ibikomere byaba ibigaragara ku mubiri ndetse n’ibitagaragara.”
Rwamucyo yavuze ko kwibuka ari umwanya wo gusubiza agaciro n’icyubahiro abazize Jenoside bambuwe ubwo bicwaga urw’agashinyaguro.
Yavuze ko ari n’umwanya wo gukangurira abanyarwanda n’isi muri rusange kwirinda ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’ihakana n’ipfobya bya Jenoside.
Ati “Biduha umwanya wo gukangurira abanyarwanda, abatuye isi ndetse n’imiryango mpuzamahanga kuzirikana ububi bw’ingengabitecyerezo ya Jenoside, ingaruka mbi zo guhakana no gupfobya Jenoside ndetse no kubashishikariza kwamagana ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose ryaba irishingiye ku turere, amoko, amadini, cyangwa ibindi byose bishobora gutandukanya abantu.”
Mu myaka 26 ishize, u Rwanda rwagiye rwiyubaka haba mu mibereho y’abaturage n’iterambere muri rusange.
Ambasaderi Rwamucyo yashimye umuhate w’ingabo zari iza RPA zahagaritse Jenoside, igihugu kikabona umusingi wo kubakiraho kigana imbere, ubu kikaba gikataje mu bumwe n’ubwiyunge bw’abanyarwanda, ukwisanzura kwa buri munyarwanda, umutekano n’imiyoborere myiza.
Yashishikarije urubyiruko gutanga umusanzu warwo mu gukomeza kubaka igihugu.
Ati “Mwebwe rubyiruko rwacu, mboneyeho umwanya wo kubakangurira gukunda igihugu cyababyaye. Kwitangira kubaka amateka meza mushyigikira umurongo wa politike nziza yubaka igihugu cyacu.”
“By’umwihariko mwebwe muri hano nk’urubyiruko rufite ubumenyi bwihariye n’imyumvire igomba kuba ihanitse murasabwa byinshi.”
Ambasaderi Rwamucyo yanasabye abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda gukomeza gufata mu mugongo abarokotse Jenoside muri ibi bihe bikomeye.
Ibikorwa byo kwibuka Jenoside bizakomeza muri iki Cyumweru cyo kwibuka mu bihugu birimo Abanyarwanda barebererwa na Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buyapani. Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 8 Mata hazibuka Abanyarwanda baba muri Philippines naho kuwa Gatanu tariki 10 hibuke abanyarwanda baba muri Malaysia.

Title: Rwandacash Africash yakoze impinduka muri serivisi zo kohererezanya amafaranga
Body:
Ubukana bwa COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus bwatumye ibigo birimo ibifasha abantu mu kohererezanya amafaranga, imwe muri serivisi zikoreshwa cyane muri iyi minsi, bihindura imikorere.
Ubukana bwa COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus bwatumye ibigo birimo ibifasha abantu mu kohererezanya amafaranga, imwe muri serivisi zikoreshwa cyane muri iyi minsi, bihindura imikorere.
Sosiyete itanga serivisi ku bohereza amafaranga mu Rwanda no mu mahanga ya Rwanda Cash LTD yagaragaje ko yakomeje gukora ariko yifashishije uburyo bugezweho kandi bwizewe bwo guhererekanya amafaranga bwa mobile money.
Mu Bubiligi, ibiro byose bya Moneytrans-Africash zikorana na Rwandacash LTD byahawe uburenganzira bwo gufungura no kwakira abantu hakurikijwe ingamba zatanzwe n’inzego zibishinzwe.
Naho mu Rwanda, Rwandacash LTD yabaye ifunze nkuko amabwiriza yatanzwe na Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu (BNR) abisaba kugeza ubwo hazatangwa andi avuga ku kongera gukora kw’ibigo byohererezanya amafaranga no kuvunja.
Bitewe n’amasezerano iyi sosiyete isanzwe ifitanye na MTN Rwanda binyuze muri Mobile Money, abakiliya bose bakira amafaranga mu Rwanda bayashyirirwa kuri Mobile Money gusa.
Itangazo ryayo yavuze ko “Hari n’ahongerewe imbaraga mu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga ku bohererezanya amafaranga kuri application ya https://www.moneytrans.eu/belgium/imoneytrans/.’’
Yanamenyesheje ko ishami rya Matonge i Kinshasa muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo rizafungura nihamara kugaruka agahenge nyuma y’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Abashaka kohererezanya amafaranga bifashishije Rwanda Cash-Africash-Moneytrans bashyiriweho imirongo ya telefoni bashobora kubazaho andi makuru zirimo +32 2 227 18 20 ku bari mu Bubiligi na +250 788 35 87 87 ku bo mu Rwanda.
Ikwirakwira cya Coronavirus mu mpande zose z’Isi ryahinduye imibereho ya muntu kugeza no ku ikoranabuhanga yifashisha mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Ubu imibereho y’Isi yubakiye ku bukungu bushingiye ku kudahererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) ryemeje ku wa 11 Werurwe 2020 ko Coronavirus ari icyorezo cyugarije Isi bitewe n’uburyo umubare w’abayandura wiyongera kuva yaboneka mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019.
Coronavirus imaze guhitana abantu 45 334, mu gihe abayanduye bagera ku 903 799, muri bo 190 675 barayikize.

Title: Diaspora mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Coronavirus: Icyifuzo cy’Umunyarwanda uba muri Canada
Body:
John B. Kijuli uba muri Canada yatanze icyifuzo cy’uko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora, bakwishyira hamwe bagakusanya inkunga yo kugoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu Rwanda cyane cyane abazasonza kuko batabashije kujya mu kazi kabatunze.
John B. Kijuli uba muri Canada yatanze icyifuzo cy’uko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora, bakwishyira hamwe bagakusanya inkunga yo kugoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mu Rwanda cyane cyane abazasonza kuko batabashije kujya mu kazi kabatunze.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda abagera kuri 19 ni bo bimaze kwemezwa ko banduye icyorezo cya COVID-19, giterwa na Coronavirus. Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yafashe ingamba nyinshi, aho kuri uyu wa Gatandatu yashyizeho izindi nshya.
Ingamba nshya zo kurwanya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus zatangajwe na Minisitiri w’Intebe, Dr Ngirente Edouard, zategetse ko abakozi ba leta bose n’abikorera basabwa gukorera akazi mu ngo zabo keretse abatanga serivisi z’ingenzi.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Kijuli yavuze ko izi ngamba ari ingenzi cyane kandi zizatanga umusaruro, akifuza ko Abanyarwanda baba muri diaspora bahabwa igisa nk’impuruza bakwishyira hamwe bakazagoboka abazagirwaho ingaruka n’izi ngamba cyane cyane abaryaga kuko bakoze uwo munsi ‘nyakabyizi’.
Ati “Nkaba numva mfite igitekerezo cy’uko Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga yakorana vuba na za ambasade zacu aho ziri hose zigashishikariza Abanyarwanda twese dutuye muri bino bihugu [nubwo nabo icyorezo cyabagezeho], bisa n’aho bifite amikoro tukibumbira hamwe tugafasha abavandimwe bacu bazahura n’ikibazo cy’inzara.”
Akomeza avuga ko abantu bagenda batanga nk’amadolari 100$, 50$, 10$ gukomeza ariko icyo kintu cyo ‘gutabara abavandimwe bacu kuko twese tuzi amikoro y’ibihugu byacu byo muri Afurika’.
Kijuli wigeze kuba Perezida wa Diaspora muri Edmonton na Visi Perezida ku rwego rw’Intara ya Canada, ahumuriza Abanyarwanda agira ati “Tukaba tugira ngo tubakomeze ngo mushikame kandi nta kabuza iki cyorezo abanyarwanda tuzagitsinda.”
Mu zindi ngamba Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yafashe zirimo ko ‘ubu imipaka yose irafunze, keretse ku Banyarwanda bataha n’abandi batuye mu Rwanda byemewe n’amategeko, abo bose bakaba bazashyirwa mu kato mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri ahantu hateganyijwe’.
‘Ubwikorezi bw’ibicuruzwa byinjira cyangwa bisohoka mu Rwanda burakomeza mu gihe ingendo hagati y’imijyi n’uturere tw’igihugu zitemewe keretse ku bajya kwivuza cyangwa abafite impamvu zihutirwa’.
Nyuma y’izi ngamba, Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Prof. Shyaka Anastase, yagarutse ku bantu barya kuko bakoze uwo munsi, abasaba gutekereza icyaba baramutse bagiye gushaka ayo mafaranga ariko ntibazabashe kuyabona kubera uburwayi; ahubwo abasaba gusaranganya na bagenzi babo muri bike bafite.
Minisitiri Prof Shyaka yatangaje ko Leta igiye kwishakamo ibisubizo bizafasha abantu barya ari uko bakoze ku munsi n’abandi bafite amikoro make kugira ngo mu gihe cyo kwirinda Coronavirus batazicwa n’inzara.
Ati "Hari ibizasaba nk’igihugu ko abantu baba magirirane, niba hari urugo runaka rudafite icyo gusamura, tugomba kwishakamo ubushobozi ku buryo urwo rugo turwunganira kugira ngo abarurimo tutabarinda Coronavirus ariko bakicwa n’inzara.’’
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo kugira umuriro, ibicurane, umunaniro n’inkorora ijyana no kubabara mu mihogo, guhumeka nabi bishobora no kugera aho itera umusonga no kubuza impyiko gukora bishobora gutera urupfu. Iyi ndwara ishobora kwandura binyuze mu gukora ku muntu uyirwaye, cyane cyane mu kuramukanya abantu bahana ibiganza.

Title: Abanyarwanda batuye i Burayi bahagaritse ibikorwa bibahuza mu kwirinda Coronavirus
Body:
Coronavirus ihangayikishije Isi! Abahanga mu by’ubuvuzi bari kurara amajoro bashaka urukingo n’umuti wo guhangana n’iki cyorezo gikomeje gukwirakwira Isi buri kanya.
Coronavirus ihangayikishije Isi! Abahanga mu by’ubuvuzi bari kurara amajoro bashaka urukingo n’umuti wo guhangana n’iki cyorezo gikomeje gukwirakwira Isi buri kanya.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS) ryemeje ko Coronavirus ari icyorezo [pandémie] cyugarije Isi mu itangazo ryashyize hanze ku wa 11 Werurwe 2020.
Coronavirus imaze gukwirakwira mu bihugu 123 bitandukanye ndetse kugeza ubu abarenga 125 000 barayanduye mu gihe abasaga 5000 yabahitanye. Ibi byatumye mu bihugu bitandukanye hashyirwaho ingamba zo kwirinda Coronavirus yagaragaye bwa mbere mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019.
Ingamba zafashwe mu bihugu byinshi zirimo guhagarika ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi nk’imikino, ibitaramo, inama ndetse bimwe byafunze amashuri mato na za kaminuza kugeza igihe kitaramenyekana, amaduka nk’uburyo bwo gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
U Butaliyani ku wa 12 Werurwe 2020, bwafunze amaduka yose uretse ububiko bw’ibiribwa na za farumasi, nk’uburyo bwo gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Iki gihugu cyafunze amashuri, inzu zikorerwamo siporo, inzu ndangamateka n’utubyiniro mu gihe na Shampiyona y’igihugu mu mupira w’amaguru [Serie A] nayo yahagaritswe. Abantu barenga ibihumbi 12 ni bo bamaze kwandura Coronavirus mu Butaliyani, naho abagera kuri 830 yarabahitanye.
Ibihugu by’i Burayi biri mu byugarijwe na Coronavirus yagize ingaruka ku bikorwa byari biteganyijwe, birimo n’iby’Abanyarwanda.
Guhera mu ntangiriro za Werurwe 2020 hirya no hino mu Burayi hari hateganyijwe ibikorwa bitandukanye bisanzwe bihuza Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo buri mwaka.
Ibyo bikorwa bigizwe n’amahuriro atandukanye, inama zari ziteganyijwe ku bava mu Rwanda bazikorera hirya no hino ku Isi, amamurikagurisha y’ubukerarugendo n’ingendo zari ziteganyijwe bijyanye n’ibirori bibera muri Diaspora n’ibindi.
Ingamba zafashwe n’ibihugu by’i Burayi zinubahirizwa n’Abanyarwanda babibamo ndetse na bo mu kwirinda barabihagarika mu gukaza ubwirinzi.
Mu bikorwa byasubitswe byagombaga guhuza Abanyarwanda birimo iby’Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Abagore ku Isi [ni igikorwa cyitabirwa cyane ko kigaragaza intambwe y’u Rwanda mu gusubiza umugore agaciro no kumwubakiraho iterambere ry’igihugu].
Kugeza magingo aya, Abanyarwanda baba mu Butaliyani, u Bufaransa, u Bubiligi, Budage, u Buholandi n’ibihugu byo muri Scandinavie byasubitse ibyo birori.
Mu gihe u Rwanda rwitegura kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26, Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ntibiramenyekana uko bizakorwa mu gihe iki cyorezo cyaba kigifite ubukana. Abahagarariye imiryango irengera inyungu z’abarokotse Jenoside baracyarebera hamwe uko iki gihe bizagenda.
Guverinoma y’u Bubiligi nayo yaraye iteranye ifata ibyemezo bikakaye aho amashuri abanza, ayisumbuye na za Kaminuza byafunzwe.
Kuva kuri uyu wa Gatanu kandi ahahurira abantu benshi hafunzwe usibye gusa amaduka yo guhahiramo azakomeza gufungura ndetse ibihumbi by’abaturage byazindutse bijya guhaha ku buryo hanitabajwe abashinzwe umutekano mu kuborohereza.
Uretse imiryango y’Abanyarwanda batuye mu mahanga yagizweho ingaruka zikomeye zo gusubika ibikorwa byayo, Coronavirus yanazahaje ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo kubera ihagarikwa ry’ingendo.
Isuzuma ry’Ishyirahamwe Mpuzamahanga rishinzwe gutwara abantu n’ibintu mu Kirere, IATA, ryerekanye ko ibigo mpuzamahanga bitwara abagenzi mu ndege bizahomba miliyari $113 Coronavirus nikomeza gukwirakwira.
Abaganga bagaragaza ko nubwo Coronavirus ari indwara ikomeye, ishobora kwirindwa byoroshye ariko ikanakwirakwira byoroshye. Gukaraba intoki no guhagarika kuramukanya byafasha mu kwirinda.
Umuganga Dr Soentens waganiriye na IGIHE yavuze ko umubare munini w’abarwaye Coronavirus bakira ndetse ko abapfa babiterwa nuko ibikoresho byo kubaramira biba bike, bageze mu zabukuru cyangwa basanganywe izindi ndwara zikomeye zidakira.
Kugira ngo umuntu yandure Coronavirus ni uko uyifite ayiha undi mu buryo bw’amatembabuzi ava mu mazuru cyangwa mu kanwa k’uyirwaye, kuko yandurira mu myanya y’ubuhumekero nubwo ishobora guca n’ahandi. Ni nayo mpamvu umuntu wayanduye ahita ahabwa akato.
Iyo iyi virusi imaze kugera mu bihaha niho itura, ari nayo mpamvu ibuza abantu guhumeka neza bakarwara umusonga, ari nawo ubahitana.

Title: Abanyarwanda batuye muri Australia bizihije umunsi wahariwe ibikorwa bya Commonwealth
Body:
Mu gihe u Rwanda rwifatanyaga n’Isi mu kwizihiza umunsi wahariwe ibikorwa bya Commonwealth ku wa 9 Werurwe 2020, Abanyarwanda batuye muri Australia nabo bifatanyije n’icyo gihugu mu kwizihiza uwo munsi ukomeye.
Mu gihe u Rwanda rwifatanyaga n’Isi mu kwizihiza umunsi wahariwe ibikorwa bya Commonwealth ku wa 9 Werurwe 2020, Abanyarwanda batuye muri Australia nabo bifatanyije n’icyo gihugu mu kwizihiza uwo munsi ukomeye.
Uyu muhango wo kwizihiza ibikorwa bya Commonwealth wabaye mu gihe u Rwanda rwitegura muri Kamena, kwakira inama izahuza abakuru b’ibihugu na za Guverinoma bigize Umuryango w’Ibihugu bikoresha Icyongereza, CHOGM.
Ibirori by’Abanyarwanda muri Australia byabereye mu mujyi wa Brisbane, aho bashimiwe uruhare rwabo mu gutanga urugero rwiza mu ruhando rw’amahanga.
Ni ibirori ngarukamwaka bihagurutsa Abanyarwanda b’ingeri zose; abana n’abakuru bagahagarika ibikorwa byabo kugirango baserukire u Rwanda.
Abitabiriye ibi birori basusurukijwe n’umuhanzi w’umunyarwanda, Ras Banamungu umaze kumenyerwa muri ibi birori, afatanije n’itsinda rye the Det-n-ators International, baririmba indirimbo bise “Inka”, irimo ubutumwa bw’uko akunda igihugu cyamubyaye.
Ni ibirori byitabiriwe n’abayobozi barimo Depite Paul de Jersey na Madamu we Kaye de Jersey, uhagarariye Umwamikazi muri Queensland, Umuvugizi wa Polisi ya Queensland, Barry Dinneen na Noela O’Donnell, Musenyeri Phillip Aspinall, Reverend Dr. Peter Catt, Bill Willcocks na Vicki Howard.

Title: Maroc yatangirijwemo igikorwa cyo gufasha urubyiruko rw’Abanyarwanda guhanga udushya
Body:
Mu rwego rwo gufasha Abanyarwanda biga mu mahanga guhanga imirimo izabagirira akamaro nibava ku ntebe y’ishuri, hatangijwe igikorwa cyiswe ‘Diaspora Innovation and Start up Challenge’ kigamije gushyigikira imishinga yabo no kubahuza n’ibigo bitandukanye byo mu Rwanda.
Mu rwego rwo gufasha Abanyarwanda biga mu mahanga guhanga imirimo izabagirira akamaro nibava ku ntebe y’ishuri, hatangijwe igikorwa cyiswe ‘Diaspora Innovation and Start up Challenge’ kigamije gushyigikira imishinga yabo no kubahuza n’ibigo bitandukanye byo mu Rwanda.
Iki gikorwa cyatangirijwe muri Maroc ku wa 8 Werurwe 2020 cyahuriranye n’ibirori byo kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Abagore.
Mu kiganiro bahawe hibanzwe ku gufasha Abanyarwanda guhanga udushya bakiri ku ishuri mu kwitegura kugana ku isoko ry’umurimo no guhesha abandi akazi.
Umuyobozi w’Ishami ry’Ikoranabuhanga mu Rugaga rw’Abikorera (PSF), Ntare Alex, yabwiye abitabiriye igikorwa cyo gutangiza ‘Diaspora Innovation and Start up Challenge’ ko bari guhaha ubumenyi bufite ireme bwazabafasha kwiteza imbere.
Yakomeje ati “Ni igikorwa kizahoraho kigamije gushaka udushya no gufasha abari muri diaspora bafite imishinga bahanze. Twahereye ku banyeshuri kuko baba bafite aho bakorera, bafite abarimu n’izindi nzego zibafasha nka kaminuza bashobora gukorana udushya twagirira u Rwanda na bo ubwabo akamaro.’’
Iki gikorwa cyatekerejweho nyuma yo kubona ko hari abakitinya kandi bafite ibikorwa byatanga impinduka mu buzima bw’abenegihugu.
Ati “Mu Rwanda twamaze kubona ko biri gukora kuko twatangije K-Lab na Fab Lab [inzu zihangirwamo imishinga y’ikoranabuhanga]. Abari hanze hari icyuho ko nta muntu ubakurikirana.’’
Urubyiruko ruzatoranywa nyuma yo kugaragaza impano mu mishinga y’ikoranabuhanga ruzahabwa ubufasha burimo ubwo guhuzwa n’ibigo bitandukanye.
Ati “Abanyeshuri batazi gahunda zabafasha bigatuma batinya kugaruka, bakagira ubwoba bwo gutangiza udushya twabo bavuga ko ntacyo byamara, nta bushobozi bafite, nta n’ubufasha babona. Turashaka kubakangurira no kubabwira ko hari ubufasha. Tugomba kubaba hafi ku buryo twabahuza na bagenzi babo cyangwa izindi nzego dusanzwe dukorana.’’
Ntare yifashishije urugero rw’ikoranabuhanga rya Tap&Go ryatangiye kubyara amafaranga no kugirira akamaro abarihanze.
Mu 2015 nibwo Patrick Buchana Nsenga yashinze AC Group, ikigo kiri mu by’imbere mu gutanga ibisubizo by’ikoranabuhanga, birimo iryo kwishyura amafaranga y’urugendo hakoreshejwe ikarita izwi nka Tap&Go.
Imibare yo mu 2019 igaragaza ko abantu bari bamaze gukoresha Tap&Go inshuro zirenga miliyoni 80 ndetse nibura ku munsi abagenzi bashobora kuyakoresha inshuro ibihumbi 250. Amakarita amaze gutangwa arenga miliyoni 1.5 mu gihe ifite aba-agents 311 baha serivisi abagenzi mu bice bitandukanye.
Mu butumwa bwe, Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Maroc, Sheikh Habimana Saleh, yasangije abitabiriye iki gikorwa uko bagera kuri byinshi bifashishije ubumenyi bafite.
Ati “Nabaganirije ku ruhare rw’umwari n’umutegarugori ku ruhembe rw’iterambere ry’igihugu nk’insanganyamatsiko yahawe Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Umugore nuko bahera ku gishoro gito bakagera kuri byinshi.’’
Abitabiriye ‘Diaspora Innovation and Start up Challenge’ basusurukijwe n’urubyiruko rw’abahungu n’abakobwa bibumbiye mu itorero ribyina gakondo ryo muri Maroc.
Muri gahunda ya Guverinoma y’imyaka irindwi izarangira mu 2024, biteganyijwe ko i Kigali hazubakwa ahantu hihariye hazafasha Abanyarwanda n’abanyamahanga bafite impano zihariye kurushaho guhanga ibishya (Kigali Innovation City), gushyiraho Ikigega kigamije guteza imbere imishinga y’ikoranabuhanga n’ibindi.
U Rwanda na Maroc bifitanye umubano mwiza ushingiye ku ngeri nyinshi zirimo nk’uburezi, aho magingo aya hari Abanyarwanda basaga 100 biga muri icyo gihugu, mu mashami arimo Ubuvuzi, Engineering n’ibindi.
Mu minsi ishize, Ambasaderi Habimana yasuye ibigo byashyiriweho guhanga udushya mu ikoranabuhanga mu Rwanda, birimo K Lab, asobanurirwa imikorere n’umusanzu bimaze gutanga mu iterambere ry’u Rwanda.

Title: Abanyarwanda batuye muri Mozambique bakoze umuganda mu Mujyi wa Maputo (Amafoto)
Body:
Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Mozambique ifatanyije na Minisiteri y’Ubutaka n’Ibidukikije n’Umujyi wa Maputo, bakoze Umuganda rusange witabiriwe n’Abanyarwanda batuye Maputo, inshuti zabo n’abaturage batuye ahitwa Mafalala aho umuganda wakorewe.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Mozambique ifatanyije na Minisiteri y’Ubutaka n’Ibidukikije n’Umujyi wa Maputo, bakoze Umuganda rusange witabiriwe n’Abanyarwanda batuye Maputo, inshuti zabo n’abaturage batuye ahitwa Mafalala aho umuganda wakorewe.
Abitabiriye umuganda wakozwe ku nshuro ya mbere muri Mozambique bageraga kuri 350, bazibuye ruhurura y’amazi, basukura umuhanda witwa Rua de Timor, bakuraho n’ibyatsi birebire byarengereye iyo ruhurura.
Igikorwa cyakozwe cyatumye amazi yari yararetse muri iyo ruhurura agatera indwara n’umwuka mubi abahaturiye, yongera gutemba.
Abari bahagarariye Minisiteri y’Ubutaka n’Ibidukikije ndetse n’abari bahagarariye ubuyobozi bw’umujyi wa Maputo, bashimye igikorwa cyakozwe n’Abanyarwanda ku bufatanye n’abaturage b’aho, bizeza ubufatanye no kugikangurira abandi.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Mozambique, Nikobisanzwe Claude, yasobanuye ko Umuganda ugaragaza umuco mwiza Abanyarwanda bafite wo gufatanya no gushyira hamwe mu bikorwa rusange by’amajyambere, babungabunga ibidukikije, gusukura aho batuye ndetse hirindwa n’indwara z’ibyorezo.
Yashimiye abitabiriye umuganda bagaragaje urugero rwiza ku baturage ba Maputo, anabakangurira kuzitabira ari benshi umuganda utaha maze bakereka ubuyobozi n’abaturage babakiriye muri Mozambique, ko bafatanyije bagira uruhare mu iterambere ry’umujyi wa Maputo n’igihugu muri rusange.
Abaturage ba Mozambique bitabiriye umuganda ari benshi bishimiye igikorwa cyo gusukura aho batuye, banashima ubwitange n’umurava wakoranywe ndetse na Ambasade yawuteguye.
Uyu muganda washimangiye umubano mwiza hagati y’u Rwanda na Mozambique, unaba uburyo bwo gusabana hagati y’Abanyarwanda n’abaturage ba Maputo.

Title: Itsinda ry’Abanyarwandakazi baba mu Bubiligi riri mu bikorwa by’ubugiraneza mu Rwanda
Body:
Abanyarwandakazi umunani baba mu Bubiligi barimo Depite muri Wallonie, Joëlle Kapompolé unafite inkomoko mu Rwanda bari mu gihugu mu bikorwa byo gutera inkunga imishinga y’Abanyarwandakazi isanzwe ikora ibikorwa bitandukanye by’ubugiraneza.
Abanyarwandakazi umunani baba mu Bubiligi barimo Depite muri Wallonie, Joëlle Kapompolé unafite inkomoko mu Rwanda bari mu gihugu mu bikorwa byo gutera inkunga imishinga y’Abanyarwandakazi isanzwe ikora ibikorwa bitandukanye by’ubugiraneza.
Ni ibikorwa bamazemo iminsi kuva bagera mu Rwanda ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020, aho basuye imiryango itandukanye irimo uwitwa Nka Tabita ufasha abana baturuka mu miryango itishoboye kubona irerero ugafasha n’ababyeyi babo mu bikorwa by’iterambere.
Indi miryango yasuwe n’iri tsinda ni uwitwa Komeza Intambwe ufasha abakobwa babyariye iwabo kwigira, uboroza amatungo magufi n’uwitwa Izere Mubyeyi ubarizwamo abana bafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe basanzwe bafashwa na Uwitonze Clémentine [Tonzi].
Umuyobozi uhagarariye abagore muri Diaspora Rugali mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles mu Bubiligi akaba n’umwe mu bagize iri tsinda, Uwamariya Goretti, yavuze ko iki gitekerezo bakigize nyuma ya Rwanda Day yabereye i Bon mu Budage maze batangira gukusanya inkunga bagamije kugira icyo bafasha abategarugori bo mu Rwanda batagize amahirwe nk’ayabo.
Yavuze ko bahisemo abagore kubera ko basa nk’abakiri inyuma mu bijyanye no kwigira.
Ati “Murabizi neza ko abagore aribo bakiri inyuma, baracyafite ibibazo mu by’ubukungu hari bamwe batize ndetse hari abana b’abakobwa batewe inda bakiri bato bibabuza gukomeza kwiga. Izo ni zimwe mu mpamvu zatumye dutekereza guhera ku badamu ariko nitubarangiza n’abagabo nabo tuzabageraho.”
Kuri Uwamariya ibi bikorwa bamazemo iminsi byaberetse ko umugore wo mu cyaro ashoboye mu gihe cyose yaba yahawe ubushobozi.
Ati “Kuba twakoze iki gikorwa byaduhaye ishusho ya nyayo y’umugore wo mu cyaro. Ni abagore b’intwari, bafite imbaraga uramutse ubafashije kwifasha barazamuka vuba cyane, icyo bakeneye ni ukuba umuntu yabafata akaboko akabatinyura mbese bakigirira icyizere bikozwe hirya no hino umugore yazamuka vuba cyane”
N’ubwo iri tsinda ritashatse gutangaza umubare w’amafaranga ritanga muri ibi bikorwa buri muryango risuye riwusigira inkunga y’amafaranga.
Imiryango yasuwe n’iri tsinda yashimye iki gikorwa cy’ubugiraneza yakorewe ivuga ko inkunga yahawe igiye kuyifasha kunoza ibyo yakoraga.
Umuyobozi wa ‘Komeza Intambwe’, Kandutiye Françoise, yavuze ko inkunga yahawe n’iri tsinda izamufasha kwagura ibikorwa by’ubugiraneza umuryango we usanzwe ukorera mu Murenge wa Mageragere birimo koroza inkwavu abakobwa babyariye iwabo no kubaha amafaranga yo gutangira imishinga y’ubucuruzi.
Ati “Inkunga izadufasha cyane, harimo abo nka ‘Komeza Intambwe’ twagiye dufasha ariko bagishaka gukomeza gutera imbere ariko tukaba nta bundi bushobozi twari dufite bwo guhita tubafasha gukomeza kugera aho bifuza kugera nonaha. Turumva iyo nkunga batugeneye izadufasha mu gukomeza gushyigikira iriya mishinga yabo twatangiranye kuko yari igeze ahantu heza ariko nta bushobozi bwo gukomeza kuyishyigikira.”
Iri tsinda ry’abagore baba mu Bubiligi ryagize umwanya wo kwicarana n’abari n’abategarugori baba muri ‘Komeza Intambwe’ bumva aho bavuye naho bageze maze babagaragariza n’imbogamizi bagihura nazo nabo biyemeza kubafasha kuzikemura.
Mungwarakarama Esther umwe mu bategarugori basanzwe bafashwa na Komeza Intambwe yavuze ko inkunga y’iri tsinda izamushoboza kugira ibindi yakora binyuze muri uyu muryango asanzwe abarizwamo.
Ati “Mu by’ukuri nubwo dufite uyu mushinga w’inkwavu tworojwe ariko hari ibindi tuzi gukora hari n’ibyo dushoboye numva wenda hari ubushobozi hari icyo bamfasha bantera inkunga ngashobora no gukora ibindi.’’
Iri tsinda ry’Abanyarwandakazi baba mu Bubiligi kandi ryasuye umuryango ‘Izere Mubyeyi’ usanzwe ufasha abana bafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe, riwizeza kuzakomeza kuwufasha mu bikorwa by’ubugiraneza ukora.
Ibikorwa by’iri tsinda ry’Abanyarwandakazi byashimwe n’abayobozi bo mu nzego z’ibanze barimo n’Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Mageragere, Ntirushwa Christophe, wibukije abarigize ko amazi adakwiye gushyuha ngo yibagirwe iwabo wa mbeho.
Iritsinda kandi ryagize umwanya wo kubonana n’abayobozi batandukanye mu Rwanda barimo Perezida w’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda, Umutwe w’Abadepite, Mukabalisa Donatille n’uwahoze ari Minisitiri w’Uburinganire n’Iterambere ry’Umuryango, Nyirahabimana Solina aho baganiriye ku iterambere ry’umugore n’umwana w’umukobwa muri rusange n’amategeko abarengera.

Title: Liège: Abanyarwanda bashinze ishuri rifasha abana babo kwiga Ikinyarwanda n’umuco
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye, bakorera n’abiga mu mahanga, bakomeje kwagura u Rwanda babicishije mu bikorwa bitandukanye. Abo mu mujyi wa Liège mu Bubiligi bashinze ishuri bise Umuco, ryitezweo gufasha abana babo kwiga neza Ikinyarwanda n’umuco nyarwanda.
Abanyarwanda batuye, bakorera n’abiga mu mahanga, bakomeje kwagura u Rwanda babicishije mu bikorwa bitandukanye. Abo mu mujyi wa Liège mu Bubiligi bashinze ishuri bise Umuco, ryitezweo gufasha abana babo kwiga neza Ikinyarwanda n’umuco nyarwanda.
Tariki ya 16 Gashyantare IGIHE yanyarukiye mu mujyi wa Liège ahari abanyarwanda batari bake bagize Diaspora nyarwanda, DRB-Rugari Liège, itembera mu ishiri ‘Umuco’.
Iryo shuri ryatangiye mu mpera z‘umwaka ushize wa 2019, bagamije kwishakamo ibisubizo no gufasha abana babo guhorana indangagaciro z’umuco nyarwanda.
Twagirimana uyobora DRB-Rugari-Liège yavuze ko igikorwa batangiye kizafasha abana b’abanyarwanda bari mu mahanga kunga ubumwe no gusigasira umuco nyarwanda.
Ati “Twagerageje kwishakamo uburyo ngo dushyireho iri shuri aho abana bacu bazajya bahurira bakiga Ikinyarwanda, umuco w‘aho bakomoka, rikababera kandi ihuriro ryo kumenyana, kunga ubumwe no gusabana mu gihe bari no kwiga ibijyanye n‘imbyino, indirimbo n‘imihamirizo kuko nabyo n‘igice cy‘amasomo biga.”
Twagirimana yavuze ko iyo abana bigishijwe ayo masomo barushaho gusobanukirwa amateka y’u Rwanda no kuvuga neza Ikinyarwanda.
Ati “Kugira ngo tubigereho habayeho ko ababyeyi babigiramo uruhare batanga umusanzu, ariwo uvamo ibikoresho by‘imfashanyigisho, ubwishingizi bw‘aho dukorera hagize habaye impanuka n‘ibindi. Iki gikorwa gihuza abana n‘ababyeyi babo, usanga bahahurira bagakina igisoro, bakaganira mbese n‘ihuriro n‘ishuri kuri twese.”
 Uyu muyobozi avuga ko icyabagoye ari ukubona abarimu bafite ubumenyi bwifuzwaga kandi bagakorera ubushake, gusa ngo baje kubabona.
Muri iryo shuri harimo ibyiciro bitatu. Abana bafite kuva ku myaka itatu kugeza kuri itandatu biga ukwabo, abo kuva kuri irindwi kugeza ku myaka icumi bakajya ukwabo no kuva kva kuri cumi ukazamura.
Bahabwa amasomo kabiri cyangwa gatatu mu kwezi kuko biga icyumeru kimwe bagasimbuka ikindi bityo bityo.
Isaha ya mbere biga Ikinyarwanda, isaha ikurikiyeho bakiga kubyina bya kinyarwanda n‘ibijyanye n‘umuco n’amateka y‘u Rwanda.
Umwe mu babyeyi bagize ubuyobozi bwa DRB Rugari Liege, Sakumi Sylvie yagize ati “ Ikintu gishimishije cyane ni ukubona ukuntu abana babikunze bitabira batinuba. Iyo umwana wanjye akoze nk‘agakosa nkamubwira ko muhanisha kutaza mu ishuri Umuco, ubwo ntiyongera gukosa kuko kuri bo gusiba ibyo byiza babonye ntibishoboka.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Hari n‘abana bakubwira bati ko icyumweru kitagera ngo tujye mu Rwanda kuko kuri bo kuza kwiga mu ishuri Umuco ni ukuza mu Rwanda, ibi byose rero biratunezaza cyane bikaduha imbaraga zo gukomeza.”
Umwana witwa Timothée Kwizera ufite imyaka icumi yavuze ko kumenya Ikinyarwanda kuri we ari inyungu.
Ati “Ndanezerewe cyane kuko kwiga Ikinyarwanda ni ikintu nemereye bene wacu bari mu Rwanda, ko ngomba kukimenya ngo njye nganira nabo kandi iyo nje aha mpura n‘abandi banyarwanda tukamenyana.”
 Ishuri Umuco gahunda yaryo ni ugutangira saa kumi kugeza saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba.
Twagirimana yifuza ko amashuri nk‘aya bishobotse buri duce twa DRB Rugari mu Bubiligi twabikora nk‘umuhigo kuko asanga bifasha ababyeyi n’abana.
