Title: Abayobozi ba Diaspora Nyarwanda muri Amerika bahawe imihigo yo kwesa
Body:
Ku nshuro ya mbere mu mateka abayobozi ba Diaspora Nyarwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika basinye imihigo y’ibyo bagomba gukora mu mwaka wa 2020- 2021 ku isonga birimo guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda no guhangana n’abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ku nshuro ya mbere mu mateka abayobozi ba Diaspora Nyarwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika basinye imihigo y’ibyo bagomba gukora mu mwaka wa 2020- 2021 ku isonga birimo guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda no guhangana n’abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Iyi mihigo yasinyiwe mu mwiherero ngarukamwaka wahuje abayobozi 27 ba za diaspora bahuriye Washington DC. Wigiwemo ibyateza imbere umuryango Nyarwanda n’uruhare rw’abo mu mahanga mu guteza imbere igihugu cyababyaye binajyanye n’icyerekerezo 2050.
Perezida w’Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda baba muri Amerika yashimiye abayobozi n’abafatanyabikorwa babo bitabiriye uwo mwiherero wabaga ku nshuro ya gatandatu.
Babwiwe ko mu byo biyemeje umwaka ushize byo kongeraho RCA nshya eshanu mu rwego rwo kwegera Umunyarwanda ahari hose muri Amerika bawurengejeho bakaba uyu mwaka bawutangiye barashyizeho zirindwi.
Yagize ati “Intambwe twateye ntisubira inyuma kandi tuzakomeza kwegera Umunyarwanda aho ari hose muri gahunda izagera muri leta 50.’’
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Mukantabana Mathilde, yashimiye abayobozi ibikorwa byiza bakora mu kugaragaza isura nziza y’u Rwanda.
Yabasabye gushyira hamwe kugira ngo biyubake kandi banigira hamwe icyateza imbere u Rwanda.
Ambasaderi Mukantabana yijeje ubufatanye bwa Ambasade mu gihe cyose bazayiyambaza.
Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Prof Anastase Shyaka, yibukije abayobozi ba Diaspora Nyarwanda ko aribo bahanzwe amaso nk’abareberera inyungu z’intara ya gatandatu y’u Rwanda.
Yakomeje ati “Nimwe ba meya na ba guverineri mu ntara ya gatandatu. Mufite inshingano zo kumenya neza umubare w’abaturage mufite bityo bikabafasha gufata ingamba zifatika no kwesa imihigo mukoresheje imibare n’ibipimo bifatika.’’
Yabibukije ko bakwiye gushyira Ubunyarwanda muri byose kugira ngo binabafashe kugaruza intama zatakaye.
Muri uyu mwiherero hanabaye ibiganiro byagaragarijwemo intambwe imiryango y’Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga (RCA) bagezeho biyubaka, uko bateza imbere ishoramari n’izindi gahunda zigamije guteza imbere ubukungu bw’u Rwanda n’imibereho y’abaturage.
Abawitabiriye bemeje ko mu mwaka wa 2020-2021 imihigo yahurijweho izatangirwa raporo kuri Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu.
Mu mihigo yasinyiwe harimo kugaragaza ubumwe n’ubwiyunge muri za RCA no gushyira Ubunyarwanda imbere mu rwego rwo gucyura intama zatakaye, kurwanya abifuriza u Rwanda nabi n’abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi; kongera imbaraga mu gukangurira Abanyamerika gusura u Rwanda binyuze muri gahunda yo kumenyekanisha ibyiza birurimo ‘Visit Rwanda’, aha buri RCA izajya igaragaza ibyiza by’u Rwanda binyuze mu mamurikagurisha y’ubukerarugendo abera mu mijyi 27 ya Amerika; gushakira isoko ibicuruzwa bya Made In Rwanda mu isoko rya Amerika; kubaka ubucuti hagati y’imijyi batuyemo n’iyo mu Rwanda ndetse no kwigisha umuco, ururimi, imbyino n’indangagaciro Nyarwanda.
Buri muyobozi yasabwe kuzatanga raporo y’ibyakozwe nyuma y’umwaka. Uyu mwiherero wasojwe abayobozi bifatanya n’Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo mu gusengera u Rwanda no kururagiza Imana.

Title: USA: Minisitiri Shyaka yasabye abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga gukomeza kuba umwe
Body:
Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Prof Anastase Shyaka, yasabye abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga gukomeza kuba umwe no guhorana u Rwanda ku mutima mu byo bakora byose.
Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Prof Anastase Shyaka, yasabye abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga gukomeza kuba umwe no guhorana u Rwanda ku mutima mu byo bakora byose.
Yabitangaje tariki 8 Gashyantare muri Leta ya Maryland, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu muhango ngarukamwaka wo gusengera u Rwanda uzwi nka Annual Rwanda Prayer Banquet wabereye muri Sheraton Hotel.
Ni ku nshuro ya 18 abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga, inshuti z’u Rwanda bavuye mu bice bitandukanye bya Amerika birimo Washington DC, Maryland na Virginia n’ahandi, bahura bagashimira Imana ibyo yagejeje kuri bo n’igihugu cyabo, no kuyiragiza umwaka mushya.
Mu myaka 18 ishize, intego y’uyu muhango wo gusengera u Rwanda iracyari ukuragiza Imana u Rwanda, gusengera abayobozi barwo, abaturage barwo, guteza imbere ubumwe, kwizera n’urukundo.
Minisitiri Anastase Shyaka wari umushyitsi mukuru, yasobanuriye abari aho indangangaciro zigaragaraza umuyobozi mwiza kandi ukomeye, aboneraho umwanya wo gusaba abanyarwanda bari mu mahanga gukomeza kunga ubumwe no kuzirikana u Rwanda mu byo bakora byose.
Perezida wa Rwanda Prayer Banquet, Antoinette Kanyabutembo, yashimiye abitabiriye iryo sengesho rigamije kuragiza Imana u Rwanda, abasaba gusengera amezi make asigaye ngo icyerecyezo igihugu cyari cyarihaye cya 2020 kirangire no kuyiragiza icyerecyezo gishya 2050.
Umushoramari Dale Dawson uri no mu bajyanama ba Perezida Paul Kagame, yahishuye uburyo bwa mbere aza mu Rwanda yabitewe na Musenyeri John Rucyahana, yahagera akumva ahamagariwe gufasha abanyarwanda.
Yahise ashinga umuryango Bridge2Rwanda ufasha abanyeshuri b’abanyarwanda b’abahanga kubona uburezi mpuzamahanga no gukurura abashoramari kuza gushora imari yabo mu Rwanda. Guhera mu 2002, Dawson na Bridge2Rwanda bagize uruhare mu gutangiza no guteza imbere ubucuruzi butandukanye n’indi mishinga igamije guteza imbere abaturage.
Umuyobozi wungirije wa Kaminuza y’u Rwanda ushinzwe iterambere, Dr Charles Muligande yagarutse ku rugendo rwe ubwo yagarukaga mu Rwanda mu 1994 avuye i Washington DC , avuga ku ngorane igihugu cyahuye nazo n’uburyo cyongeye kwiyubaka . Muligande kandi yavuze ko kwizera n’agakiza aribyo byagiye bimuyobora mu mirimo yose yagiye ashingwa.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Mathilde Mukantabana yasabye umwanya wo gusengera abayobozi ba diaspora nyarwanda, abateguye ayo masengesho n’abandi kugira ngo babashe gusohoza inshingano bahawe.
Uyu mwaka insanganyamatsiko y’umuhango wo gusengera u Rwanda yari ijambo riboneka muri Zaburi igice cya 100:5 rivuga riti “Kuko Uwiteka ari mwiza, Imbabazi ze zihoraho iteka ryose, Umurava we uhoraho ibihe byose.”

Title: IBUKA France yabonye umuyobozi mushya
Body:
Nsanzimana Etienne yatorewe kuyobora Umuryango uharanira Inyungu z’Abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Bufaransa (IBUKA France) asimbuye Dr Kabanda Marcel wari umaze igihe kitari gito awuyobora, wanashimiwe aho yarawugejeje.
Nsanzimana Etienne yatorewe kuyobora Umuryango uharanira Inyungu z’Abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Bufaransa (IBUKA France) asimbuye Dr Kabanda Marcel wari umaze igihe kitari gito awuyobora, wanashimiwe aho yarawugejeje.
Umuyobozi mushya wa IBUKA France ifite icyicaro i Paris yemerejwe mu Nteko Rusange isanzwe yateraniye i Paris ku wa 8 Gashyantare 2020.
Iyi nteko yagaragarijwemo ibikorwa byakozwe mu 2019, byemejwe binatorwa ku bwiganze bw’abayitabiriye. Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa IBUKA France, Ngaruye Ildephonse, yanagaragaje raporo ku mikoreshereze y’amafaranga na yo yemejwe.
Inteko rusange yemeje Nsanzimana Etienne ku mwanya wa Perezida; Visi Perezida ni Jessica Mwiza Gérondal; Ngaruye Ildephonse yongeye kugirwa Umunyamabanga Mukuru akaba yungirijwe na Munderere Enatha; Umubitsi ni Umugwaneza Gloriose na Kalisa Christian umwungirije. Aba bayobozi batorewe manda y’imyaka itatu.
Inshingano Nsanzimana yahawe azazifatanya no kuyobora IBUKA Europe, kuko u Bufaransa aribwo bugezweho, bugomba kuyobora uwo muryango hashingiwe ku mitererere yawo igena ko ibihugu bisimburana ku buyobozi.
Ibuka-Europe ni ihuriro ryatangiye mu 2003, amasezerano yo gukora byemewe n’amategeko ashyirirwaho umukono i Paris tariki ya 20 Ugushyingo 2010.
Nsanzimana w’imyaka 45 atuye i Paris mu Bufaransa aho abana n’umuryango we, umugore n’abana babiri. Uyu mugabo yari amaze igihe kirekire ari umwe mu bagaragara bya hafi mu bikorwa bitandukanye bitegurwa na IBUKA, haba mu Burayi cyangwa mu Rwanda.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Nsanzimana yavuze ko yishimiye icyizere yagiriwe cyo guhabwa inshingano zo kuyobora IBUKA France.
Yagize ati “Nishimiye kuba natorewe kuba Perezida wa IBUKA France. Ndashimira Dr Kabanda wayoboraga uyu muryango ku bikorwa yawugejejeho. Ngiye gutera ikirenge mu cye. Nzakomereza aho yari ageze kuko yakoze ibikorwa bikomeye.’’
IBUKA France yatangiye kugirana ibihe byiza n’iki gihugu. Umwaka wa 2019 wagaragaje agacu ko guhindura intekerezo ku ruhare rw’u Bufaransa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi no kwibuka ayo mahano nk’uburyo bwo guha agaciro inzirakarengane z’Abatutsi basaga miliyoni bambuwe ubuzima.
Mu 2019 u Bufaransa bwasohoye iteka rya Perezida wa Repubulika n° 2019-435 ryo ku wa 13 Gicurasi 2019, rigena ko kuwa 7 Mata, ari itariki ngarukamwaka yo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ingingo ya Mbere y’iri teka ivuga ko ‘Itariki ngarukamwaka yo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ni 7 Mata’.
Ingingo ya Kabiri ivuga ko ‘Buri mwaka kuri iyi tariki, ibikorwa byo kwibuka bizajya bitegurwa i Paris. Ibikorwa nk’ibi kandi bishobora gutegurwa kandi muri buri ntara bigizwemo uruhare n’umuyobozi wayo [Perefe]’.
Ingingo ya Gatatu yaryo ivuga ko Minisitiri w’Intebe afite inshingano zo gushyira mu bikorwa iri teka, rizasohoka mu igazeti ya leta ya Repubulika y’u Bufaransa.
Iteka ryashyizweho rizafungura amarembo ku bikorwa byo kwibuka bizajya bitegurirwa i Paris nkuko bisanzwe ariko bikanagera mu zindi ntara.
IBUKA France yagaragaje ko iki cyemezo ari intangiriro nziza mu kongera kunoza umubano w’impande zombi. Uyu muryango ufite inzibutso za Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, zirenze 10 mu Bufaransa.

Title: U Buholandi: Itsinda ry’abanyarwanda mu rugendo shuri ku bikorwa by’ubuhinzi bugezweho
Body:
Guhera tariki ya 3 kugeza tariki ya 9 Gashyantare 2020, Itsinda rigizwe n’abantu 15 bavuye mu Rwanda, bagiriye urugendo shuri mu gihugu cy’u Buholandi rugamije guteza imbere ubuhinzi bw’u Rwanda.
Guhera tariki ya 3 kugeza tariki ya 9 Gashyantare 2020, Itsinda rigizwe n’abantu 15 bavuye mu Rwanda, bagiriye urugendo shuri mu gihugu cy’u Buholandi rugamije guteza imbere ubuhinzi bw’u Rwanda.
Abagize iryo tsinda baturutse muri Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi, Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe ubuhinzi n’ubworozi (RAB) no muri Minisiteri y’Uburezi.
Urugendo shuri rukaba rwari rugamije kureba no kugereranya uko gahunda z’u Rwanda zo gusangira amakuru, ubumenyi n’ubuhanga mu buhinzi zihagaze ugereranyije n’izo muri Leta y’u Buholandi mu buhinzi kugira ngo habeho ubufatanye bwo guhindura no kujyana n’imikorere igezweho mu bigo byigenga, ibya Leta, mu burezi hagendewe ku byo u Buholandi bwagezeho mu mu mikoranire y’inzego z’iterambere muri gahunda bwise ‘Triple Helix’.
Ubu buryo bw’imikorere (The Triple Helix Model of Innovation), ni uburyo bw’imikoranire bukoreshwa mu bashakashatsi muri za Kaminuza no mu bindi bigo bitandukanye, byaba ibya Leta y’u Buholandi cyangwa ibyigenga, mu rwego rwo guteza imbere ubukungu n’imibereho myiza y’abaturage.
Iri tsinda ryavuye mu Rwanda ryashoboye kandi kwibonera uburyo mbarutso u Buholandi bwashoboye guhindura imikorere n’imikoranire ku buryo izo serivisi zo gutanga ubumenyi n’amakuru mu buhinzi byavuye mu maboko ya leta bikajya mu maboko y’abikorera mu buryo bwa tekiniki burambye kandi bwihagije mu ngengo y’imari.
Ni uburyo mbarutso buboneye buzafasha kunoza gahunda ya Minagri yitwa ‘Twigire Muhinzi’, igamije kuzakoreshwa mu kwagura ibikorwa by’iterambere mu buhinzi bwitwa ‘Customized Agriculture Extension System (CAES)’ mu Cyongereza.
Mu buryo bwimbitse rero iyi gahunda yari igamije kurebera hamwe uburyo habaho ubufatanye hagati y’ibihugu byombi mu bihe biri imbere, kongera imbaraga mu buvugizi mu bijyanye na gahunda z’ubuhinzi no gukomeza kongera ibibura ngo habeho ubumenyi bwifuzwa ku banyeshuri bajya kwiga mu Buholandi ibijyanye n’ubuhinzi.
Abanyarwanda bagize iri tsinda bagize umwanya kandi wo gusura ahantu hatandukanye, ibiro bikuru bya Minisiteri y’ubuhinzi mu Buholandi, Kaminuza y’Ubuhinzi ya Wageningen n’iya Van Hall Larenstein, Ikigo cy’ubworozi cya Deventer, Ikigo mpuzamahanga cy’ibirayi (World Potato City) mu mujyi wa Emmeloord, aha hakaba hazwi ko hera ibirayi cyane.
Basuye kandi ishuri tekiniki ry’ubworozi (Dairy Campus) mu ntara ya Friesland izwi ku rwego mpuzamahanga mu kwigisha uburyo bugezweho bwo korora kijyambere hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga nka za mudasobwa.
Iyi gahunda yashobotse ku bufatanye bwa Minagri, Ambasade y’u Buholandi mu Rwanda, RDB, RAB, RVO, NUFFIC n’Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi.
Itsinda ryavuye mu Rwanda kandi ryakiriwe na Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Buholandi Jean Pierre Karabaranga n’abakozi ba Ambassade, banahura n’abanyeshuri b’Abanyarwanda biga mu Buholandi by’umwihariko abarimo bakurikira amasomo mu bijyanye n’Ubuhinzi.
Baganiriye uko ibyo urugendo shuri rwagenze n’uburyo bazajya babihererekanyaho amakuru buri muntu ku rwego rwe ngo bigirire u Rwanda akamaro.

Title: U Bwongereza: Abanyarwanda bizihije Umunsi w’Intwari, banerekwa filimi The 600
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bwongereza bifatanyije n’inshuti zabo mu birori byo kwizihiza Umunsi w’Intwari byanerekaniwemo filimi The 600 igaragaza uko Inkotanyi zarwanye urugamba rwo guhagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bwongereza bifatanyije n’inshuti zabo mu birori byo kwizihiza Umunsi w’Intwari byanerekaniwemo filimi The 600 igaragaza uko Inkotanyi zarwanye urugamba rwo guhagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Ibi birori byizihirijwe mu ishuri rya Harrow riri mu bigo by’amateka mu Bwami bw’u Bwongereza ku wa Gatandatu w’icyumweru gishize. Iryo shuri ryatangiye 1572 ryizwemo n’abarimo Winston Churchill wabaye Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Bwongereza (1940-1945), Hussein bin Talal wabaye Umwami wa Jordania hagati ya tariki ya 11 Kanama 1952 kugeza mu 1999 n’Umuyobozi w’Ikirenga (Emir) wa Qatar, Sheikh Taimim bin Hamad Al Thani.
Ni igikorwa cyitabiriwe n’abasaga 300 batuye mu Bwongereza harimo abanyeshuri, inshuti z’u Rwanda, abagize gahunda ya Commonwealth Future Programme n’abandi.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Bwongereza, Karitanyi Yamina, yashimiye abaje kwifatanya n’Abanyarwanda muri uwo muhango.
Mu ijambo rye yikije ku kuvuga ibigwi ingabo zitangiye u Rwanda asaba abashyitsi kutayoborwa n’umuhate gusa ahubwo n’urukundo rw’igihugu n’abaturage barwo.
Kalemera Kalisa Jonathan umwe mu Banyarwanda bamaze igihe mu Bwongereza yatanze ikiganiro kigaragaza ishusho y’uburyo ubutwari bushobora kutaba urugamba rw’amasasu gusa. Yavuze ko ubutwari ari “gukorera abandi.’’
Yatanze urugero rw’umusore witwa Emmanuel Niringiyimana wamenyekanye kubera ko yakoresheje amaboko ye yubaka umuhanda uhuza Gashari na Murambi mu Karere ka Karongi mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba.
Yagize ati “Yabikoreye abandi atari we ubwe.”
Yasabye kandi abitabiriye iki gikorwa kuba intwari aho bari hose no mu byo bakora byose abaha urugero rwo kwigira ku Nkotanyi zageze kuri byinshi nubwo zitari zifite ubushobozi.
Abitabiriye iki gikorwa beretswe filimi “The 600: Soldiers’ Story”. Iyi filimi igaragaza uburyo Batayo ya Gatatu y’Ingabo zahoze ari iza FPR-Inkotanyi yari mu nyubako y’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yahoze yitwa CND, yarokoye Abatutsi benshi muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 kandi ingabo zari ziyigize zararutwaga ubwinshi n’abasirikare ba Leta yateguye Jenoside.
Yanditswe inakorwa na Richard Hall ukomoka muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, muri Great Blue Productions. Uyu yatwaye igihembo cya Emmy Award, akaba atunganya ibiganiro bya za televiziyo i Los Angeles. Hall amaze imyaka 25 akora uyu mwuga wo gutunganya filime.
Gutunganya iyi filimi yabifashijwemo na A Wize Media y’i Kigali ya Annette Uwizeye ari nayo ihagarariye iyo filime.
Uyu mwaka insanganyamatsiko yagiraga iti ‘‘Ubutwari mu Banyarwanda, agaciro kacu.’’ukaba usanzwe wizihizwa tariki ya 1 Gashyantare.
Intwari z’u Rwanda ziri mu byiciro bitatu ari byo Imanzi igizwe n’Umusirikare utazwi na General Major Fred Gisa Rwigema; Imena zirimo Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa, Rwagasana Michel, Agathe Uwiringiyimana, Niyitegeka Félicité n’Abanyeshuri b’Inyange. Icyiciro cya gatatu n’Ingenzi ariko nta ntwari n’imwe irashyirwamo.

Title: Abanyarwanda baba muri Diaspora bafunguriwe konti yo gufasha Mutuelle de santé
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga n’Ubutwererane Mpuzamahanga y’u Rwanda yatangaje ko hashyizweho uburyo bwo korohereza abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga gutanga umusanzu wabo mu gufasha gahunda y’ubwisungane mu kwivuza (Mutuelle de santé), mu rwego rwo gushyira mu bikorwa umwanzuro w’Inama y’Igihugu y’Umushyikirano ya 17.
Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga n’Ubutwererane Mpuzamahanga y’u Rwanda yatangaje ko hashyizweho uburyo bwo korohereza abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga gutanga umusanzu wabo mu gufasha gahunda y’ubwisungane mu kwivuza (Mutuelle de santé), mu rwego rwo gushyira mu bikorwa umwanzuro w’Inama y’Igihugu y’Umushyikirano ya 17.
Mu ibaruwa yandikiwe abahagarariye u Rwanda mu mahanga bose, Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga n’Ubutwererane Mpuzamahanga yabasabye kumenyesha abanyarwanda bose ko inkunga yose iturutse muri Diaspora igamiie ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya gahunda y’Ubwisungane mu kwivuza izajya ishyirwa kuri konti ya RSSB nomero 440207884 yitwa RSSB-CBHI iherereye muri KCB Bank.
Mu myanzuro 12 yafatiwe mu nama y’lgihugu y’Umushyikirano ya 17 yateraniye i Kigali kuwa 19 kugeza ku ya 20 Ukuboza 2019, umwanzuro wa 8 wasabaga ko hashyirwaho uburyo bwo gufasha abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga kunganira ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya gahunda za leta zinyuranye harimo Ubwisungane mu Kwivuza (Mutuelle de Sante) no gukoresha ubumenyi bafite mu ngeri zitandukanye iyo baje mu kiruhuko mu Rwanda.
Ibikorwa bishyigikira iterambere ry’u Rwanda biturutse mu banyarwanda baba mu mahanga byiyongera umunsi ku wundi. Muri byo harimo gushora imari mu bikorwa bitandukanye by’ubucuruzi mu Rwanda, gushyigikira gahunda za Leta zitandukanye zigamije iterambere rusange n’ibindi.
Mu mpera z’umwaka ushize Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda, BNR, yavuze ko kuva mu 2010 kugera 2019, amafaranga Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bohereza imbere mu gihugu yiyongereye ku gipimo cya 158%.
Kimwe mu bikorwa byagize uruhare rukomeye mu gufasha abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga kongera uruhare rwabo mu iterambere ry’igihugu ni ‘Rwanda Day’, aho kuva yatangira mu 2010, yasize amateka akomeye mu mpande zose z’Isi, ariko inaba ikivumbikisho cyatumye uruhare rwa diaspora nyarwanda mu iterambere ry’ubukungu bw’igihugu rwiyongera mu buryo budasanzwe.
Imibare ya Banki Nkuru y’igihugu, BNR, igaragaza ko mbere y’uko Rwanda Day itangira, nko hagati y’umwaka wa 2000 na 2005, amafaranga abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga boherezaga mu gihugu buri mwaka yari hagati ya miliyoni 3.6 na miliyoni 8.6 z’amadorali, mu gihe hagati ya 2006 na 2010 yavuye kuri miliyoni 25 agera kuri miliyoni 98.2 z’amadorali.
Impinduka zikomeye zagaragaye kuva gahunda ya Rwanda Day yatangira, amafaranga abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bohereza imbere mu gihugu yariyongereye ava kuri miliyoni 98,2 muri 2010 agera kuri miliyoni 253 z’amadorali mu 2018, ni ukuvuga asaga miliyari 250 z’amanyarwanda.
Mu bihe bitandukanye kandi hagiye hagaragara ibikorwa byo kwishyurira ubwisungane mu kwivuza abaturage batishoboye bo mu turere dutandukanye bikozwe n’abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bahurizaga ubushobozi mu bihugu batuyemo.
Zimwe mu mbogamizi bagaragazaga harimo kuba uburyo bwo gukusanya iyo nkunga bwaratwaraga igihe n’ikiguzi kitari gito mu kohererezanya amafaranga ndetse hakiyongeraho n’itike y’ababaga bazanye ayo mafaranga, nyamara iyo haza kuba uburyo buhuriweho na bose bw’ikoranabuhanga, byari kurushaho koroha no gukuraho izindi nzitizi.
Guhera muri uyu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari Guverinoma yongereye amafaranga ishyira mu bwisungane mu kwivuza ‘Mutuelle de santé’.
Ikigo cy’Ubwiteganyirize mu Rwanda (Rwanda Social Security Board-RSSB) kivuga ko iyi nyongera ingana na miliyari 10 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, izafasha muri gahunda yo kugeza ubuvuzi kuri bose.
Imibare ya RSSB igaragaza ko ingano y’imisanzu y’abanyamuryango ba mutuelle de santé harimo nayo leta yabageneraga ari miliyari 32,8 ; mu gihe ayo bakoresha angana na miliyari 47,4 ibintu byatumaga bagira igihombo cya miliyari 14,6 buri mwaka.

Title: Abanyarwanda batuye mu Busuwisi bizihije Umunsi w’Intwari (Amafoto)
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye mu Busuwisi bifatanyije n’inshuti zabo mu birori byo kwizihiza ku nshuro ya 26 Umunsi w’Intwari, byabereye mu Mujyi wa Genève.
Abanyarwanda batuye mu Busuwisi bifatanyije n’inshuti zabo mu birori byo kwizihiza ku nshuro ya 26 Umunsi w’Intwari, byabereye mu Mujyi wa Genève.
Ibirori byo kwizihiza Umunsi w’Intwari wahawe insanganyamatsiko igira iti “Ubutwari mu Banyarwanda, Agaciro kacu’’ byabaye ku wa 1 Gashyantare 2020.
Ibi birori byabimburiwe no kwerekana Filimi yitwa “The 600: Soldiers’ Story”, yerekanwe bwa mbere mu Busuwisi.
Iyi filimi igaragaza uburyo Batayo ya Gatatu y’Ingabo zahoze ari iza FPR-Inkotanyi yari mu nyubako y’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yahoze yitwa CND, yarokoye Abatutsi benshi muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 kandi ingabo zari ziyigize zararutwaga ubwinshi n’abasirikare ba Leta yateguye Jenoside.
Yanditswe inakorwa na Richard Hall ukomoka muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, muri Great Blue Productions. Uyu yatwaye igihembo cya Emmy Award, akaba atunganya ibiganiro bya za televiziyo i Los Angeles. Hall amaze imyaka 25 akora uyu mwuga wo gutunganya filime.
Gutunganya iyi filimi yabifashijwemo na A Wize Media y’i Kigali ya Annette Uwizeye ari nayo ihagarariye iyo filime.
Nyuma yo kureba filimi, hakurikiyeho ubusabane bwaranzwe n’imbyino n’imihamirizo by’Itorero Urunana rigizwe n’abana b’Abanyarwanda batuye mu Busuwisi.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Busuwisi, Rwakazina Marie Chantal, yasobanuriye abitabiriye ibi birori ko Umunsi w’Intwari ukomeye cyane ku Banyarwanda, wizihizwa kugira ngo twibuke, dushimire ndetse dusingize ibikorwa bifitiye u Rwanda akamaro intwari z’ingeri zose zakoze mu bihe bitandukanye.
Yasobanuye ko u Rwanda rwagize umugisha wo kugira intwari mu bihe bitandukanye.
Ambasaderi Rwakazina yasangije abitabiriye iki gikorwa ibice bitandukanye by’intwari u Rwanda rufite.
Intwari z’u Rwanda ziri mu byiciro bitatu ari byo Imanzi igizwe n’Umusirikare utazwi na General Major Fred Gisa Rwigema; Imena zirimo Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa, Rwagasana Michel, Agathe Uwiringiyimana, Niyitegeka Félicité n’Abanyeshuri b’Inyange. Icyiciro cya gatatu n’Ingenzi ariko nta ntwari n’imwe irashyirwamo.
Yanagarutse cyane ku butwari bw’Ingabo zahoze ari iza FPR-Inkotanyi zari ziyobowe na Paul Kagame maze zigahagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ndetse zikabohora u Rwanda.
Yibukije ko n’ubwo ingabo za FPR zari zifite ubushobozi buke ugereranyije n’umwanzi bahanganaga, bitanze batizigamye maze inzozi zabo bazigeraho zo kubaka u Rwanda rubereye bose, rutekanye, rufite amahoro, ituze n’imiyoborere myiza.
Ati “Uburyo bwiza bwo kwizihiza no kuzirikana intwari z’u Rwanda ni ukugera ikirenge mu cyazo. Ubutwari mu Banyarwanda niko Gaciro kacu.’’
Abanyarwanda basabwe kugira ubudasa mu byo bakora byose no mu myitwarire yabo, baharanira ibikorwa by’ubutwari.
Urubyiruko by’umwihariko rwabwiwe ko guha umuco warwo agaciro ari ingenzi ku hazaza harwo n’ah’igihugu cyarwibarutse.
Ambasaderi Rwakazina ati “Ni ngombwa gusigasira ibyagezweho no kubiteza imbere, guhanga ibishya bigamije iterambere n’imibereho y’Abanyarwanda, gukora cyane ndetse no gukora umurimo unoze. Ni byiza gushyigikira ubumwe n’ubufatanye bw’Abanyarwanda na gahunda zijyanye n’iterambere ry’igihugu.’’
Umunsi Mukuru w’Intwari wari witabiriwe n’abantu bagera kuri 300 baturutse mu mpande zitandukanye z’u Busuwisi. Byasojwe ababyitabiriye basangira banasabana.

Title: Abanyarwanda baba muri Turikiya bizihije umunsi w’Intwari, batora abayobozi bashya
Body:
Umuryango w’abanyarwanda baba muri Turikiya, guhera kuwa 31 Mutarama kugeza kuwa 2 Gashyantare 2020 bateraniye mu mujyi wa Duzce uherereye mu birometero 25o uvuye mu murwa mukuru Ankara, mu nteko rusange ngarukamwaka bizihiza umunsi w’Intwari, baboneraho no gutora abayobozi bashya.
Umuryango w’abanyarwanda baba muri Turikiya, guhera kuwa 31 Mutarama kugeza kuwa 2 Gashyantare 2020 bateraniye mu mujyi wa Duzce uherereye mu birometero 25o uvuye mu murwa mukuru Ankara, mu nteko rusange ngarukamwaka bizihiza umunsi w’Intwari, baboneraho no gutora abayobozi bashya.
Ni igikorwa cyateguwe na Ambasade y’ u Rwanda muri Turikiya, umuryango w’abanyarwanda baba muri icyo gihugu na Kaminuza ya Duzce.
Iyo nama yitabiriwe n’abanyarwanda 149 biganjemo abanyeshuri n’abandi banyarwanda baba muri Chypre.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Turikiya, Williams Nkurunziza yaboneyeho umwanya wo kuganira n’ubuyobozi bwa Kaminuza ya Duzce, ibiganiro byabo byibanda cyane ku bufatanye mu buhinzi n’ibijyanye n’amashyamba.
Bahuye tariki 31 Mutarama aho impande zombi zaganiriye ku buryo haba ubufatanye mu by’ubushakashatsi mu bijyanye n’ibihingwa by’ibinyamisogwe yerera mu butaka bijya kumera nk’ubunyobwa.
Umuyobozi w’iyo kaminuza, Prof. Dr. Nigar Demircan Cakar yavuze ko azohereza abarimu b’inzobere mu by’ubutaka n’amashyamba, bakaza gukora ubushakashatsi mu Rwanda kugira ngo barebe ko hari ibihingwa byera muri Duzce byakwera no mu Rwanda.
Yavuze ko kandi azohereza inzobere mu by’amashyamba n’inzobere mu by’inyoni gukora ubushakashatsi mu mashyamba atandukanye mu Rwanda, ku miti gakondo n’inyoni zo mu Rwanda.
Kaminuza ya Duzce izwiho kuba imwe mu zikomeye muri Turikiya mu bijyanye n’amashyamba, ubuhinzi ndetse n’ubuvuzi.
Abanyarwanda baba muri Turikiya baboneyeho n’umwanya wo kwifatanya n’abayobozi ba Kaminuza ya Duzce mu muganda, aho bateye ibiti mu gace kitiriwe Rwandan Park imbere muri Kaminuza.
Muri Kaminuza ya Duzce higa abanyarwanda 30 mu bijyanye n’ubuvuzi, ububanyi mpuzamahanga n’ibindi.
Kuwa 1 Gashyantare, Abanyarwanda baba muri Turikiya n’inshuti z’u Rwanda bifatanyije kwizihiza umunsi w’Intwari, haba irushanwa ry’umupira w’amaguru ryitiriwe ubutwari aho ikipe y’u Rwanda yatwaye igikombe itsinze ikipe ya Kaminuza ya Duzce.
Herekanywe kandi filime The 600 igaragaza ubutwari bw’abasirikare b’Inkotanyi bari mu ngoro y’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ubwo Jenoside yatangiraga, bagatanga umusanzu ukomeye mu kuyihagarika.
Ambasaderi Nkurunziza yavuze ko ari iby’ingenzi ko abanyarwanda bafatanya mu kurinda ibyagezweho, bafasha Guverinoma muri gahunda zigamije iterambere n’imibereho myiza.
Yasabye urubyiruko kwigira ku butwari bw’intwari z’u Rwanda, zatanze ubuzima bwazo mu kwitangira kubohora u Rwanda.
Kuri uwo munsi kandi hakozwe inteko rusange y’umuryango w’abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga, ishami rya Turikiya, bareba ibyagezweho umwaka ushize n’ibyitezwe uyu mwaka.
Hakozwe amatora hatorwa komite nshya , Salim Niyigena atorerwa kuba umuhuzabikorwa,, umwungirijwe aba Faustin Rutayisire, David GATARI atorerwa kuba umunyamabanga, ushinzwe uburinganire yabaye Latifa Vanessa KARANGWA, ushinzwe umutungo aba Honorine MIZERO mu gihe Aisha UWASE yatorewe ishami rya siporo n’urubyiruko.

Title: Abanyarwanda baba muri Mali bizihije Umunsi w’Intwari (Amafoto)
Body:
Abanyarwanda baba mu gihugu cya Mali bifatanyije mu kwihiziza Umunsi w’Intwari, wizihijwe ku nshuro ya 26 ku wa 1 Gashyantare.
Abanyarwanda baba mu gihugu cya Mali bifatanyije mu kwihiziza Umunsi w’Intwari, wizihijwe ku nshuro ya 26 ku wa 1 Gashyantare.
Kuri iyo tariki Perezida Paul Kagame yashyize indabo ku Gicumbi cy’Intwari i Remera mu Mujyi wa Kigali. Yari aherekejwe n’abayobozi barimo Minisitiri w’Intebe, Dr Ngirente Edouard; Perezida wa Sena, Dr Iyamuremye Augustin; Perezida w’Umutwe w’Abadepite, Mukabalisa Donatille na Minisitiri w’Ingabo, Maj Gen Albert Murasira.
Uretse abari imbere mu gihugu, Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga nabo bizihije uyu munsi mu nsanganyamatsiko igira iti ‘‘Ubutwari mu Banyarwanda, agaciro kacu.’’
Mu ijambo Perezida w’Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda baba muri Mali, Alice Gasarabwe, yagejeje ku bitabiriye icyo gikorwa, yagarutse ku bikorwa by’intwari zitangiye u Rwanda kubera urukundo zari zirufitiye.
Yasabye Abanyarwanda baba muri Mali ko indangagaciro intwari zagaragaje zakomeza kubaranga, bityo bakarushaho gutanga umusanzu mu kubaka u Rwanda rwa none n’urw’ahazaza.
Umunsi w’Intwari wabanjirijwe n’icyumweru cy’Ubutwari cyatangiye ku wa 24 Mutarama 2020 gisozwa ku wa 31. Cyaranzwe n’imikino itandukanye n’ibiganiro byabereye mu bigo bya Leta, ibyigenga no muri za kaminuza n’amashuri makuru.
Intwari z’u Rwanda ziri mu byiciro bitatu ari byo Imanzi kigizwe n’Umusirikare utazwi na General Major Fred Gisa Rwigema; Imena zirimo Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa, Rwagasana Michel, Agathe Uwiringiyimana, Niyitegeka Félicité n’Abanyeshuri b’Inyange.
Icyiciro cya gatatu ni Ingenzi ariko nta ntwari n’imwe irashyirwamo.

Title: U Bufaransa: Abanyarwanda bizihije Umunsi w’Intwari, banakira Ambasaderi Ngarambe i Paris
Body:
Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo batuye mu gihugu cy’u Bufaransa kuri uyu wa Gatandatu bakiriye Ambasaderi mushya, Dr. François Xavier Ngarambe banifatanya kwizihiza umunsi mukuru w’intwari.
Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo batuye mu gihugu cy’u Bufaransa kuri uyu wa Gatandatu bakiriye Ambasaderi mushya, Dr. François Xavier Ngarambe banifatanya kwizihiza umunsi mukuru w’intwari.
Ni nyuma y’uko ambasaderi Dr. François Xavier Ngarambe atanze impapuro zo guhagararira u Rwanda mu Bufaransa no mu biro bya Louise Mushikiwabo Umunyamabanga mukuru w‘Umuryango mpuzamahanga w’Ibihugu bivuga Igifaransa (OIF).
Ambasaderi Dr. Ngarambe ku mugaragaro yakiriwe n‘ abanyarwanda n‘ inshuti zabo batuye mu Bufaransa, umuhango wabereye i Paris mu nzu y’ubuyobozi bw’agace k’Umujyi wa Paris yitwa ’Mairie du 3e arrondissement de Paris’.
Mu ijambo ryo guha ikaze Amb. Ngarambe, Uwase Angelique uyobora Diaspora Nyarwanda mu Bufaransa, yashimiye abanyarwanda n‘inshuti zabo baje ari benshi kwakira bwa mbere ku mugaragaro Ambasaderi mushya waje guhagararira u Rwanda mu Bufaransa, no kwizihiriza hamwe umunsi mukuru w‘Intwari.
Uwase yijeje ambasaderi Ngarambe ubufatanye kandi anamwereka Komite nshya baherutse gutora iyoboye Diaspora Nyarwanda mu Bufaransa, anifuriza abanyarwanda umwaka mushya muhire .
Amb. Ngarambe na we yafashe ijambo, ashimira abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa uburyo baje kumwakirana urugwiro.
Yagize ati “Uyu munsi ntabwo uri uwo kuvuga amagambo menshi, ni uwo kwishimana. Nishimiye kubabona muri benshi tugasangira kandi tukifurizanya umwaka mushya muhire wa 2020. Igihe nitwe tukigena kwifurizanya umwaka n‘ubu birashoboka.”
Amb. Ngarambe yavuze ko bibaye mahire kuko bihuriranye n‘umunsi mukuru ukomeye mu mateka yaranze u Rwanda mu bihe bishize, aho rwibuka kandi rugashimira Intwari zitanze ngo Abanyarwanda bagere aho bageze ubu.
 Ati “ Habayeho abagabo n‘abagore bitanze bamwe bahasiga ubuzima bwabo. Uyu munsi ni uwo kubibuka bidasanzwe ahubwo dutera ikirenge mu cyabo.”
 Amb. Ngarambe yababwiye urubyiruko kugera ikirenge mu cy’intwari z’u Rwanda, bahiga kudatatira icyo gihango.
Ati "Kwifurizanya umwaka mushya; dukwiriye guhiga ko tutazatatira igihango cy’intwari zatwitangiye ari nazo dukesha uko turi uyu munsi; dukwiye kwiyemeza kandi birashoboka kuba intwari buri wese mu kigero cye mu nshingano ze. Twese duhuriza ku ntego yo kubumbatira ubumwe bw’abanyarwanda, kubaka igihugu kigendera ku amategeko, igihugu gitekanye kandi gikungahaye kibikomora ku murimo wacu, igihugu cyasubiranye agaciro kacyo mu ruhando rw’amahanga".
Yavuze ko inshingano yahawe azazikora neza, aha serivisi nziza abamugana bose ntawe aheje.
Pierre Aidenbaum uyobora ako gace k’Umujyi wa Paris, na we mu ijambo rye yahaye ikaze Amb. Ngarambe, ati “Murisanga muri uyu mujyi nyobora, murisanga mu Bufaransa.”
Umugoroba wanavugiwemo kandi uko abanyarwanda bo mu Bufaransa bakora igikorwa cya Connect Rwanda kigamije kugeza telefone zigezweho buri muryango mu Rwanda, bamwe bahava biyemeje kuyishyira mu bikorwa.
Ni umugoroba waranzwe n‘ubusabane kandi witabiriwa n‘abantu benshi bavuye mu nguni zose z‘u Bufaransa. Bwabaye uburyo kandi bwo gukomeza guhanahana amakuru berekana ibikorwa bafite mu minsi iri mbere.
 Abahanzi barimo Ben Kayiranga n‘ababyinnyi n‘intore zo mu itorero Inyambo za Lille mu majyaruguru y‘u Bufaransa basusurukije abitabiriye.
Inkuru mu mafoto

Title: Amb Masozera yasabye Abanyarwanda gukomeza kuba intwari kugira ngo bagere ku cyerecyezo 2050
Body:
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Kenya, Dr Richard Masozera, yavuze ko umunsi mukuru w’intwari ari umunsi ukomeye ku banyarwanda aho bari hose, kuko ubafasha kwibuka abakoze ibikorwa bidasanzwe, ari nabyo bizafasha mu kugera ku cyerecyezo gishya, 2050.
Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Kenya, Dr Richard Masozera, yavuze ko umunsi mukuru w’intwari ari umunsi ukomeye ku banyarwanda aho bari hose, kuko ubafasha kwibuka abakoze ibikorwa bidasanzwe, ari nabyo bizafasha mu kugera ku cyerecyezo gishya, 2050.
Ambasaderi Masozera yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa 1 Gashyantare 2020, ubwo Abanyarwanda baba muri Kenya n’inshuti zabo, bizihizaga umunsi w’Intwari.
Uyu ni umuhango wabaye mu gihe Abanyarwanda hirya no hino bifatanyaga mu kwibuka Intwari z’igihugu, no gukomeza kuzirikana akamaro k’ubutwari mu iterambere ry’igihugu.
Mu butumwa yatanze, Ambasaderi Dr Mosozera yibukije abari bitabiriye iki gikorwa ko mu gutangira uyu mwaka, ubutumwa umukuru w’igihugu yatanze, yabwiye Abanyarwanda ko umwaka wa 2019 warangiye neza, akabasaba gukora ngo umwaka mushya uzabe mwiza kurushaho.
Yagize ati “Perezida wa Repubulika yavuze ko hari byinshi u Rwanda rwagezeho kandi tugomba kubyishimira, harimo umutekano wakomeje kugaragara mu gihugu, ubukungu bwiyongereye, imibereho y’Abanyarwanda yateye imbere nubwo mu bice bimwe na bimwe habaye ibibazo biturutse ku ngaruka y’ibiza, ibi byose bikaba byarakozwe kubera ubufatanye bw’Abanyarwanda.”
Masozera yavuze ko umunsi w’ intwari ufasha abanyarwanda kwibuka abakoze ibikorwa bidasanzwe kugira ngo u Rwanda rube igihugu gikomeye kandi kirangwa n’indangagaciro, ubumwe, gukora cyane kandi ugakora akazi kanoze, gukunda igihugu no kuba indakemwa.
Yavuze ko izi ndangagaciro ari ngombwa ko zivugwa zikanasubirwamo kenshi, cyane cyane kugira ngo hibutswe urubyiruko kutazigera ruzibagirwa kuko arizo zatumye u Rwanda rugera aho rugeze uyu munsi.
Ati “Uyu munsi urubahirizwa aho abanyarwanda bari hose kugira ngo intwari zacu tuzubahe, tuzihe agaciro ariko na none dushimire ibyiza biri mu gihugu tunarebe imbere. U Rwanda dufite uyu munsi ni ukubera izi ntwari, ubu igihugu kimaze gutera imbere mu buryo bugaragarira Isi.”
Yavuze ko uyu mwaka abanyarwanda batangiye, bari bafite icyerekezo 2020 kandi hari byinshi byakozwemo.
Yagize ati “Yego ntabwo byose byagezweho ariko ibyinshi byateganyagwa byagezweho. Uyu munsi turavuga icyerekezo 2050, kugira ngo u Rwanda ruzakigereho ni uko indangagaciro z’intwari zigomba gukomeza gushyirwa imbere.”
Yavuze ko urubyiruko arirwo rusabwa cyane kugira uruhare muri iki cyerekezo.
Ati “Intwari zivuka buri munsi kandi ubutwari bugaragarira kuva mu bikorwa bito kugera ku bikomeye harimo nk’abasirakare batanga cyangwa batanze ubuzima bwabo ku rugamba, tugomba kuzirikana ko intwari zatubanjirije zitanze kugira ngo buri munyarwanda yaba umugore, umwana cyangwa umugabo agire uburenganzira busesuye mu gihugu cye.”
Yavuze ko mu gihe abantu bibuka intwari, batagomba kwibagirwa intwari zitazwi ziri mu bikorwa bitandukanye by’ingirakamaro mu gihugu harimo abarimu, abaganga, abasirikare, ababyeyi n’abandi.
Intwari z’u Rwanda ziri mu byiciro bitatu ari byo Imanzi igizwe n’Umusirikare utazwi na General Major Fred Gisa Rwigema; Imena zirimo Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa, Rwagasana Michel, Agathe Uwiringiyimana, Niyitegeka Félicité n’Abanyeshuri b’Inyange. Icyiciro cya gatatu n’Ingenzi ariko nta ntwari n’imwe irashyirwamo.

Title: USA: Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta ya Utah bizihije umwaka mushya (Amafoto)
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta ya Utah, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika bifatanyije kwizihiza umwaka mushya wa 2020, basuzuma uko uwa 2019 bafata n’ingamba ngo umwaka mushya uzarusheho kuba mwiza.
Abanyarwanda batuye muri Leta ya Utah, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika bifatanyije kwizihiza umwaka mushya wa 2020, basuzuma uko uwa 2019 bafata n’ingamba ngo umwaka mushya uzarusheho kuba mwiza.
Uwo muhango wabaye kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 31 Mutarama 2020, ubera mu mujyi wa Salt Lake City muri Leta ya Utah. Witabiriwe na Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika Madamu Mathilde Mukantabana, abasenateri n’abandi bayobozi muri Leta ya Utah.
Ambasaderi Mukantabana, yibukije Abanyarwanda gukomera ku ndangagaciro zabo ntibibagirwe aho bavuye kandi abasaba kuba ba ambasaderi b’u Rwanda mu gihugu batuyemo.
Yagarutse kandi ku mateka y’u Rwanda, yibutsa Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda aho igihugu cyavuye. Yavuze ko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi igihugu cyasaga nk’aho cyapfuye ariko bitewe n’ubuyobozi bwiza ubu igihugu kiri ku myanya ya mbere mu bintu bitandukanye. Yatanze urugero rw’umubare munini w’abagore mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, kuza imbere mu korohereza ishoramari, kurwanya ruswa n’ibindi.
Ambasaderi Mukantabana yasoje asaba Abanyarwanda gusigasira umuco wabo, no kudatakaza indanga gaciro z’umunyarwanda.
Umuyobozi wa diaspora nyarwanda muri Leta ya Utah, Jean Claude Kamali yagaragaje ishusho rusange y’abanyarwanda batuye muri iyo Leta, agaragaza ko hejuru ya 70% bagizwe n’urubyiruko, aboneraho kubwira Abanyarwanda ko aribo mbaraga z’u Rwanda ndetse n’iz’igihugu batuye.
Kamali yagaragarije Ambasaderi Mathilde Mukantabana umubano mwiza bafitanye n’inzego za leta, anashimira Guverineri w’iyo ntara Gary Herbert , ko iyo hakozwe umunsi wo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, asohora itangazo ryo kwifatanya no gukomeza Abanyarwanda by’umwihariko abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri 1994.
Senateri Scott Howell yashimiye Ambasaderi Mukantabana kuba yagize uruzinduko muri Utah, anashimira Abanyarwanda by’umwihariko umuco mwiza wo gushyira hamwe, abashishikariza gukomeza kwitabira gahunda za Leta batuyemo.
Uyu muhango wari witabiriwe n’abantu barenga 250 barimo Abanyarwanda batuye Utah n’inshuti zabo.

Title: CG Rwigamba na Bishop Rucyahana bagaragaje ipfundo ry’ubutwari bwa RPA n’ubwo mu gihe cy’abami
Body:
Abanyeshuri b’abanyarwanda biga muri Maroc basabwe kwigira ku bikorwa by’indashyikirwa byaranze intwari z’igihugu bubakiye ku muco waranze abanyarwanda kuva kera, bakiyemeza kuba intwari bahereye mu kubyaza umusaruro ibyo biga.
Abanyeshuri b’abanyarwanda biga muri Maroc basabwe kwigira ku bikorwa by’indashyikirwa byaranze intwari z’igihugu bubakiye ku muco waranze abanyarwanda kuva kera, bakiyemeza kuba intwari bahereye mu kubyaza umusaruro ibyo biga.
Tariki ya 1 Gashyantare buri mwaka u Rwanda rwizihiza Umunsi w’Intwari, hibukwa ibikorwa by’indashyikirwa byaranze abantu batandukanye kugeza n’ubwo bamwe bahara ubuzima bwabo bitangira igihugu n’abagituye.
Komiseri Mukuru w’Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Imfungwa n’Abagororwa, Gen George Rwigamba na Bishop Rucyahana John bahaye ikiganiro abanyeshuri b’abanyarwanda biga muri Maroc bari bitabiriye umuhango wo kwizihiza umunsi w’intwari.
Bombi bari muri Maroc aho bari bitabiriye inama nyafurika ku micungire y’amagereza yabereye mu Mujyi wa Rabat, ikitabirwa n’ibihugu bya Afurika 36. Yareberaga hamwe ibijyanye no kunoza imiyoborere y’amagereza ndetse n’imbogamizi mu by’umutekano urwego rw’amagereza ruhura narwo.
Mu kiganiro yatanze, Bishop Rucyahana yibukije urubyiruko ubutwari mu mateka y’abanyarwanda, agaragaza uburyo bari bariyubatse, bafite abakuru, ubutaka ndetse bunze n’ubumwe, aho yashimangiye ko byatumye abakoloni barushaho kubanga cyane ko umwami yari afite gahunda inoze yo kurengera abaturage be.
Yagaragaje ko ubwo bumwe aribwo bwatumye mu gihe abacakara bakurwaga muri Afurika, ibindi bihugu byakuwemo abaturage ariko mu Rwanda birananirana kuko umwami yavuze ko “nta munyarwanda ucuruzwa nk’itungo”.
Rucyahana yavuze ko mu gushaka gusenya ubumwe bw’abanyarwanda, abakoloni babashyizemo umwiryane utarigeze ubaho kuko bose “bari rubanda rw’umwami” biza no kugeza kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yavuze ko ubutwari bwizihizwa kuri uyu munsi “bushobora kuba intandaro y’uko uhemukirwa n’abatinya ubutwari bwawe, cyangwa bukagufasha kwisubiza agaciro kawe”.
Komiseri wa RCS, CG George Rwigamba, nk’umwe mu basirikare bagize uruhare mu rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, yavuze ibihamya ubutwari bwo kubohora igihugu, aho yababwiye ko “bwagaragaye mu mitunganyirize n’imitegurire y’urugamba, Perezida Kagame yayoboye. Yateguye urugamba rwacu nka RPA ategura n’urugamba rwo gutsinda Habyarimana”.
Yavuze ko ari umwe mu basirikare 600 ba RPA bari i Kigali muri CND aho na none ubutwari bwa Perezida Kagame wari uyoboye urugamba bwongeye kwigaragaza, kubera uburyo yabaremyemo icyizere, akababwira ko nubwo bakikijwe na batayo esheshatu ntacyo bazaba.
Rwigamba yavuze ko ubutwari bwaranze Perezida Kagame mu gutegura urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu aribwo bwagejeje ku guhagarika Jenoside.
Yavuze ko magingo aya, urugamba rw’amasasu rwarangiye, ko urubyiruko rukwiye kugaragaza ubutwari bwarwo rurwana intambara ikomeza urugendo rw’iterambere ry’igihugu.
Ati “ Urugamba rwanyu rugomba intwari muri siyansi, rugakumira ibikorwa byashingira ku bumenyi byibasira igihugu, ugiye kubatera mukamurwanya mwifashishije ikoranabuhanga, ubutwari bwanyu buri mu kubungabunga ubukungu bw’igihugu, buri mu kwiga mukazavura neza abanyarwanda.”
Abanyeshuri 44 nibo bari bitabiriye ibi biganiro, aba ni abiga mu Mujyi wa Rabat kuko mu yindi mijyi bari mu gihe cy’ibizamini.
Umunsi w’Intwari wizihijwe kuri uyu wa 1 Gashyantare wabanjirijwe n’icyumweru cy’Ubutwari cyatangiye ku wa 24 Mutarama 2020 gisozwa ku wa 31 Mutarama.
Cyaranzwe n’imikino itandukanye n’ibiganiro byabereye mu bigo bya Leta, ibyigenga no muri za kaminuza n’amashuri makuru no hirya no hino ku Isi ahari abanyarwanda.
Intwari z’u Rwanda ziri mu byiciro bitatu ari byo Imanzi igizwe n’Umusirikare utazwi na General Major Fred Gisa Rwigema; Imena zirimo Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa, Rwagasana Michel, Agathe Uwiringiyimana, Niyitegeka Félicité n’Abanyeshuri b’Inyange. Icyiciro cya gatatu n’Ingenzi ariko nta ntwari n’imwe irashyirwamo.
Urwego rushinzwe Intwari z’Igihugu, Imidari n’Impeta by’Ishimwe rutangaza ko hamaze gukorwa urutonde rw’abazongerwa mu ntwari z’u Rwanda ndetse rushobora gushyirwa ahagaragara bidatinze.
Kuva mu myaka itatu ishize hakozwe ubushakashatsi bwasize hatanzwe abantu 76 bazavamo abagirwa intwari n’abazahabwa impeta z’ishimwe.
Izo mpeta zamaze no gutumizwa ziri mu byiciro birindwi zizambikwa abagaragaje ibikorwa by’ubutwari bijyanye n’ubwitange bushobora no gutwara ubuzima bwabo; ibyo gutsura umubano w’u Rwanda n’amahanga; kurwanya ibinyoma; guteza imbere umuco no kuba indashyikirwa mu kunoza umurimo uteza imbere igihugu.

Title: U Buholandi: Abanyarwanda bishimiye ibyagezweho mu 2019, basabwa kwinjira muri Connect Rwanda
Body:
Abanyarwanda baba mu Buholandi bifatanyije n’inshuti zabo mu gikorwa cyo kwifurizanya umwaka wa 2020, kwishimira ibyagezweho no gufata ingamba nshya mu kunoza ibyakozwe cyangwa ibitaragenze neza.
Abanyarwanda baba mu Buholandi bifatanyije n’inshuti zabo mu gikorwa cyo kwifurizanya umwaka wa 2020, kwishimira ibyagezweho no gufata ingamba nshya mu kunoza ibyakozwe cyangwa ibitaragenze neza.
Iki gikorwa cyateguwe na Ambasade y’u Rwanda ifatanyije na Diaspora Nyarwanda mu Buholandi cyabereye muri Hilton Hotel i Den Haag ku wa 25 Mutarama 2020.
Mu ijambo rye Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Buholandi, Jean Pierre Karabaranga yifurije Umwaka mushya muhire wa 2020 Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo.
Yashimiye Komite ya Diaspora ku bikorwa by’indashyikirwa byagezweho mu 2019 n’Abanyarwanda bayibaye hafi bakabyitabira uko batumirwaga.
Yagize ati “Umwaka ushize wabaye mwiza cyane kuko watanze umusaruro mu mihigo myinshi yari yifujwe kugerwaho. Ubu u Rwanda ruhagaze neza haba mu bukungu, umutekano n’ububanyi n’amahanga.’’
“Ku rwego rwa Ambasade twakoze byinshi dufatanyije, ndabashimira ko twafatanyije umuhango wo Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 25 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi; nyuma habayeho na gahunda yo Kwibohora ku nshuro ya 25 ndetse no kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore.’’
Ibi bikorwa ni bimwe mu bihuza Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bikababera ahantu ho guhurira no gukura amasomo ku bo baribo, kubaka ubumwe no gukomeza inzira y’iterambere.
Ambasaderi Karabaranga yagize ati “Umubare w’inshuti z’u Rwanda n’uw’abashoramari urakomeza kwiyongera. Ku rwego rwa diaspora, twagize abantu benshi bitabiriye Umushyikirano kandi baduhagarariye neza. Abanyarwanda benshi bakomeje kujya bataha bakajya gusura igihugu cyabo kandi igishimishije nuko harimo n’urubyiruko rwinshi. Hari abitabiriye Youth Connect 2019 n’itorero 2019.’’
Abanyarwanda bitabiriye iki gikorwa banibukijwe serivisi bashobora kubona babwiwe ko bashobora kuzisanga muri Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi.
Amb. Karabaranga yakomoje ku buryo bushya bwo gusaba urupapuro rw’inzira (Passport) rushya rw’u Rwanda.
Ati “Abifuza gusaba Passport nshya cyangwa se kwandikisha imitungo, mugane ambasade yanyu tubahe izo serivisi.’’
Yakomeje abasaba kwinjira muri gahunda igamije kugeza telefoni zigezweho ku baturage b’u Rwanda. Ati “Nagira ngo kandi mbashishikarize kandi kwitabira Connect Rwanda.’’
Ku wa 20 Ukuboza 2019 nibwo MTN Rwanda yatangije ubukangurambaga bwa Connect Rwanda Challenge, maze ibigo n’abantu ku giti cyabo batangira kwiyemeza umubare wa telefoni zigezweho bazatanga zigahabwa abadafite ubushobozi bwo kuzigurira hirya no hino mu gihugu.
MTN Rwanda iteganya ko abantu bose bazahabwa izi telefone muri ubu bukangurambaga bazahabwa na Sim Card iriho na 1GB ya Internet mu gihe cy’amezi atatu ya mbere, mu kugabanya imbogamizi ku bantu bazitirwa no kubura internet.
Muri telefoni ibihumbi 40 zimaze kwiyemezwa n’abantu batandukanye izigera ku bihumbi 20 ni izikorerwa mu Rwanda n’Uruganda rwa Mara Phone.
Ambasaderi Karabaranga yasabye Abanyarwanda kwitabira gahunda igamije gufasha Abanyarwanda bari muri Dispora gutanga umusanzu mu kubaka igihugu cyabo bakoresheje ubumenyi n’ubunararibonye bahahiye mu mahanga.
Ubu busabe bushingiye ku mwanzuro wa munani wavuye mu gitekerezo cyatanzwe n’Umunyarwanda utuye mu Buholandi mu Nama y’Umushyikirano ya 2019.
Umuyobozi wa Diaspora Nyarwanda mu Buholandi, Ndabarasa Claude, yashimiye abitabiriye igikorwa.
Ati “Mumfashe dushimire ubuyobozi bwa Ambasade bwemeye ko dufatanya iki gikorwa, tunabashimire uburyo batuba hafi mu bikorwa byose dutegura hano mu Buholandi nk’Abanyarwanda. Turabyishimira cyane.’’
Mu ijambo rye yagaragaje ibyo Diaspora Nyarwanda mu Buholandi yagezeho mu 2019 ndetse anamurika ibyo bifuza kugeraho mu 2020.
Umugoroba wasojwe mu isangira n’ubusabane bwabereyemo igitaramo gakondo cyacinyiwemo akadiho.

Title: U Bufaransa: Hamuritswe urwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi rwubatswe i Strasbourg
Body:
Mu Mujyi wa Strasbourg mu Bufaransa, hamuritswe ku mugaragaro urukuta rw’urwibutso nk’ikimenyetso cyo kwibuka ubuziraherezo jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda mu 1994.
Mu Mujyi wa Strasbourg mu Bufaransa, hamuritswe ku mugaragaro urukuta rw’urwibutso nk’ikimenyetso cyo kwibuka ubuziraherezo jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda mu 1994.
Iki gikorwa cyabaye kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 27 Mutarama, akaba ari n’umunsi wo kwibuka Jenoside no kurwanya ibyaha byibasira inyokomuntu.
Uru rukuta rwanditseho interuro ivuga ko ‘mu Rwanda muri 1994 hishwe abarenze Miliyoni y’abantu bazira ko bavutse ari Abatutsi gusa. Ntibizongere kubaho ukundi’.
Umuhango wo kumurika uru rukuta witabiriwe na Amb. Dr Ngarambe Jean François-Xavier, uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Bufaransa, Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Strasbourg, Roland Ries, Umuyobozi w’ishyirahamwe Amariza d’Alsace, Immaculée Mpinganzima Cattier na Jeanne Kayigirwa Allaire wari uhagarariye umuryango Ibuka-France.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Umuyobozi w’umujyi wa Strasbourg, Roland Ries, yavuze ko gushyira uru rukuta muri uyu mujyi byatewe n’impamvu ebyiri nyamukuru. Iya mbere ni uko aherutse mu Rwanda akibonera n’amaso amwe mu mateka ya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi n’uburyo asigasirwa.
Avuga ko indi mpamvu ari uko ari umuyobozi w’umujyi uzwiho kubahiriza ukwishyira ukizana kw’ikiremwamuntu mu Burayi, ibyabaye mu Rwanda bikaba binyuranye cyane n’ubwo burenganzira bwa muntu bashyigikiye.
Roland Ries asaba aabarokotse Jenoside kutibagirwa ariko bakarenga akababaro ntikabaherane kugira ngo babeho neza n’abazabakomokaho bose.
Ati “Bakomeze biyubakire igihugu kitarangwamo amacakubiri nk’uko nabibonye mu Rwanda, igihugu gikomeye mu kwiyubaka bishingiye mu mbaraga bikuyemo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi”.
Uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Bufaransa, Amb.Dr Ngarambe Jean François-Xavier, yashimiye abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo zituye mu nkengero za Strasbourg, bitabiriye uyu muhango wo kumurika ikimenyetso cyo kwibuka ubuziraherezo jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda 1994.
Ati “Ni igikorwa gikomeye rero ku mpamvu nyinshi, cyane cyane abacitse ku icumu rya jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi babone aho kwibukira ababo, kandi babone ko ababo bahawe agaciro hano mu Bufaransa, n’abahatuye cyangwa bahagenda bakaba basobanukirwa n’uko iyi jenoside yateguwe ikanashyirwa mu bikorwa”.
Yakomeje avuga kandi ko ari no kwereka abahakana ku nyungu zabo bwite ko jenoside yakozwe, ko bibeshya.
Ati “Ntituzemera ko babica kandi bgashaka no kubasiba mu bantu babayeho mu Isi dutuye”.
Uwari uhagarariye Ibuka-France, Jeanne Allaire, yavuze ko iki gikorwa giteye ishema kuko abarokotse jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi batuye muri aka karere babonye ahantu bazajya byibura bajya kwibukira imiryango n’inshuti zabo bishwe bazira uko bavutse.
Ati “Tukaba nka Ibuka-France, duhamagariye indi mijyi isigaye yose kuduha aho twajya twibukira kandi bikaba biri mu byo twiyemeje ko buri Mujyi wa hano waduha ahantu dushyira urwibutso rw’amateka yacu muri jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda”.
Jeanne Allaire avuga ko bamaze kugira ho kwibukira mu mijyi nka Paris, Strasbourg, Toulouse n’ahandi ariko bidahagije bazakomeza kubwira n’abandi basigaye ndetse bategereje ko no ku rwego rw’igihugu cyose babaha aho kwibukira kuko kugeza uyu munsi bigarukira mu bayobozi b’imijyi gusa.
Mpinganzima Cattier Immaculée, uyobora ishyirahamwe ryafatanyije n’umujyi wa Strasbourg gutegua iki gikorwa yashimiye Umuyobozi w’umujyi wa Strasbourg Roland Ries kuko yabigizemo uruhare rukomeye kuko bitari byoroshye.
Ati “Twabisabye hashize imyaka 10 none bibaye impamo, ubu rero tubonye koko aho dushobora kujya tuza kwibukira nko muri Mata, ku bwanjye rwose ndishimye kuko iki gikorwa cyararwanyijwe ariko ababirwanyaga turabatsinze”.
Akomeza avuga ko ari iby’agaciro kuko iki kimenyetso gishyizwe mu mujyi ukomeye ufatwa nk’umurwa mukuru w’ u Burayi, kandi ukaba umujyi ufite amateka akomeye mu gihugu cy’u Bufaransa.
Alain Gauthier yongeyeho ko iki gikorwa kiri no mu rwego rwo kwereka abakoze jenoside bidegembya ko byose bishoboka, ko abacitse ku icumu batazahwema kurengera uburenganzira bwabo, ko ibyo bakoze bazabibazwa uko byagenda kose.
Yakomeje avuga ko aho batuye i Reims basabye urwibutso ariko bagitegereje bizeye ko umunsi uzagera bakabereka aho bashyira urwibutso.

Title: Amb. Kirabo Kacyira yatanze impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana
Body:
Ambasaderi Dr. Aissa Kirabo Kacyira yashyikirije Perezida wa Ghana, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo, impapuro zimuhesha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu.
Ambasaderi Dr. Aissa Kirabo Kacyira yashyikirije Perezida wa Ghana, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo, impapuro zimuhesha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira u Rwanda muri icyo gihugu.
Dr. Aissa Kirabo yashyikirije Perezida Nana Addo izo mpapuro kuri uyu wa Mbere, tariki ya 27 Mutarama 2020 mu Ngoro ye iherereye mu Murwa Mukuru Accra.
Ambasaderi Dr. Aissa Kirabo Kacyira abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter, yijeje Abanyarwanda n’Abanya-Ghana kuzarushaho kunoza inshingano yahawe ndetse anashimira Perezida Paul Kagame, wamugiriye icyizere cyo guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana.
Mbere yo guhabwa inshingano zo guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana, Dr Aissa Kirabo Kacyira yakoraga mu Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe imiturire.
Inshingano zo guhagararira u Rwanda muri Ghana yazihawe na Perezida wa Repubulika, Paul Kagame, tariki ya 15 Nyakanga 2019, ubwo hashyirwagaho abahagarariye u Rwanda mu bihugu 15 by’amahanga.
Dr Aissa Kirabo Kacyira afite izina rizwi mu bijyanye na politiki mu Rwanda. Yayoboye Umujyi wa Kigali hagati ya 2006 na 2011, icyo gihe yari asimbuye Mutsindashyaka Théoneste. Uwo mwanya yawugezeho avuye no mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda aho yari Intumwa ya rubanda.
Ghana yahawe guhagarariramo inyungu z’u Rwanda ni igihugu gisanganywe umubano mwiza narwo. Stanislas Kamanzi ni we wari Ambasaderi warwo kuva ku wa 2 Kamena 2017.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Ghana yafunguwe nk’umusaruro w’ibiganiro Perezida Kagame yagiye agirana na mugenzi we w’icyo gihugu, Nana Akufo-Addo.
Muri gahunda yo kwihutisha iterambere no kuvugurura imibereho myiza y’abaturage (NST1) inajyanye n’iya guverinoma y’imyaka irindwi, igaragaza ko ishoramari ry’abanyamahanga ari imwe mu nzira izafasha mu iterambere ry’ubukungu bushingiye ku mubano u Rwanda rufitanye n’ibindi bihugu.
Ghana n’u Rwanda bifitanye umubano wihariye ugamije kunoza imibereho myiza y’abaturage babyo.
Ibihugu byombi byasinyanye amasezerano y’ubufatanye mu by’ikirere, yatumye kuva ku wa 2 Kamena 2013, Sosiyete Nyarwanda y’Ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere, RwandAir itangira ingendo zigana mu Mujyi wa Accra.
Ingendo za RwandAir zoroheje ubuhahirane hagati y’ibihugu byombi, zinazamura imigenderanire mu bacuruzi n’abashoramari babiturukamo cyane ko mu 2014 Urugaga rw’Abikorera mu Rwanda (PSF) rwasinyanye n’Urwego rushinzwe Ubucuruzi muri Ghana amasezerano y’ubufatanye agamije guteza imbere ishoramari mu buhinzi bwa kijyambere, ubukerarugendo, inganda zikora imyenda, ishoramari mu bwubatsi no mu bucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro.

Title: U Buholandi: RDB yijeje abikorera ubufatanye mu iterambere ry’ubukerarugendo
Body:
U Rwanda ruri mu bihugu byitabiriye Imurikagurisha Mpuzamahanga ry’Ubukerarugendo rya Vakantiebeurs riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Utrecht mu Buholandi.
U Rwanda ruri mu bihugu byitabiriye Imurikagurisha Mpuzamahanga ry’Ubukerarugendo rya Vakantiebeurs riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Utrecht mu Buholandi.
Vakantiebeurs igeze ku munsi wa gatatu yatangiye tariki ya 15, izarangira ku wa 19 Mutarama 2020.
Ku nshuro ya 13 ibigo bitandukanye byo mu Rwanda bikora ibijyanye n’ubukerarugendo bigatanga n’izindi serivisi zijyana nabwo byitabiriye iri murikagurisha ngarukamwaka.
U Rwanda rwamurikiye abaryitabiriye amahirwe y’ubukerarugendo ari mu gihugu binyuze muri gahunda ya ‘Visit Rwanda’ igamije gushishikariza abanyamahanga kurusura.
Leta y’u Rwanda binyuze mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) yishimira uburyo ibigo by’ubukerarugendo bitera imbere bikanitabira gahunda zo kumurika ubukerarugendo bw’urwa Gasabo mu mahanga.
Imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs ryitabiriwe n’abayobozi b’ibigo byo mu Rwanda, bagize amahirwe yo guhura n’ibigo bikomeye by’ubukerarugendo ku migabane irimo uw’i Burayi, Amerika, Aziya n’ahandi.
Inyungu ziri muri iki gikorwa zishingiye ku kureba uko hanozwa ubufatanye hagati y’impande zombi, kwerekana ubwiza bw’u Rwanda no gushishikariza abantu kuzarusura.
U Rwanda ruhagarariwe muri iki gikorwa na RDB, Sosiyete Nyarwanda y’Ubwikorezi bwo mu Kirere, RwandAir [ihagarariwe mu Bubiligi, u Budage no mu Buholandi na Gashumba Charles Damascène], Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi n’ibigo by’ubukerarugendo birimo Amahoro Tours ihagarariwe na Bakunzi Greg, Palast Tours and Travel ihagarariwe na Rutagarama Aimable na Wildlife Tours-Rwanda iyobowe na Mugisha Davson.
Bakunzi Greg yabwiye IGIHE ko kwitabira imurikagurisha hari byinshi babyungukiyemo.
Yagize ati “Uko tuje twiga ibintu bishya kandi tugahura n’abantu batandukanye kandi buri mwaka abaza badusanga bariyongera. Ibihugu duturanye usanga kuri stand baza kutubaza bati ‘mubigenza mute ngo mubone abantu benshi bashishikazwa no kuza gusura u Rwanda’.’’
Muri ‘Visit Rwanda’, abahagarariye ibigo byo mu Rwanda beretse bagenzi babo bo mu Buholandi amahirwe ari mu bukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda n’uko yabyazwa umusaruro.
Yavuze ko bitanga icyizere ko imbere ari heza bijyanye n’ubufasha bw’u Rwanda mu guteza imbere ubukerarugendo.
Mugisha Musonera Davson we yavuze ko amamurikagurisha y’ubukerarugendo yafunguriye amarembo u Rwanda.
Ibi bikorwa by’imurikagurisha rigamije kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda byiyongera ku bindi byo kubumenyekanisha birimo amasezerano rwasinye n’amakipe ya Arsenal na Paris St Germain ndetse na Filime ya Rwanda: The Royal Tour.
Yakomeje agira ati “Ikindi ni uko ubukerarugendo bwacu tutakivuga gusa ingagi…, ahubwo tuvuga n’ibigize Umuco Nyarwanda waho bazasura n’utundi turere tw’u Rwanda tukamenyekana, ukajya i Kibeho, i Nyanza, Muhazi, Rusomo n’ahandi.’’
Umuyobozi ushinzwe kumenyekanisha Ubukerarugendo muri RDB, Linda Mutesi, yavuze ko Leta y’u Rwanda yishimira uko ibigo by’ubukerarugendo bitera imbere.
Ati “Ntibahwemye kwitabira izi gahunda zo kumurika ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda, ubu bufatanye rero buzakomeza gushyirwamo imbaraga ku mpande zombi nta kabuza.’’
Yavuze ko stand y’u Rwanda mu Imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs yasuwe cyane n’abo mu bihugu bitandukanye.
Yakomeje ati “Twari twabatumiye hano kuri stand y’u Rwanda, bitabiriye ari benshi ku buryo bushimishije. Ibiganiro twagiranye, amakuru twahanye azatuma iminsi tuzamara hano ivamo umusaruro kuko guhura ni inyungu nyinshi.’’
Linda yavuze ko iterambere ry’ubukerarugendo ridakwiye guharirwa Leta gusa.
Ati “Iyo urebye muri iyi myaka ishize biragaragara cyane ko ubukerarugendo bwateye intambwe igaragara. Nkatwe ababukora nk’umwuga ni ugushyiraho akacu ntitubiharire gusa Leta. Tugomba kongera ingufu n’umubare w’ibigo bikora ubukerarugendo, tugakomeza kubaka amahoteli n’ibindi bijyanye no kwakira abashyitsi by’ibihe tugezemo no guhugura abakozi n’ibindi.’’
The Vakantiebeurs ihuza abahanga mu by’ubukerarugendo, harebwa n’uko bakorana. Ni imurika ritegerejwemo abashyitsi 50,000 mu gihe abazamurika basaga 200. Ifatwa nk’amahirwe ku bukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda bwo gukorana n’ubw’u Buholandi n’andi masoko akomeye yabufasha gutera imbere.
Guverinoma yihaye intego ko mu 2024 inyungu u Rwanda ruvana mu bukerarugendo izagera kuri miliyoni $800 zivuye kuri miliyoni $404 yinjiye mu 2017.

Title: Visit Rwanda yamuritswe mu imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs 2020 mu Buholandi (Amafoto)
Body:
U Rwanda rwamurikiye abitabiriye imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs 2020 riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Utrecht mu Buholandi, amahirwe y’ubukerarugendo ari mu gihugu binyuze muri gahunda ya ‘Visit Rwanda’.
U Rwanda rwamurikiye abitabiriye imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs 2020 riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Utrecht mu Buholandi, amahirwe y’ubukerarugendo ari mu gihugu binyuze muri gahunda ya ‘Visit Rwanda’.
Imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs riteganyijwe ku wa 16-19 Mutarama 2020. Ryitabirwa n’ibigo bikomeye by’ubukerarugendo ku Mugabane w’u Burayi n’Isi muri rusange.
Muri ‘Visit Rwanda’, abahagarariye ibigo byo mu Rwanda beretse bagenzi babo bo mu Buholandi amahirwe ari mu bukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda n’uko yabyazwa umusaruro.
Mu imurikagurisha rya The Vakantiebeurs, u Rwanda ruhagarariwe n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, Sosiyete Nyarwanda y’Ubwikorezi bwo mu Kirere, RwandAir, Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi n’ibigo by’ubukerarugendo birimo Heritage Safaris, Amahoro Tours, Palast Tours and Travel na Wildlife Tours-Rwanda.
Abayobozi baryitabiriye barimo Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Buholandi, Karabaranga Jean Pierre; Umuyobozi muri RDB Ushinzwe kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo, Mutesi Linda na Ildephonse Kambogo ushinzwe ibijyanye n’Ubusesenguzi mu by’Ubukerarugendo.
The Vakantiebeurs izamara iminsi ine, ihuza abahanga mu by’ubukerarugendo, harebwa n’uko bakorana. Ni imurika ritegerejwemo abashyitsi 50,000 mu gihe abazamurika basaga 200. Ifatwa nk’amahirwe ku bukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda bwo gukorana n’ubw’u Buholandi n’andi masoko akomeye yabufasha gutera imbere.
Umuyobozi uhagarariye Visit Rwanda mu Buholandi, Harry Betist, yavuze ko “Ni umwanya mwiza wo guhura n’abafatanyabikorwa bacu no kwishimira intambwe ubukerarugendo bumaze gutera no kureba uko itasubira inyuma.’’
Usibye ibizabera muri The Vakantiebeurs, hanateganyijwe igikorwa cyiswe B2B, aho abaserukiye ibigo bitwara abakerarugendo mu Rwanda bazahura n’ibigo binini byo mu Buholandi bicuruza ubukerarugendo. Iki gikorwa giteganyijwe kubera i LaHaye ku wa 20 Mutarama 2020, cyateguwe na Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi cyitezwemo Abaholandi bagera kuri 35.
Abanyarwanda bazacyitabira barimo; Sifa Uwera wo muri Heritage Safaris, Greg Bakunzi wo mu Amahoro Tours, Aimable Rutagarama wo muri Palast Tours, David Mugisha wo muri Wildlife Tours and Travels na RwandAir.
Kuri ubu isoko ryo mu Buholandi riza mu myanya umunani ya mbere, mu kugira abakerarugendo benshi bakorana n’u Rwanda. Abarusura biyongereyeho 11.9 %, bavuye ku 4918 mu 2017 bagera kuri 5501 mu 2018.
Ibi bikorwa by’imurikagurisha rigamije kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda byiyongera ku bikorwa bikomeye mu kubumenyekanisha birimo amasezerano rwasinye n’amakipe ya Arsenal na Paris St Germain ndetse na Filime ya Rwanda: The Royal Tour.
Imibare yo mu Ukuboza yerekana ko Abanyarwanda 142000 bafite akazi mu bukerarugendo, bageze kuri uwo mubare bavuye ku 90000 bariho mu 2017.
Guverinoma yihaye intego ko mu 2024 inyungu u Rwanda ruvana mu bukerarugendo izagera kuri miliyoni $800 zivuye kuri miliyoni $404 yinjiye mu 2017.

Title: Larousse yemeye gukosora inyandiko yanenzwe gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
Body:
Umwunganizi w’Ihuriro ry’Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa (Communauté Rwandaise de France, CRF), Me Gisagara Richard, yavuze ko ubuyobozi bw’inzu y’ubwanditsi ikomeye mu Bufaransa, Éditions Larousse, bwemeye gukosora imvugo bwakoresheje mu nkoranyamagambo yabwo, ko mu Rwanda habaye intambara hagati y’amoko.
Umwunganizi w’Ihuriro ry’Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bufaransa (Communauté Rwandaise de France, CRF), Me Gisagara Richard, yavuze ko ubuyobozi bw’inzu y’ubwanditsi ikomeye mu Bufaransa, Éditions Larousse, bwemeye gukosora imvugo bwakoresheje mu nkoranyamagambo yabwo, ko mu Rwanda habaye intambara hagati y’amoko.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Me Gisagara yavuze ko mu gisubizo bamuhaye ku ibaruwa yabandikiye, ubuyobozi bwa Larousse “bwiyemeje ko bugiye guhindura ibyanditswe muri iki gitabo kigenewe urubyiruko noneho bugakoresha ijambo nyir’izina, ‘jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi’ mu gitabo kindi kigiye gusohoka.”
Imvugo yanenzwe bikomeye yakoreshejwe mu nkoranyamagambo ya Larousse Junior. Iyo nyandiko y’umwaka wa 2020, aho iyo abanditsi iyo igeze ku Rwanda, basobanura ingano yarwo, umurwa mukuru, abaturage n’aho ruherereye, ariko hasi bakagira bati “icyo gihugu kimwe n’u Burundi, cyashegeshwe n’intambara hagati y’ibice bibiri by’abaturage bakigize, Abahutu n’Abatutsi.”
Me Gisagara avuga ko nubwo yishimiye icyo cyemezo cya Larousse cyo guhindura imvugo, atanyuzwe na gato n’ibisobanuro ubuyobozi bwatanze, ko bwahisemo kudakoresha ijambo jenoside, “Ngo kuko ari igitabo kigenewe abana b’imyaka irindwi kugera ku 11,” bityo ngo ntibabasha kumva neza Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Me Gisagara yakomeje ati “Mu kinyarwanda bavuga ko umwana apfa mu iterura. Ntabwo rero watangira umubwira ibinyoma ngo wizere ko uzabihindura amaze gukura.”
Yavuze ko agiye kungurana ibitekerezo n’abayobozi ba CRF ngo barebe niba bemera ibyo bisobanuro bya Larousse cyangwa niba bafata izindi ngamba, cyane cyane ko indi nkoranyamagambo nshya ya Larousse ishobora gusohoka mu mwaka utaha.
Byaba bivuze ko abana bose bazaba basoma iyo iri kugurishwa, bagakomeza guhabwa “izi nyigisho zinyuranye n’ukuri. Ni ibintu bibabje bigomba kwamaganwa.”
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Komisiyo y’Igihugu yo Kurwanya Jenoside, CNLG, Dr Bizimana Jean Damascène, aheruka kuvuga ko mu Bufaransa atari ubwa mbere ibikorwa byo gupfobya jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bikorwa n’abantu ku giti cyabo, bityo uburyo bazemera gukosora ibyo bakoze bizagaragaza icyemezo cya nyuma kizafatwa.
Ati "Nibakomeza gutsimbarara kuri iyo nyito [bazajyanwa mu nkiko] kuko mu Bufaransa bwose itegeko rihari ryemera ko umuntu ku giti cye, umuryango, ishyirahamwe ndetse n’urundi rwego rwose, rushobora gutanga ikirego rushingiye ku gihari.”
Mu mpera z’umwaka ushize wa 2019, umwanditsi Charles Onana ukomoka muri Cameroun, nawe yarezwe mu butabera bwo mu Bufaransa n’ishyirahamwe ry’Abanyarwanda baba muri icyo gihugu, kubera ibikorwa bye byo guhakana n’ipfobya rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Inkuru wasoma: Larousse ishobora kujyanwa mu nkiko izira gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi

Title: Umuhanzi Weya Viatora yatumiwe mu Bubiligi mu iserukiramuco mpuzamahanga
Body:
Umuhanzi Weya Marie Viatora yatumiwe mu iserukiramuco rizwi nka Congolisation rizahuriza mu Bubiligi abahanzi batandukanye hagamijwe gusangizanya ubunararibonye ku iterambere ry’umuziki.
Umuhanzi Weya Marie Viatora yatumiwe mu iserukiramuco rizwi nka Congolisation rizahuriza mu Bubiligi abahanzi batandukanye hagamijwe gusangizanya ubunararibonye ku iterambere ry’umuziki.
Iri serukiramuco ry’umuco mpuzamahanga rizabera mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles ahitwa KVS, Théâtre Royal Flamand tariki ya 16 Mutarama 2020 guhera saa mbiri z’umugoroba mu gikorwa cy’umukino wiswe ‘‘Révolution rap-une histoire Africaine’’.
Weya azanitabira ibirori by’isozwa rya Congolisation Festival biteganyijwe ku wa 18 Mutarama 2020.
Uyu muhanzi w’imyaka 23 amaze kumenyekana mu ruhando rw’abanyamuziki bafite impano mu Rwanda no mu mahanga.
Yatumiwe muri Congolisation Festival bigizwemo uruhare n’Ikigo Rwanda Arts initiative (RAI) cyashinzwe na Dorcy Rugamba wiyemeje gufasha abahanzi b’Ababanyarwanda gukora ubuhanzi bw’umwuga bukanabatunga, gifatanyije na Théâtre KVS.
Rugamba yabwiye IGIHE ko bahisemo gutumira Weya mu gufasha umuziki we kuzamuka biruseho.
Yagize ati “Twatumiye Weya kugira ngo aze yimenyereze akorane n’abahanzi b’umwuga afungure amaso, amenyere. Ibi biri muri gahunda ya Rwanda Arts Initiative aho dufata umuhanzi tukamushakira uburyo bwo kwihugura ku rwego ahura n’abandi kandi ahantu hazwi nk’aha muri KVS. Théâtre Royal Flamand ni ahantu hazamuha isura yo ku rwego twifuza na we yifuza kugeraho, azahahurira n’abahanzi bakomeye, azabona ibikoresho n’imikorere yo ku rwego rw’umwuga maze bimubere impamba mu minsi iri imbere.’’
Yakomeje agira ati “Umuhanzi tuzanye kandi ahabwa naho akorera twakwita ko yiherera akiha gahunda akiga gukora no gukoresha igihe cyose afite mu guhanga ari wenyine ibindi yabisize ku ruhande.’’
Rugamba yakomeje avuga ko bifuza ko Abanyarwanda nka Weya indirimbo zabo mu minsi iri imbere bifuza kuzibona no mu nzu zikomeye z’ubucuruzi bw’ibihangano ku rwego mpuzamahanga nka Fnac mu Burayi kandi zikinjiza amafaranga yatunga abahanzi.
Ubu bufasha buhabwa abahanzi b’ingeri zitandukanye barimo abandika, abaririmba, abakina filimi cyangwa amakinamico n’ibindi.
Rugamba yasabye Abanyarwanda kuzajya gushyigikira Weya no kumuremamo icyizere cyo kuvamo umuhanzikazi ukomeye.
Weya mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE yavuze ko yishimiye kuba yaratoranyijwe mu bahanzi bazitabira iserukiramuco rizabera mu Bubiligi.
Ati “Tuzahura n’abandi bahanzi turebe icyo twabigiraho, tuzahuza ubwo bunararibonye turebe icyo twakora kinini mu buryo bwagutse.’’
Iserukiramuco rya Congolisation rizwi nka Festival Afro-Diaspo-Arts riberamo ibikorwa bitandukanye birimo amamurika, imbyino, amakinamico, umuziki, filime n’inama zagutse. Ni ku nshuro ya gatanu rigiye kuba.
Weya azanafashwa gutunganya album ye ya kabiri abifashijwemo na studio zikomeye mu Bubiligi zirimo iya Sunny Side Inc iyoborwa na Nicolas Lefèvre na Bionix ya Christian Dessart afatanyije na Rachid Mir zifitanye imikoranire na Rwanda Arts Initiative.
Muri uwo mushinga aranateganya no gukorana indirimbo n’umuhanzi Gaël Faye, bahuye ubwo uyu muhanzi yamurikaga igitabo cye yise “Le Petit Pays.’’
Weya yavukiye mu Mujyi wa Kigali ku wa 9 Nyakanga 1996 mu Murwa Mukuru wa Kigali. Yatangiye kwiyumvamo impano yo kuririmba ari umwana muto w’imyaka ine.
Ati “Kuva ndi umwana muto nakundaga kuririmba, aho menyeye ubwenge nisanze ndirimba naba mbabaye naba nishimye; mbese uyu ni umuhamagaro kuri jye numva nta kintu nabisimbuza kuko ni ubuzima bwanjye.’’
Weya Viatora yanditse indirimbo ye ya mbere ageze mu mwaka wa kane w’amashuri abanza, asoje ayisumbuye ajya muri studio akora indirimbo ya mbere yitwa ‘Empty House’.
Iyi ndirimbo yanyujijwe no ku Ijwi rya Amerika ndetse ituma ahabwa ikiganiro cyanyuze muri CNN.
Uyu muhanzikazi yashyize hanze indirimbo zirimo "Intimba", "Eyes Open Dreaming", "Miracles", "Uwo ndiwe", "Heritage" na "Name is woman". Yanahawe ibihembo bitandukanye mu 2014 na 2016 birimo icya High School Idol n’icya Youth Award.
Weya afite album imwe yasohoye mu 2018, yayikoranyeho n’aba-producers barimo Khrisau, Danny Beats, Jay P na Dr Nganji usanzwe ukorera Green Ferry Music ibarizwamo abasore bakora injyana na Kinyatrap yazamuwe cyane na Bushali.
Imwe mu ndirimbo yaririmbyemo ikamamara cyane ni iyitwa ‘‘Icumu n’Ingabo” yahuriyemo na Prime na Icenova bo muri Green Ferry. Yanakoranye n’abahanzi barimo Mani Martin, Butera Knowless, Peace Jolis, Patrick Nyamitali, Carole Karemera, Samuel Kamanzi, Michael Sengazi n’abandi.

Title: Itsinda ry’Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga basuye Intara y’Amajyaruguru
Body:
Abanyarwanda batuye mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku isi bakiriwe n’ubuyobozi bw’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, baraganira baranasabana.
Abanyarwanda batuye mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku isi bakiriwe n’ubuyobozi bw’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, baraganira baranasabana.
Kuwa Gatanu tariki ya 10 Mutarama 2020, nibwo Guverineri w’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney yakiriye Itsinda rya Diaspora Nyarwanda rigizwe n’abantu barenga 30 baba mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku Isi.
 Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE Guverineri Gatabazi yavuze ko kwakira abo banyarwanda ari mu rwego rwo kubereka iyo Ntara, bakamenya n’ibyiza bitatse igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati “Birimo n’inyungu ku mpande zombie kuko bamenya igihugu cyabo n’ibyiza bigitatse, bakaruhuka mu mutwe kuko abenshi baba bamaze igihe bakora aho muri ibyo bihugu bataruhuka. Natwe batubera abavugizi mu nshuti zabo, imiryango yabo bazanye nayo mu modoka, barara mu mahoteli bagasiga bazamuye akarere mu bukungu, ni bintu byiza cyane tuzakomeza.”
Gatabazi yavuze ko banaganiriye ku mahirwe atandukanye ari mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru ashobora gushorwamo imari, akabyazwa umusaruro.
 Guverineri Gatabazi yanabasabye gukomeza gushyira imbaraga mu kwegera urubyiruko no kugerageza kubohora abana bo mu miryango yinangiye idashaka guhinduka, bakava i buzimu bakajya ibuntu.
Yongeye kubasaba gukomeza urukundo bafitiye Igihugu cy’u Rwanda no gukomeza guharanira icyateza imbere umuturage mugenzi wabo, bitabira gushora imari mu bikorwa bitandukanye birimo ubuhinzi, ubukerarugendo, amahoteli, uburezi, ikoranabuhanga n’ibindi.
Yabashimiye uburyo bagiye bategura za Rwanda Days bashyizemo imbaraga bigatuma Perezida Paul Kagame ahacana umucyo, abasaba gukomeza guharanira ko umunyarwanda aho ari hose yarangwa n’imyitwarire myiza, imigenzereze n’imibanire ihesha agaciro Igihugu bityo bikazakomeza gutuma amahanga yose yifuza kuza mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi w’ungirije Perezida w’ishyirahamwe ry’Abanyarwanda batuye mu Mahanga RDGN (Rwandan Diaspora Global Netwerk), Thomas Ntagozera yavuze ko nubwo baba mu mahanga, umutima wabo uhora mu Rwanda.
Ati “Tuba mu mahanga ariko umutima wacu uba mu Rwanda. Turashimira Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga uko yadushyiriyeho urwego rutugenewe by’umwihariko rukamenya amakuru yacu. Uko tuje twakirwa neza, tugasobanurirwa ibyo twifuza kumenya.”
Yashimiye ubuyobozi bw’Intara y’Amajyaruguru uburyo bakirwa dore ko bamaze kuyisura inshuro eshatu.
Abo banyarwanda mu gihe bamaze bari mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru, basuye ishuri rya Gisirikare rya Nyakinama, basuye Ishuri rikuru ry’Imyuga n’Ubyumenyingiro rya Musanze banareba n’ibindi bikorwa by’iterambere muri iyo Ntara.

Title: Bahinduye umuvuno! Uko Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bisanga mu gihugu cyabibarutse
Body:
Mu mpera za buri mwaka iyo witegereje cyane usanga ingendo nyinshi zikorwa ari iz’abantu basubira iwabo kuhasura, bakifatanya n’imiryango kwishimira Noheli n’Ubunani.
Mu mpera za buri mwaka iyo witegereje cyane usanga ingendo nyinshi zikorwa ari iz’abantu basubira iwabo kuhasura, bakifatanya n’imiryango kwishimira Noheli n’Ubunani.
Iyo witegereje umwaka wa 2019 ingendo zakozwe n’Abanyarwanda bagana mu biruhuko bya Noheli n’ibisoza umwaka bavuye mu Bubiligi no mu bindi bihugu by’u Burayi ubona ko bidasanzwe, abenshi bahisemo kubikorera mu Rwanda.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bahageze mu buryo butandukanye mu mpande zose z’Isi! Hari abahageze kera kubera amateka u Rwanda rwaciyemo mu bihe bitandukanye guhera 1959 na nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Muri ubwo buzima usanga hari urubyiruko rwahavukiye cyangwa rwahakuriye, hakaba n’abajyayo bagiye kwiga.
Nyuma y’imyaka 26 Jenoside ihagaritswe usanga u Rwanda n’Abanyarwanda barahinduye imyumvire. Kuri ubu abenshi bishimira kwitwa Abanyarwanda, nk’ikintu bose bahuriyeho.
Nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi benshi bari barahinduye imvugo ingendo n’indimi, batifuza kwitwa Abanyarwanda cyangwa kwitirirwa u Rwanda kubera amahano igihugu cyari kivuyemo.
Buhoro buhoro, ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda bwahinduye imyumvire n’imitekerereze kugeza ubwo buri wese yifuje kwitirirwa rwa Rwanda kubera isura nziza rufite ugereranyije naho rwavuye, mu icuraburindi, imiborogo n’amaraso yamenetse.
Ubu Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bazirikana igihugu cyabibarutse, ntibikandagira mu gihe bashaka kugaruka mu gihugu cyababyaye no gutanga umusanzu wabo mu kubaka igihugu.
Mu biborohereza mu ngendo harimo no kuba Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubwikorezi bw’Indege, RwandAir, gikorera ingendo mu bice bitandukanye by’Isi mu byerekezo 28 bitandukanye.
Kuva mu ntangiriro za 2019, RwandAir yatangije ingendo zerekeza i Addis Ababa muri Ethiopie; i Kinshasa muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, i Guangzhou mu Bushinwa n’i Tel Aviv muri Israel.
IGIHE yegereye abayobozi batandukanye mu gihugu, bayisangiza uko bakiriye kuba Abanyarwanda bagaruka mu gihugu cyabo kandi bishimye.
Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kigali, Rubingisa Pudence, yavuze ko mu bikorwa by’Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bagaragaza urukundo rw’igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati “Buri muntu ubona uko u Rwanda rwihuta mu iterambere ari mu mahanga aba ashaka gushyiraho umuganda we, ikindi umuntu yashima ni ubukangurambaga bukorwa na za Ambasade z’u Rwanda hirya no hino ku Isi, aho n’imiryango y’Abanyarwanda itanga uburyo bwo guhanahana amakuru muri za Diaspora.’’
Yakomeje ati “Iyo bageze mu Rwanda basanga harashyizweho uburyo bwo kwakirwa bwihariye muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga n’Ubutwererane, n’ahandi bagiye hose usanga bakirwa neza kandi byihuse n’ubwo usanga hari serivisi zimwe zigomba kunozwa nabo ubwabo bakabyivugira kugira ngo bikosorwe.’’
Rubingisa yanavuze ko iyo Abanyarwanda basanze iterambere ry’igihugu bibaha umurava wo kukigarukamo kenshi.
Ati “Ibi kandi noneho si abo mu mahanga bibaho gusa kuko n’Abanyarwanda baturuka mu zindi ntara usanga baza bagahaha ubumenyi bakanakopera ibyiza bikorerwa mu Murwa Mukuru wa Kigali bakabijyana mu turere batuyemo.’’
“Mu baturuka mu mahanga, abo tuganira banifuza kuza gusangira ubumenyi mu byo bafitemo ubunararibonye bize cyangwa bakoramo bikaba ari ibintu byo kwishimira.’’
Mu gihe cy’ibiruhuko, Abanyarwanda basura ibyiza nyaburanga biri mu gihugu birimo Ingoro Ndangamurage ziri mu Rwanda, Pariki z’Igihugu zirimo iya Nyungwe, iy’Ibirunga n’ahandi hatuma binjiza amafaranga menshi ku bukerarugendo, bikanazamura ubukungu bw’igihugu.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ibikorwa by’Abanyarwanda baba mu Mahanga muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Maziyateke Sandrine, yavuze ko mu mpera z’umwaka ushize Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga benshi basuye igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati “Nibyo koko mu mpera z’umwaka twagize abantu benshi baturutse muri Diaspora mu Burayi, Canada, Afurika n’ahandi.’’
Mu Nama y’Igihugu y’Umushyikirano handitswe abantu bagera kuri 377 bavuye mu mahanga.
Yakomeje ati “Ikindi kiza cyane ni uko nyuma bakomeza kugirana ibiganiro n’inzego zitandukanye mu gihugu. Uyu mwaka bahuye na Sena bayigezaho ibitekerezo n’ibyifuzo nk’Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga. Baganira n’izi nzego havamo n’imyanzuro itandukanye harimo gufatanya cyane mu kurwanya abahezanguni, abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bakomeje kwidegembya mu bihugu by’amahanga.’’
Aba Banyarwanda kandi banaganiriye na Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Biruta Vincent; uw’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Prof. Shyaka Anastase, ubuyobozi bw’Agaciro Development Fund; ubw’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubwiteganyirize (RSSB); Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) n’ubwa Minisiteri y’Ubutabera baganira ku ngingo zigarukwaho mu bikorwa byagutse nka za Rwanda Day.
Muri ibyo biganiro kandi hanazamo imikoranire ikwiye hagati y’Abanyarwanda b’imbere mu gihugu no hanze mu bijyanye n’ishoramari.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga banahuye n’itsinda riyobowe n’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Amb. Nduhungirehe Olivier, ryabasangije ku muco wo kuba Umunyafurika nyawe (Panafricanist). Ibi biganiro byavuyemo imyanzuro yo gushyigikira iyi gahunda no kuriganiriza abandi Banyafurika bari mu bihugu by’amahanga.
Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga basabye ko gahunda ya Ndi Umunyarwanda zarushaho kwimakazwa bijyanye n’igihe.
Maziyateke yanagarutse no ku biganiro byo gukangurira abana bato kumenya igihugu n’amateka yacyo mu bijyanye n’umuco n’ururimi rw’Ikinyarwanda, kubaha umwanya ku bitekerezo byabo, abana bakumva ko bafite igihugu cy’ababyeyi babo.
Guverineri w’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney, yabwiye IGIHE ko Abanyarwanda benshi bakunze kwakirwa mu biruhuko bisoza umwaka.
Ati “Mu mpera za 2019 Abanyarwanda baje ari benshi mu biruhuko, hari na gahunda iteganyijwe yo kubakira mu Majyaruguru ku bakiri mu Rwanda narabatumiye.’’
“Abo bose hari abaza nko mu Mushyikirano ariko bakazana n’imiryango yabo n’inshuti, bagasura ahantu hatandukanye, uko basura niko bazamura ubukungu kuko bishyura serivisi bahabwa, amahoteli babamo basura ahantu hatandukanye.’’
Gatabazi yavuze ko hari n’ibiganiro byabayeho bamwe bemera kuzajya batanga amasomo mu bigo by’amashuri atandukanye, abakora ubushakashatsi bakabisangiza amashuri y’u Rwanda nta kiguzi.
Yakomeje ati “Dufite n’amahirwe ko n’abanangiye kugaruka mu gihugu bohereza abana, abagore ku buryo bagenda bafunguka buhoro buhoro mu bikorwa byo kubaka igihugu. Aho usanga abatarabigeraho ni uko bafite ibibazo byihariye bibareba bya politiki.’’
Yashimye ko Abanyarwanda benshi bagaruka mu gihugu cyabo bazana ibitekerezo bishya kandi byiza bavanye mu mahanga bishyira itafari ryabo mu kucyubaka.
